GV01rv_10_u:0: RV_10.001.01.1{29} agre bṛhannuṣasāmūrdhvo asthān nirjaganvān tamasojyotiṣāgāt
GV01rv_10_u:1: RV_10.001.01.2{29} agnirbhānunā ruśatā svaṅga ā jātoviśvā sadmānyaprāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2: RV_10.001.02.1{29} sa jāto garbho asi rodasyoragne cārurvibhṛta oṣadhīṣu
GV01rv_10_u:3: RV_10.001.02.2{29} citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāṃsyaktūn pra mātṛbhyo adhikanikradat gāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:4: RV_10.001.03.1{29} viṣṇuritthā paramamasya vidvāñ jāto bṛhannabhi pātitṛtīyam
GV01rv_10_u:5: RV_10.001.03.2{29} āsā yadasya payo akrata svaṃ sacetaso abhyarcantyatra
GV01rv_10_u:6: RV_10.001.04.1{29} ata u tvā pitubhṛto janitrīrannāvṛdhaṃ prati carantyannaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:7: RV_10.001.04.2{29} tā īṃ pratyeṣi punaranyarūpā asi tvaṃ vikṣumānuṣīṣu hotā
GV01rv_10_u:9: RV_10.001.05.2{29} pratyardhiṃ devasya-devasya mahnā śriyā tvagnimatithiṃ janānām
GV01rv_10_u:10: RV_10.001.06.1{29} sa tu vastrāṇyadha peśanāni vasāno agnirnābhāpṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:11: RV_10.001.06.2{29} aruṣo jātaḥ pada iḷāyāḥ purohito rājanyakṣīha devān
GV01rv_10_u:12: RV_10.001.07.1{29} ā hi dyāvāpṛthivī agna ubhe sadā putro na mātarātatantha
GV01rv_10_u:13: RV_10.001.07.2{29} pra yāhyachośato yaviṣṭhāthā vaha sahasyehadevān
GV01rv_10_u:14: RV_10.002.01.1{30} piprīhi devānuśato yaviṣṭha vidvān ṛtūnr{ṛ}tupateyajeha
GV01rv_10_u:15: RV_10.002.01.2{30} ye daivyā ṛtvijastebhiragne tvaṃ hotṝṇāmasyāyajiṣṭhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:16: RV_10.002.02.1{30} veṣi hotramuta potraṃ janānāṃ mandhātāsi draviṇodāṛtāvā
GV01rv_10_u:17: RV_10.002.02.2{30} svāhā vayaṃ kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi devo devānyajatvagnirarhan
GV01rv_10_u:18: RV_10.002.03.1{30} ā devānāmapi panthāmaganma yacchaknavāma tadanupravoḷum
GV01rv_10_u:19: RV_10.002.03.2{30} agnirvidvān sa yajāt sedu hotā so adhvarāṃsa ṛtūn kalpayāti
GV01rv_10_u:20: RV_10.002.04.1{30} yad vo vayaṃ pramināma vratāni viduṣaṃ devāaviduṣṭarāsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:21: RV_10.002.04.2{30} agniṣ ṭad viśvamā pṛṇāti vidvānyebhirdevān ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti
GV01rv_10_u:22: RV_10.002.05.1{30} yat pākatrā manasā dīnadakṣā na yajñasya manvatemartyāsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:23: RV_10.002.05.2{30} agniṣ ṭad dhotā kratuvid vijānanyajiṣṭho devān ṛtuśo yajāti
GV01rv_10_u:24: RV_10.002.06.1{30} viśveṣāṃ hyadhvarāṇāmanīkaṃ citraṃ ketuṃ janitātvā jajāna
GV01rv_10_u:25: RV_10.002.06.2{30} sa ā yajasva nṛvatīranu kṣā spārhāiṣaḥ kṣumatīrviśvajanyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:26: RV_10.002.07.1{30} yaṃ tvā dyāvāpṛthivī yaṃ tvāpastvaṣṭā yaṃ tvāsujanimā jajāna
GV01rv_10_u:27: RV_10.002.07.2{30} panthāmanu pravidvānpitṛyāṇaṃ dyumadagne samidhāno vi bhāhi
GV01rv_10_u:28: RV_10.003.01.1{31} ino rājannaratiḥ samiddho raudro dakṣāya suṣumānadarśi
GV01rv_10_u:29: RV_10.003.01.2{31} cikid vi bhāti bhāsā bṛhatāsiknīmeti ruśatīmapājan
GV01rv_10_u:30: RV_10.003.02.1{31} kṛṣṇāṃ yadenīmabhi varpasā bhūjjanayan yoṣāmbṛhataḥ piturjām
GV01rv_10_u:31: RV_10.003.02.2{31} ūrdhvaṃ bhānuṃ sūryasya stabhāyandivo vasubhiraratirvi bhāti
GV01rv_10_u:32: RV_10.003.03.1{31} bhadro bhadrayā sacamāna āgāt svasāraṃ jāro abhyetipaścāt
GV01rv_10_u:34: RV_10.003.04.1{31} asya yāmāso bṛhato na vagnūnindhānā agneḥ sakhyuḥśivasya
GV01rv_10_u:35: RV_10.003.04.2{31} iḍyasya vṛṣṇo bṛhataḥ svāso bhāmāso yāmannaktavaścikitre
GV01rv_10_u:36: RV_10.003.05.1{31} svanā na yasya bhāmāsaḥ pavante rocamānasya bṛhataḥsudivaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:38: RV_10.003.06.1{31} asya śuṣmāso dadṛśānapaverjehamānasya svanayan niyudbhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:39: RV_10.003.06.2{31} pratnebhiryo ruśadbhirdevatamo vi rebhadbhiraratirbhāti vibhvā
GV01rv_10_u:40: RV_10.003.07.1{31} sa ā vakṣi mahi na ā ca satsi divaspṛthivyoraratiryuvatyoḥ
GV01rv_10_u:41: RV_10.003.07.2{31} agniḥ sutukaḥ sutukebhiraśvai rabhasvadbhīrabhasvāneha gamyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:42: RV_10.004.01.1{32} pra te yakṣi pra ta iyarmi manma bhuvo yathā vandyo nohaveṣu
GV01rv_10_u:43: RV_10.004.01.2{32} dhanvanniva prapā asi tvamagna iyakṣave pūravepratna rājan
GV01rv_10_u:44: RV_10.004.02.1{32} yaṃ tvā janāso abhi saṃcaranti gāva uṣṇamiva vrajaṃyaviṣṭha
GV01rv_10_u:46: RV_10.004.03.1{32} śiśuṃ na tvā jenyaṃ vardhayantī mātā bibhartisacanasyamānā
GV01rv_10_u:47: RV_10.004.03.2{32} dhanoradhi pravatā yāsi haryañ jigīṣasepaśurivāvasṛṣṭaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:48: RV_10.004.04.1{32} mūrā amūra na vayaṃ cikitvo mahitvamagne tvamaṅga vitse
GV01rv_10_u:49: RV_10.004.04.2{32} śaye vavriścarati jihvayādan rerihyate yuvatiṃviśpatiḥ san
GV01rv_10_u:50: RV_10.004.05.1{32} kūcijjāyate sanayāsu navyo vane tasthau palito dhūmaketuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:51: RV_10.004.05.2{32} asnātāpo vṛṣabho na pra veti sacetaso yaṃ parṇayantamartāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:53: RV_10.004.06.2{32} iyaṃ te agne navyasī manīṣā yukṣvā rathaṃna śucayadbhiraṅgaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:54: RV_10.004.07.1{32} brahma ca te jātavedo namaśceyaṃ ca gīḥ sadamidvardhanī bhūt
GV01rv_10_u:55: RV_10.004.07.2{32} rakṣā ṇo agne tanayāni tokā rakṣota nastanvo aprayuchan
GV01rv_10_u:56: RV_10.005.01.1{33} ekaḥ samudro dharuṇo rayīṇāmasmad dhṛdo bhūrijanmā vicaṣṭe
GV01rv_10_u:57: RV_10.005.01.2{33} siṣaktyūdharniṇyorupastha utsasya madhyenihitaṃ padaṃ veḥ
GV01rv_10_u:58: RV_10.005.02.1{33} samānaṃ nīḷaṃ vṛṣaṇo vasānāḥ saṃ jagmire mahiṣāarvatībhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:59: RV_10.005.02.2{33} ṛtasya padaṃ kavayo ni pānti guhā nāmānidadhire parāṇi
GV01rv_10_u:60: RV_10.005.03.1{33} ṛtāyinī māyinī saṃ dadhāte mitvā śiśuṃ jajñaturvardhayantī
GV01rv_10_u:61: RV_10.005.03.2{33} viśvasya nābhiṃ carato dhruvasya kaveścittantuṃ manasā viyantaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:62: RV_10.005.04.1{33} ṛtasya hi vartanayaḥ sujātamiṣo vājāya pradivaḥsacante
GV01rv_10_u:63: RV_10.005.04.2{33} adhīvāsaṃ rodasī vāvasāne ghṛtairannairvāvṛdhāte madhūnām
GV01rv_10_u:64: RV_10.005.05.1{33} sapta svasṝraruṣīrvāvaśāno vidvān madhva ujjabhārādṛśe kam
GV01rv_10_u:65: RV_10.005.05.2{33} antaryeme antarikṣe purājā ichan vavrimavidatpūṣaṇasya
GV01rv_10_u:67: RV_10.005.06.2{33} āyorha skambha upamasya nīḷe pathāṃvisarge dharuṇeṣu tasthau
GV01rv_10_u:68: RV_10.005.07.1{33} asacca sacca parame vyoman dakṣasya janmannaditerupasthe
GV01rv_10_u:69: RV_10.005.07.2{33} agnirha naḥ pra thamajā ṛtasya pūrva āyuni vṛṣabhaścadhenuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:70: RV_10.006.01.1{01} ayaṃ sa yasya śarmannavobhiragneredhate jaritābhiṣṭau
GV01rv_10_u:73: RV_10.006.02.2{01} ā yo vivāya sakhyā sakhibhyo 'parihvṛto atyo na saptiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:74: RV_10.006.03.1{01} īśe yo viśvasyā devavīterīśe viśvāyuruṣasovyuṣṭau
GV01rv_10_u:75: RV_10.006.03.2{01} ā yasmin manā havīṃṣyagnāvariṣṭarathaskabhnāti śūṣaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:77: RV_10.006.04.2{01} mandro hotā sa juhvā yajiṣṭhaḥ sammiślo agnirā jigharti devān
GV01rv_10_u:79: RV_10.006.05.2{01} ā yaṃ viprāso matibhirgṛṇanti jātavedasaṃjuhvaṃ sahānām
GV01rv_10_u:80: RV_10.006.06.1{01} saṃ yasmin viśvā vasūni jagmurvāje nāśvāḥsaptīvanta evaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:81: RV_10.006.06.2{01} asme ūtīrindravātatamā arvācīnāagna ā kṛṇuṣva
GV01rv_10_u:82: RV_10.006.07.1{01} adhā hyagne mahnā niṣadyā sadyo jajñāno havyo babhūtha
GV01rv_10_u:83: RV_10.006.07.2{01} taṃ te devāso anu ketamāyannadhāvardhanta prathamāsaūmāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:84: RV_10.007.01.1{02} svasti no divo agne pṛthivyā viśvāyurdhehi yajathāya deva
GV01rv_10_u:85: RV_10.007.01.2{02} sacemahi tava dasma praketairuruṣyā ṇa urubhirdevaśaṃsaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:86: RV_10.007.02.1{02} imā agne matayastubhyaṃ jātā gobhiraśvairabhi gṛṇantiradhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:87: RV_10.007.02.2{02} yadā te marto anu bhogamānaḍ vaso dadhānomatibhiḥ sujāta
GV01rv_10_u:88: RV_10.007.03.1{02} agniṃ manye pitaramagnimāpimagniṃ bhrātaraṃ sadamitsakhāyam
GV01rv_10_u:89: RV_10.007.03.2{02} agneranīkaṃ bṛhataḥ saparyaṃ divi śukraṃyajataṃ sūryasya
GV01rv_10_u:90: RV_10.007.04.1{02} sidhrā agne dhiyo asme sanutrīryaṃ trāyase dama ānityahotā
GV01rv_10_u:92: RV_10.007.05.1{02} dyubhirhitaṃ mitramiva prayogaṃ pratnam ṛtvijamadhvarasyajāram
GV01rv_10_u:94: RV_10.007.06.1{02} svayaṃ yajasva divi deva devān kiṃ te pākaḥ kṛṇavadapracetāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:95: RV_10.007.06.2{02} yathāyaja ṛtubhirdeva devānevā yajasvatanvaṃ sujāta
GV01rv_10_u:96: RV_10.007.07.1{02} bhavā no agne 'vitota gopā bhavā vayaskṛduta novayodhāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:97: RV_10.007.07.2{02} rāsvā ca naḥ sumaho havyadātiṃ trāsvota nastanvo aprayuchan
GV01rv_10_u:98: RV_10.008.01.1{03} pra ketunā bṛhatā yātyagnirā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti
GV01rv_10_u:100: RV_10.008.02.1{03} mumoda garbho vṛṣabhaḥ kakudmānasremā vatsaḥ śimīvānarāvīt
GV01rv_10_u:101: RV_10.008.02.2{03} sa devatātyudyatāni kṛṇvan sveṣu kṣayeṣuprathamo jigāti
GV01rv_10_u:102: RV_10.008.03.1{03} ā yo mūrdhānaṃ pitrorarabdha nyadhvare dadhire sūroarṇaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:103: RV_10.008.03.2{03} asya patmannaruṣīraśvabhudhnā ṛtasya yonautanvo juṣanta
GV01rv_10_u:104: RV_10.008.04.1{03} uṣa-uṣo hi vaso agrameṣi tvaṃ yamayorabhavo vibhāvā
GV01rv_10_u:105: RV_10.008.04.2{03} ṛtāya sapta dadhiṣe padāni janayan mitraṃ tanve svāyai
GV01rv_10_u:106: RV_10.008.05.1{03} bhuvaścakṣurmaha ṛtasya gopā bhuvo varuṇo yad ṛtāyaveṣi
GV01rv_10_u:107: RV_10.008.05.2{03} bhuvo apāṃ napājjātavedo bhuvo dūto yasyahavyaṃ jujoṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:108: RV_10.008.06.1{04} bhuvo yajñasya rajasaśca netā yatrā niyudbhiḥ sacaseśivābhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:109: RV_10.008.06.2{04} divi mūrdhānaṃ dadhiṣe svarṣāṃ jihvāmagnecakṛṣe havyavāham
GV01rv_10_u:110: RV_10.008.07.1{04} asya tritaḥ kratunā vavre antarichan dhītiṃ piturevaiḥparasya
GV01rv_10_u:111: RV_10.008.07.2{04} sacasyamānaḥ pitrorupasthe jāmi bruvāṇaāyudhāni veti
GV01rv_10_u:112: RV_10.008.08.1{04} sa pitryāṇyāyudhani vidvanindreṣita āptyo abhyayudhyat
GV01rv_10_u:113: RV_10.008.08.2{04} triśīrṣāṇaṃ saptaraśmiṃ jaghanvān tvāṣṭrasya cinniḥ sasṛje trito gāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:115: RV_10.008.09.2{04} tvāṣṭrasya cid viśvarūpasya gonāmācakraṇastrīṇi śīrṣā parā vark
GV01rv_10_u:116: RV_10.009.01.1{05} āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvastā na ūrje dadhātana
GV01rv_10_u:118: RV_10.009.02.1{05} yo vaḥ śivatamo rasastasya bhajayateha naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:120: RV_10.009.03.1{05} tasmā araṃ gamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha
GV01rv_10_u:122: RV_10.009.04.1{05} śaṃ no devīrabhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye
GV01rv_10_u:126: RV_10.009.06.1{05} apsu me somo abravīdantarviśvāni bheṣajā
GV01rv_10_u:128: RV_10.009.07.1{05} āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajāṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama
GV01rv_10_u:130: RV_10.009.08.1{05} idamāpaḥ pra vahata yat kiṃ ca duritaṃ mayi
GV01rv_10_u:131: RV_10.009.08.2{05} yad vāhamabhidudroha yad va śepa utānṛtam
GV01rv_10_u:133: RV_10.009.09.2{05} payasvānagnaā gahi taṃ mā saṃ sṛja varcasā
GV01rv_10_u:134: RV_10.010.01.1{06} o cit sakhāyaṃ sakhyā vavṛtyāṃ tiraḥ purū cidarṇavaṃjaganvan
GV01rv_10_u:135: RV_10.010.01.2{06} piturnapātamā dadhīta vedhā adhi kṣamiprataraṃ didhyānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:136: RV_10.010.02.1{06} na te sakhā sakhyaṃ vaṣṭyetat salakṣmā yad viṣurūpābhavāti
GV01rv_10_u:137: RV_10.010.02.2{06} mahas putraso asurasya vīrā divo dhartāraurviyā pari khyan
GV01rv_10_u:138: RV_10.010.03.1{06} uśanti ghā te amṛtāsa etadekasya cit tyajasaṃ martyasya
GV01rv_10_u:139: RV_10.010.03.2{06} ni te mano manasi dhāyyasme janyuḥ patistanvamāviviśyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:140: RV_10.010.04.1{06} na yat purā cakṛmā kad dha nūnam ṛtā vadanto anṛtaṃrapema
GV01rv_10_u:141: RV_10.010.04.2{06} gandharvo apsvapyā ca yoṣā sā no nābhiḥparamaṃ jāmi tan nau
GV01rv_10_u:142: RV_10.010.05.1{06} garbhe nu nau janitā dampatī kardevāstvaṣṭā savitāviśvarūpaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:143: RV_10.010.05.2{06} nākirasya pra minanti vratāni veda nāvasyapṛthivi uta dyauḥ
GV01rv_10_u:144: RV_10.010.06.1{07} ko asya veda prathamasyāhnaḥ ka īṃ dadarśa ka iha pravocat
GV01rv_10_u:145: RV_10.010.06.2{07} bṛhan mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma kadu brava āhanovīcyā nṝn
GV01rv_10_u:146: RV_10.010.07.1{07} yamasya mā yamyaṃ kāma āgan samāne yonau sahaśeyyāya
GV01rv_10_u:147: RV_10.010.07.2{07} jāyeva patye tanvaṃ riricyāṃ vi cid vṛheva rathyeva cakrā
GV01rv_10_u:148: RV_10.010.08.1{07} na tiṣṭhanti na ni miṣantyete devānāṃ spaśa iha yecaranti
GV01rv_10_u:149: RV_10.010.08.2{07} anyena madāhano yāhi tuyaṃ tena vi vṛha rathyevacakrā
GV01rv_10_u:151: RV_10.010.09.2{07} divā pṛthivyā mithunā sabandhū yamīryamasyabibhṛyādajāmi
GV01rv_10_u:152: RV_10.010.10.1{07} ā ghā tā gachānuttarā yugāni yatra jāmayaḥ kṛṇavannajāmi
GV01rv_10_u:153: RV_10.010.10.2{07} upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhumanyamichasva subhagepatiṃ mat
GV01rv_10_u:154: RV_10.010.11.1{08} kiṃ bhratāsad yadanāthaṃ bhavāti kimu svasā yan nir{ṛ}tirnigachat
GV01rv_10_u:155: RV_10.010.11.2{08} kāmamūtā bahvetad rapāmi tanvā me tanvaṃ sampipṛgdhi
GV01rv_10_u:156: RV_10.010.12.1{08} na vā u te tanvā tanvaṃ saṃ papṛcyāṃ pāpamāhuryaḥsvasāraṃ nigachāt
GV01rv_10_u:157: RV_10.010.12.2{08} anyena mat pramudaḥ kalpayasva na tebhrāta subhage vaṣṭyetat
GV01rv_10_u:158: RV_10.010.13.1{08} bato batasi yama naiva te mano hṛdayaṃ cāvidāma
GV01rv_10_u:159: RV_10.010.13.2{08} anyā kilatvāṃ kakṣyeva yuktaṃ pari ṣvajāte libujeva vṛkṣam
GV01rv_10_u:160: RV_10.010.14.1{08} anyamū ṣu tvaṃ yamyanya u tvāṃ pari ṣvajāte libujevavṛkṣam
GV01rv_10_u:161: RV_10.010.14.2{08} tasya vā tvaṃ mana ichā sa vā tavādhā kṛṇuṣvasaṃvidaṃ subhadrām
GV01rv_10_u:162: RV_10.011.01.1{09} vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ payāṃsi yahvo aditeradābhyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:163: RV_10.011.01.2{09} viśvaṃ sa veda varuṇo yathā dhiyā sayajñiyo yajatu yajñiyān ṛtūn
GV01rv_10_u:164: RV_10.011.02.1{09} rapad gandharvīrapyā ca yoṣaṇā nadasya nāde pari pātume manaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:165: RV_10.011.02.2{09} iṣṭasya madhye aditirni dhātu no bhrātā nojyeṣṭhaḥ prathamo vi vocati
GV01rv_10_u:166: RV_10.011.03.1{09} so cin nu bhadrā kṣumatī yaśasvatyuṣā uvāsa manavesvarvatī
GV01rv_10_u:168: RV_10.011.04.1{09} adha tyaṃ drapsaṃ vibhvaṃ vicakṣaṇaṃ virābharadiṣitaḥ śyeno adhvare

GV01rv_10_u:197: RV_10.013.01.1{13} yuje vāṃ brahma pūrvyaṃ namobhirvi śloka etu pathyevasūreḥ

GV01rv_10_u:207: RV_10.014.01.1{14} pareyivāṃsaṃ pravato mahīranu bahubhyaḥ panthāmanupaspaśanam

GV01rv_10_u:217: RV_10.014.06.1{15} aṅgiraso naḥ pitaro navagvā atharvāṇo bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ

GV01rv_10_u:221: RV_10.014.08.1{15} saṃ gachasva pitṛbhiḥ saṃ yameneṣṭāpūrtena paramevyoman

GV01rv_10_u:239: RV_10.015.01.1{17} udīratāmavara ut parāsa un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥsomyāsaḥ

GV01rv_10_u:249: RV_10.015.06.1{18} ācyā jānu dakṣiṇato niṣadyemaṃ yajñamabhi gṛṇītaviśve

GV01rv_10_u:259: RV_10.015.11.1{19} agniṣvāttāḥ pitara eha gachata sadaḥ-sadaḥ sadatasupraṇītayaḥ

GV01rv_10_u:265: RV_10.015.14.1{19} ye agnidagdhā ye anagnidagdhā madhye divaḥ svadhayāmādayante
GV01rv_10_u:266: RV_10.015.14.2{19} tebhiḥ svarāḷ asunītimetāṃ yathāvaśantanvaṃ kalpayasva
GV01rv_10_u:267: RV_10.016.01.1{20} mainamagne vi daho mābhi śoco māsya tvacaṃ cikṣipo māśarīram
