GV01rv_10_u:278: RV_10.016.06.1{21} yat te kṛṣṇaḥ śakuna ātutoda pipīlaḥ sarpa uta vāśvāpadaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:279: RV_10.016.06.2{21} agniṣ ṭad viśvādagadaṃ kṛṇotu somaśca yobrāhmaṇānāviveśa
GV01rv_10_u:280: RV_10.016.07.1{21} agnervarma pari gobhirvyayasva saṃ prorṇuṣva pīvasāmedasā ca
GV01rv_10_u:281: RV_10.016.07.2{21} net tvā dhṛṣṇurharasā jarhṛṣāṇo dadhṛgvidhakṣyan paryaṅkhayāte
GV01rv_10_u:282: RV_10.016.08.1{21} imamagne camasaṃ mā vi jihvaraḥ priyo devānāmutasomyānām
GV01rv_10_u:283: RV_10.016.08.2{21} eṣa yaścamaso devapānastasmin devā amṛtāmādayante
GV01rv_10_u:284: RV_10.016.09.1{21} kravyādamagniṃ pra hiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājño gachaturipravāhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:285: RV_10.016.09.2{21} ihaivāyamitaro jātavedā devebhyo havyaṃvahatu prajānan
GV01rv_10_u:286: RV_10.016.10.1{21} yo agniḥ kravyāt praviveśa vo gṛhamimaṃ paśyannitaraṃjātavedasam
GV01rv_10_u:287: RV_10.016.10.2{21} taṃ harāmi pitṛyajñāya devaṃ sa gharmaminvāt parame sadhasthe
GV01rv_10_u:288: RV_10.016.11.1{22} yo agniḥ kravyavāhanaḥ pitṝn yakṣad ṛtāvṛdhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:289: RV_10.016.11.2{22} preduhavyāni vocati devebhyaśca pitṛbhya ā
GV01rv_10_u:291: RV_10.016.12.2{22} uśannuśata ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave
GV01rv_10_u:292: RV_10.016.13.1{22} yaṃ tvamagne samadahastamu nirvāpayā punaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:295: RV_10.016.14.2{22} maṇḍūkyā susaṃ gama imaṃ svagniṃ harṣaya
GV01rv_10_u:296: RV_10.017.01.1{23} tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatuṃ kṛṇotītīdaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃsameti
GV01rv_10_u:297: RV_10.017.01.2{23} yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā maho jāyā vivasvatonanāśa
GV01rv_10_u:299: RV_10.017.02.2{23} utāśvināvabharad yat tadasīdajahādu dvāmithunā saraṇyūḥ
GV01rv_10_u:300: RV_10.017.03.1{23} pūṣā tvetaścyāvayatu pra vidvānanaṣṭapaśurbhuvanasya gopāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:301: RV_10.017.03.2{23} sa tvaitebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyo 'gnirdevebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:302: RV_10.017.04.1{23} āyurviśvāyuḥ pari pāsati tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathepurastāt
GV01rv_10_u:303: RV_10.017.04.2{23} yatrasate sukṛto yatra te yayustatra tvādevaḥ savitā dadhātu
GV01rv_10_u:304: RV_10.017.05.1{23} pūṣemā āśā anu veda sarvāḥ so asmānabhayatamenaneṣat
GV01rv_10_u:305: RV_10.017.05.2{23} svastidā āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīro 'prayuchan pura etuprajānan
GV01rv_10_u:306: RV_10.017.06.1{24} prapathe pathamajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathepṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:307: RV_10.017.06.2{24} ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā cacarati prajānan
GV01rv_10_u:308: RV_10.017.07.1{24} sarasvatīṃ devayanto havante sarasvatīmadhvare tāyamāne
GV01rv_10_u:309: RV_10.017.07.2{24} sarasvatīṃ sukṛto ahvayanta sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryaṃ dāt
GV01rv_10_u:310: RV_10.017.08.1{24} sarasvati yā sarathaṃ yayatha svadhābhirdevi pitṛbhirmadantī
GV01rv_10_u:311: RV_10.017.08.2{24} āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayasvānamīvā iṣa ādhehyasme
GV01rv_10_u:312: RV_10.017.09.1{24} sarasvatīṃ yāṃ pitaro havante dakṣiṇā yajñamabhinakṣamāṇāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:313: RV_10.017.09.2{24} sahasrārghamiḷo atra bhāgaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhehi
GV01rv_10_u:314: RV_10.017.10.1{24} apo asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtapvaḥ punantu
GV01rv_10_u:315: RV_10.017.10.2{24} viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devirudidābhyaḥ śucirāpūta emi
GV01rv_10_u:316: RV_10.017.11.1{25} drapsaścaskanda prathamānanu dyūnimaṃ ca yonimanu yaśca purvaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:317: RV_10.017.11.2{25} samānaṃ yonimanu saṃcarantaṃ drapsaṃ juhomyanu sapta hotrāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:318: RV_10.017.12.1{25} yaste drapsa skandati yaste aṃśurbāhucyuto dhiṣaṇāyāupasthāt
GV01rv_10_u:319: RV_10.017.12.2{25} adhvaryorvā pari vā yaḥ pavitrāt taṃ te juhomimanasā vaṣaṭkṛtam
GV01rv_10_u:320: RV_10.017.13.1{25} yaste drapsa skanno yaste aṃśuravaśca yaḥ paraḥsrucā
GV01rv_10_u:321: RV_10.017.13.2{25} ayaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃ taṃ siñcatu rādhase
GV01rv_10_u:323: RV_10.017.14.2{25} apāmpayasvadit payastena mā saha śundhata
GV01rv_10_u:324: RV_10.018.01.1{26} paraṃ mṛtyo anu parehi panthāṃ yaste sva itaro devayānāt
GV01rv_10_u:325: RV_10.018.01.2{26} cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajāṃ rīriṣomota vīrān
GV01rv_10_u:326: RV_10.018.02.1{26} mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayanto yadaita drāghīya āyuḥ pratarandadhānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:327: RV_10.018.02.2{26} āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena śuddhāḥpūtā bhavata yajñiyāsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:328: RV_10.018.03.1{26} ime jīvā vi mṛtairāvavṛtrannabhūd bhadrā devahūtirnoadya
GV01rv_10_u:329: RV_10.018.03.2{26} prāñco agāma nṛtaye hasāya drāghīya āyuḥprataraṃ dadhānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:330: RV_10.018.04.1{26} imaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi maiṣāṃ nu gādaparoarthametam
GV01rv_10_u:331: RV_10.018.04.2{26} śataṃ jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīrantarmṛtyuṃ dadhatāṃ parvatena
GV01rv_10_u:332: RV_10.018.05.1{26} yathāhānyanupūrvaṃ bhavanti yatha ṛtava ṛtubhiryantisādhu
GV01rv_10_u:333: RV_10.018.05.2{26} yathā na pūrvamaparo jahātyevā dhātarāyūṃṣi kalpayaiṣām
GV01rv_10_u:334: RV_10.018.06.1{27} ā rohatāyurjarasaṃ vṛṇānā anupūrvaṃ yatamānā yatiṣṭha
GV01rv_10_u:335: RV_10.018.06.2{27} iha tvaṣṭā sujanimā sajoṣā dīrghamāyuḥkarati jīvase vaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:336: RV_10.018.07.1{27} imā nārīravidhavāḥ supatnīrāñjanena sarpiṣā saṃviśantu
GV01rv_10_u:337: RV_10.018.07.2{27} anaśravo 'namīvāḥ suratnā ā rohantu janayoyonimagre
GV01rv_10_u:338: RV_10.018.08.1{27} udīrṣva nāryabhi jīvalokaṃ gatāsumetamupa śeṣa ehi
GV01rv_10_u:341: RV_10.018.09.2{27} atraiva tvamiha vayaṃ suvīrā viśvā spṛdhoabhimātīrjayema
GV01rv_10_u:342: RV_10.018.10.1{27} upa sarpa mātaraṃ bhūmimetāmuruvyacasaṃ pṛthivīṃsuśevām
GV01rv_10_u:343: RV_10.018.10.2{27} ūrṇamradā yuvatirdakṣiṇāvata eṣā tvā pātunir{ṛ}terupasthāt
GV01rv_10_u:344: RV_10.018.11.1{28} ucchvañcasva pṛthivi mā ni bādhathāḥ sūpāyanāsmai bhavasūpavañcanā
GV01rv_10_u:345: RV_10.018.11.2{28} mātā putraṃ yathā sicābhyenaṃ bhūmaūrṇuhi
GV01rv_10_u:346: RV_10.018.12.1{28} ucchvañcamānā pṛthivī su tiṣṭhatu sahasraṃ mita upa hiśrayantām
GV01rv_10_u:347: RV_10.018.12.2{28} te gṛhāso ghṛtaścuto bhavantu viśvāhāsmaiśaraṇāḥ santvatra
GV01rv_10_u:348: RV_10.018.13.1{28} ut te stabhnāmi pṛthivīṃ tvat parīmaṃ logaṃ nidadhan moahaṃ riṣam
GV01rv_10_u:349: RV_10.018.13.2{28} etāṃ sthūṇāṃ pitaro dhārayantu te 'trāyamaḥ sādanā te minotu
GV01rv_10_u:351: RV_10.018.14.2{28} pratīcīṃ jagrabhā vācamaśvaṃ raśanayā yathā
GV01rv_10_u:352: RV_10.019.01.1{01} ni vartadhvaṃ mānu gātāsmān siṣakta revatīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:354: RV_10.019.02.1{01} punarenā ni vartaya punarenā nyā kuru
GV01rv_10_u:356: RV_10.019.03.1{01} punaretā ni vartantāmasmin puṣyantu gopatau
GV01rv_10_u:357: RV_10.019.03.2{01} ihaivāgneni dhārayeha tiṣṭhatu yā rayiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:358: RV_10.019.04.1{01} yan niyānaṃ nyayanaṃ saṃjñānaṃ yat parāyaṇam
GV01rv_10_u:359: RV_10.019.04.2{01} āvartanaṃ nivartanaṃ yo gopā api taṃ huve
GV01rv_10_u:360: RV_10.019.05.1{01} ya udānaḍ vyayanaṃ ya udānaṭ parāyaṇam
GV01rv_10_u:362: RV_10.019.06.1{01} ā nivarta ni vartaya punarna indra gā dehi
GV01rv_10_u:364: RV_10.019.07.1{01} pari vo viśvato dadha ūrjā ghṛtena payasā
GV01rv_10_u:365: RV_10.019.07.2{01} ye devāḥ keca yajñiyāste rayyā saṃ sṛjantu naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:366: RV_10.019.08.1{01} ā nivartana vartaya ni nivartana vartaya
GV01rv_10_u:368: RV_10.020.01.1{02} bhadraṃ no api vātaya manaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:369: RV_10.020.02.1{02} agnimīḷe bhujāṃ yaviṣṭhaṃ śāsā mitraṃ durdharītum
GV01rv_10_u:370: RV_10.020.02.2{02} yasya dharman svarenīḥ saparyanti māturūdhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:373: RV_10.020.04.1{02} aryo viśāṃ gātureti pra yadānaḍ divo antān
GV01rv_10_u:375: RV_10.020.05.1{02} juṣad dhavyā mānuṣasyordhvastasthāv ṛbhvā yajñe
GV01rv_10_u:377: RV_10.020.06.1{02} sa hi kṣemo haviryajñaḥ śruṣṭīdasya gātureti
GV01rv_10_u:379: RV_10.020.07.1{03} yajñāsāhaṃ duva iṣe 'gniṃ pūrvasya śevasya
GV01rv_10_u:381: RV_10.020.08.1{03} naro ye ke cāsmadā viśvet te vāma ā syuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:383: RV_10.020.09.1{03} kṛṣṇaḥ śveto 'ruṣo yāmo asya bradhna ṛjra uta śoṇoyaśasvān
GV01rv_10_u:385: RV_10.020.10.1{03} evā te agne vimado manīṣāmūrjo napādamṛtebhiḥsajoṣāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:386: RV_10.020.10.2{03} gira ā vakṣat sumatīriyāna iṣamūrjaṃsukṣitiṃ viśvamābhāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:387: RV_10.021.01.1{04} āgniṃ na svavṛktibhirhotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:388: RV_10.021.01.2{04} yajñāyastīrṇabarhiṣe vi vo made śīraṃ pāvakaśociṣaṃvivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:390: RV_10.021.02.2{04} veti tvāmupasecanī vi vo mada ṛjītiragna āhutirvivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:391: RV_10.021.03.1{04} tve dharmāṇa āsate juhūbhiḥ siñcatīriva
GV01rv_10_u:392: RV_10.021.03.2{04} kṛṣṇārūpāṇyarjunā vi vo made viśvā adhi śriyo dhiṣevivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:394: RV_10.021.04.2{04} tamā novājasātaye vi vo made yajñeṣu citramā bharā vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:395: RV_10.021.05.1{04} agnirjāto atharvaṇā vidad viśvāni kāvyā
GV01rv_10_u:396: RV_10.021.05.2{04} bhuvad dūtovivasvato vi vo made priyo yamasya kāmyo vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:398: RV_10.021.06.2{05} tvaṃ vasūnikāmyā vi vo made viśvā dadhāsi dāśuṣe vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:399: RV_10.021.07.1{05} tvāṃ yajñeṣv ṛtvijaṃ cārumagne ni ṣedire
GV01rv_10_u:400: RV_10.021.07.2{05} ghṛtapratīkaṃ manuṣo vi vo made śukraṃ cetiṣṭhamakṣabhirvivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:401: RV_10.021.08.1{05} agne śukreṇa śociṣoru prathayase bṛhat
GV01rv_10_u:402: RV_10.021.08.2{05} abhikrandanvṛṣāyase vi vo made garbhaṃ dadhāsi jāmiṣu vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:403: RV_10.022.01.1{06} kuha śruta indraḥ kasminnadya jane mitro na śruyate
GV01rv_10_u:404: RV_10.022.01.2{06} ṛṣīṇāṃ vā yaḥ kṣaye guhā va carkṛṣe gira
GV01rv_10_u:405: RV_10.022.02.1{06} iha śruta indro asme adya stave vajry ṛcīṣamaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:406: RV_10.022.02.2{06} mitro nayo janeṣvā yaśaścakre asāmyā
GV01rv_10_u:407: RV_10.022.03.1{06} maho yas patiḥ śavaso asāmyā maho nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:408: RV_10.022.03.2{06} bhartā vajrasya dhṛṣṇoḥ pitā putramiva priyam
GV01rv_10_u:409: RV_10.022.04.1{06} yujāno aśva vātasya dhunī devo devasya vajrivaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:411: RV_10.022.05.1{06} tvaṃ tyā cid vātasyāśvāgā ṛjrā tmanā vahadhyai
GV01rv_10_u:412: RV_10.022.05.2{06} yayordevo na martyo yantā nakirvidāyyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:413: RV_10.022.06.1{07} adha gmantośanā pṛchate vāṃ kadarthā na ā gṛham
GV01rv_10_u:414: RV_10.022.06.2{07} ājagmathuḥ parākād divaśca gmaśca martyam
GV01rv_10_u:415: RV_10.022.07.1{07} ā na indra pṛkṣase 'smākaṃ brahmodyatam
GV01rv_10_u:416: RV_10.022.07.2{07} tat tvāyācāmahe 'vaḥ śuṣṇaṃ yad dhannamānuṣam
GV01rv_10_u:417: RV_10.022.08.1{07} akarmā dasyurabhi no amanturanyavrato amānuṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:419: RV_10.022.09.1{07} tvaṃ na indra śūra śūrairuta tvotāso barhaṇā
GV01rv_10_u:420: RV_10.022.09.2{07} purutrāte vi pūrtayo navanta kṣoṇayo yathā
GV01rv_10_u:421: RV_10.022.10.1{07} tvaṃ tān vṛtrahatye codayo nṝn kārpāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:422: RV_10.022.10.2{07} guhā yadī kavīnāṃ viśāṃ nakṣatraśavasām
GV01rv_10_u:423: RV_10.022.11.1{08} makṣū tā ta indra dānāpnasa ākṣāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:424: RV_10.022.11.2{08} yad dha śuṣṇasya dambhayo jātaṃ viśvaṃ sayāvabhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:426: RV_10.022.12.2{08} vayaṃ-vayaṃ ta āsāṃ sumne syāma vajrivaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:427: RV_10.022.13.1{08} asme tā ta indra santu satyāhiṃsantīrupaspṛśaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:428: RV_10.022.13.2{08} vidyāmayāsāṃ bhujo dhenūnāṃ na vajrivaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:429: RV_10.022.14.1{08} ahastā yadapadī vardhata kṣāḥ śacībhirvedyānām
GV01rv_10_u:430: RV_10.022.14.2{08} śuṣṇaṃ pari pradakṣiṇid viśvāyave ni śiśnathaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:431: RV_10.022.15.1{08} pibā-pibedindra śūra somaṃ mā riṣaṇyo vasavāna vasuḥsan
GV01rv_10_u:432: RV_10.022.15.2{08} uta trāyasva gṛṇato maghono mahaśca rāyo revataskṛdhī naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:433: RV_10.023.01.1{09} yajāmaha indraṃ vajradakṣiṇaṃ harīṇāṃ rathyaṃvivratānām
GV01rv_10_u:434: RV_10.023.01.2{09} pra śmaśru dodhuvadūrdhvathā bhūd visenābhirdayamāno vi rādhasā
GV01rv_10_u:435: RV_10.023.02.1{09} harī nvasya yā vane vide vasvindro maghairmaghavāvṛtrahā bhuvat
GV01rv_10_u:436: RV_10.023.02.2{09} ṛbhurvāja ṛbhukṣāḥ patyate śavo 'vakṣṇaumi dāsasya nāma cit
GV01rv_10_u:437: RV_10.023.03.1{09} yadā vajraṃ hiraṇyamidathā rathaṃ harī yamasyavahato vi sūribhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:438: RV_10.023.03.2{09} ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sanaśruta indrovājasya dīrghaśravasas patiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:439: RV_10.023.04.1{09} so cin nu vṛṣṭiryūthyā svā sacānindraḥ śmaśrūṇiharitābhi pruṣṇute
GV01rv_10_u:440: RV_10.023.04.2{09} ava veti sukṣayaṃ sute madhūdiddhūnoti vāto yathā vanam
GV01rv_10_u:441: RV_10.023.05.1{09} yo vācā vivāco mṛdhravācaḥ purū sahasrāśivā jaghāna
GV01rv_10_u:442: RV_10.023.05.2{09} tat-tadidasya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasi piteva yastaviṣīṃvāvṛdhe śavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:443: RV_10.023.06.1{09} stomaṃ ta indra vimadā ajījanannapūrvyaṃ purutamaṃsudānave
GV01rv_10_u:444: RV_10.023.06.2{09} vidmā hyasya bhojanaminasya yadā paśuṃ nagopāḥ karāmahe
GV01rv_10_u:445: RV_10.023.07.1{09} mākirna enā sakhyā vi yauśustava cendra vimadasya caṛśeḥ
GV01rv_10_u:446: RV_10.023.07.2{09} vidmā hi te pramatiṃ deva jāmivadasme te santusakhyā śivāni
GV01rv_10_u:447: RV_10.024.01.1{10} indra somamimaṃ piba madhumantaṃ camū sutam
GV01rv_10_u:448: RV_10.024.01.2{10} asme rayiṃni dhāraya vi vo made sahasriṇaṃ purūvaso vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:450: RV_10.024.02.2{10} śacīpateśacīnāṃ vi vo made śreṣṭhaṃ no dhehi vāryaṃ vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:452: RV_10.024.03.2{10} indrastotṝṇāmavitā vi vo made dviṣo naḥ pāhyaṃhasovivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:453: RV_10.024.04.1{10} yuvaṃ śakrā māyāvinā samīcī nīramanthatam
GV01rv_10_u:457: RV_10.024.06.1{10} madhuman me parāyaṇaṃ madhumat punarayanam
GV01rv_10_u:458: RV_10.024.06.2{10} ta no devadevataya yuvaṃ madhumatas kṛtam
GV01rv_10_u:459: RV_10.025.01.1{11} bhadraṃ no api vātaya mano dakṣamuta kratum
GV01rv_10_u:460: RV_10.025.01.2{11} adhā tesakhye andhaso vi vo made raṇan gavo na yavase vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:461: RV_10.025.02.1{11} hṛdispṛśasta asate viśveṣu soma dha masu
GV01rv_10_u:462: RV_10.025.02.2{11} adhā kāmā imemama vi vo made vi tiṣṭhante vasūyavo vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:463: RV_10.025.03.1{11} uta vratani soma te prahaṃ mināmi pākyā
GV01rv_10_u:464: RV_10.025.03.2{11} adhā pitevasūnave vi vo made mṛḷa no abhi cid vadhād vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:465: RV_10.025.04.1{11} samu pra yanti dhītayaḥ sargāso 'vatāniva
GV01rv_10_u:466: RV_10.025.04.2{11} kratuṃ naḥsoma jivase vi vo made dharayā camasāniva vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:467: RV_10.025.05.1{11} tava tye soma śaktibhirnikāmāso vy ṛṇvire
GV01rv_10_u:468: RV_10.025.05.2{11} gṛtsasyadhirastavaso vi vo made vrajaṃ gomantamaśvinaṃ vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:469: RV_10.025.06.1{12} paśuṃ naḥ soma rakṣasi purutra viṣṭhitaṃ jagat
GV01rv_10_u:470: RV_10.025.06.2{12} samākṛṇoṣi jīvase vi vo made viśvā sampaśyan bhuvanavivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:471: RV_10.025.07.1{12} tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato gopa adabhyo bhava
GV01rv_10_u:472: RV_10.025.07.2{12} sedha rājannapasridho vi vo made ma no duḥ śaṃsa īśatā vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:473: RV_10.025.08.1{12} tvaṃ naḥ soma sukraturva yodheyāya jāgṛhi
GV01rv_10_u:474: RV_10.025.08.2{12} kṣetravittaromanuṣo vi vo made druho naḥ pāhyaṃhaso vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:475: RV_10.025.09.1{12} tvaṃ no vṛtra hantamendrasyendo śivaḥ sakhā
GV01rv_10_u:476: RV_10.025.09.2{12} yat siṃhavante samithe vi vo made yudhyamanastokasātauvivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:477: RV_10.025.10.1{12} ayaṃ gha sa turo mada indrasya vardhata priyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:478: RV_10.025.10.2{12} ayaṃkakṣīvato maho vi vo made matiṃ viprasya vardhayadvivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:479: RV_10.025.11.1{12} ayaṃ vipraya daśuṣe vajaniyarti gomataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:480: RV_10.025.11.2{12} ayaṃsaptabhya ā varaṃ vi vo made prandhaṃ śroṇaṃ catariṣad vivakṣase
GV01rv_10_u:481: RV_10.026.01.1{13} pra hyachā manīṣā spārha yanti niyutaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:482: RV_10.026.01.2{13} pra dasrāniyudrathaḥ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:483: RV_10.026.02.1{13} yasya tyan mahitvaṃ vatāpyamayaṃ janaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:485: RV_10.026.03.1{13} sa veda suṣṭutīnāmindurna pūṣa vṛṣā
GV01rv_10_u:486: RV_10.026.03.2{13} abhi psuraḥpruṣāyati vrajaṃ na ā pruṣāyati
GV01rv_10_u:487: RV_10.026.04.1{13} maṃsīmahi tvā vayamasmākaṃ deva pūṣan
GV01rv_10_u:490: RV_10.026.05.2{13} ṛṣiḥ sa yomanurhito viprasya yāvayatsakhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:491: RV_10.026.06.1{14} adhīṣamāṇāyāḥ patiḥ śucāyāśca śucasya ca
GV01rv_10_u:493: RV_10.026.07.1{14} ino vājānāṃ patirinaḥ puṣṭīnaṃ sakha
GV01rv_10_u:494: RV_10.026.07.2{14} pra śmaśruharyato dūdhod vi vṛtha yo adābhyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:495: RV_10.026.08.1{14} ā te rathasya pūṣannajā dhuraṃ vavṛtyuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:497: RV_10.026.09.1{14} asmakamurjā rathaṃ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:498: RV_10.026.09.2{14} bhuvadvajanāṃ vṛdha imaṃ naḥ śṛṇavad dhavam
GV01rv_10_u:499: RV_10.027.01.1{15} asat su me jaritaḥ sābhivego yat sunvate yajamanaya śikṣam
GV01rv_10_u:502: RV_10.027.02.2{15} amā te tumraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ pacāni tīvraṃsutaṃ pañcadaśaṃ ni ṣiñcam
GV01rv_10_u:503: RV_10.027.03.1{15} nāhaṃ taṃ veda ya iti bravītyadevayūn samaraṇejaghanvān
GV01rv_10_u:504: RV_10.027.03.2{15} yadāvākhyat samaraṇam ṛghāvadādid dha mevṛṣabhā pra bruvanti
GV01rv_10_u:505: RV_10.027.04.1{15} yadajñāteṣu vṛjaneṣvāsaṃ viśve sato maghavāno maāsan
GV01rv_10_u:506: RV_10.027.04.2{15} jināmi vet kṣema ā santamābhuṃ pra taṃkṣiṇāṃ parvate pādagṛhya
GV01rv_10_u:507: RV_10.027.05.1{15} na vā u māṃ vṛjane vārayante na parvatāso yadahammanasye
GV01rv_10_u:508: RV_10.027.05.2{15} mama svanāt kṛdhukarṇo bhayāta evedanu dyūnkiraṇaḥ samejāt
GV01rv_10_u:509: RV_10.027.06.1{16} darśan nvatra śṛtapānanindrān bāhukṣadaḥ śaravepatyamānān
GV01rv_10_u:510: RV_10.027.06.2{16} ghṛṣuṃ vā ye niniduḥ sakhāyamadhyū nveṣu pavayo vavṛtyuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:511: RV_10.027.07.1{16} abhūrvaukṣīrvyu āyurānaḍ darṣan nu pūrvo aparonu darṣat
GV01rv_10_u:512: RV_10.027.07.2{16} dve pavaste pari taṃ na bhūto yo asya pārerajaso viveṣa
GV01rv_10_u:513: RV_10.027.08.1{16} gāvo yavaṃ prayutā aryo akṣan tā apaśyaṃ sahagopāścarantīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:514: RV_10.027.08.2{16} havā idaryo abhitaḥ samāyan kiyadāsusvapatiśchandayāte
GV01rv_10_u:515: RV_10.027.09.1{16} saṃ yad vayaṃ yavasādo janānāmahaṃ yavāda urvajreantaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:517: RV_10.027.10.1{16} atredu me maṃsase satyamuktaṃ dvipācca yaccatuṣpātsaṃsṛjāni
GV01rv_10_u:518: RV_10.027.10.2{16} strībhiryo atra vṛṣaṇaṃ pṛtanyādayuddhoasya vi bhajāni vedaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:519: RV_10.027.11.1{17} yasyānakṣā duhitā jātvāsa kastāṃ vidvānabhimanyāte andhām
GV01rv_10_u:520: RV_10.027.11.2{17} kataro meniṃ prati taṃ mucāte ya īṃvahāte ya īṃ vā vareyāt
GV01rv_10_u:521: RV_10.027.12.1{17} kiyatī yoṣā maryato vadhūyoḥ pariprītā panyasāvāryeṇa
GV01rv_10_u:522: RV_10.027.12.2{17} bhadrā vadhūrbhavati yat supeśāḥ svayaṃ sāmitraṃ vanute jane cit
GV01rv_10_u:523: RV_10.027.13.1{17} patto jagāra pratyañcamatti śīrṣṇā śiraḥ prati dadhauvarūtham
GV01rv_10_u:524: RV_10.027.13.2{17} āsīna ūrdhvāmupasi kṣiṇāti nyaṃṃ uttānāmanveti bhūmim
GV01rv_10_u:525: RV_10.027.14.1{17} bṛhannachāyo apalāśo arvā tasthau mātā viṣito attigarbhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:526: RV_10.027.14.2{17} anyasyā vatsaṃ rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā nidadhe dhenurūdhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:527: RV_10.027.15.1{17} sapta vīrāso adharādudāyannaṣṭottarāttāt samajagmiran te
GV01rv_10_u:528: RV_10.027.15.2{17} nava paścātāt sthivimanta āyan daśa prāksānu vi tirantyaśnaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:529: RV_10.027.16.1{18} daśānāmekaṃ kapilaṃ samānaṃ taṃ hinvanti kratavepāryāya
GV01rv_10_u:530: RV_10.027.16.2{18} garbhaṃ mātā sudhitaṃ vakṣaṇāsvavenantantuṣayantī bibharti
GV01rv_10_u:531: RV_10.027.17.1{18} pīvānaṃ meṣamapacanta vīrā nyuptā akṣā anu dīvaāsan
GV01rv_10_u:532: RV_10.027.17.2{18} dvā dhanuṃ bṛhatīmapsvantaḥ pavitravantā carataḥpunantā
GV01rv_10_u:533: RV_10.027.18.1{18} vi krośanāso viṣvañca āyan pacāti nemo nahi pakṣadardhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:534: RV_10.027.18.2{18} ayaṃ me devaḥ savitā tadāha drvanna id vanavatsarpirannaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:536: RV_10.027.19.2{18} siṣaktyaryaḥ pra yugā janānāṃ sadyaḥśiśnā pramināno navīyān
GV01rv_10_u:537: RV_10.027.20.1{18} etau me gāvau pramarasya yuktau mo ṣu pra sedhīrmuhurinmamandhi
GV01rv_10_u:538: RV_10.027.20.2{18} āpaścidasya vi naśantyarthaṃ sūraśca markauparo babhūvān
GV01rv_10_u:539: RV_10.027.21.1{19} ayaṃ yo vajraḥ purudhā vivṛtto 'vaḥ sūryasya bṛhataḥpurīṣāt
GV01rv_10_u:540: RV_10.027.21.2{19} śrava idenā paro anyadasti tadavyathījarimāṇastaranti
GV01rv_10_u:541: RV_10.027.22.1{19} vṛkṣe-vṛkṣe niyatā mīmayad gaustato vayaḥ pra patānpuruṣādaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:542: RV_10.027.22.2{19} athedaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhayāta idrāyasunvad ṛṣaye ca śikṣat
GV01rv_10_u:543: RV_10.027.23.1{19} devānāṃ māne prathamā atiṣṭhan kṛntatradeṣamupara udāyan
GV01rv_10_u:544: RV_10.027.23.2{19} trayastapanti pṛthivimanūpa dva bṛbūkaṃ vahataḥpurīṣam
GV01rv_10_u:545: RV_10.027.24.1{19} sā te jīvāturuta tasya viddhi ma smaitādṛgapa gūhaḥsamarye
GV01rv_10_u:546: RV_10.027.24.2{19} aviḥ svaḥ kṛṇute gūhate busaṃ sa pādurasyanirṇijo na mucyate
GV01rv_10_u:547: RV_10.028.01.1{20} viśvo hyanyo arirājagāma mamedaha śvaśuro na jagāma
GV01rv_10_u:548: RV_10.028.01.2{20} jakṣīyād dhanā uta somaṃ papīyāt svāśitaḥ punarastaṃ jagāyāt
GV01rv_10_u:549: RV_10.028.02.1{20} sa roruvad vṛṣabhastigmaśṛngo varṣman tasthāu varimannāpṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:550: RV_10.028.02.2{20} viśveṣvenaṃ vṛjaneṣu pāmi yo me kukṣisutasomaḥ pṛṇāti
GV01rv_10_u:551: RV_10.028.03.1{20} adriṇā te mandina indra tūyān sunvanti somān pibasi tvameśām
GV01rv_10_u:552: RV_10.028.03.2{20} pacanti te vṛṣabhānatsi teṣāṃ pṛkṣeṇa yanmaghavan hūyamānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:553: RV_10.028.04.1{20} idaṃ su me jaritarā cikiddhi pratīpaṃ śāpaṃ nadyovahanti
GV01rv_10_u:554: RV_10.028.04.2{20} lopāśaḥ siṃhaṃ pratyañcamatsāḥ kroṣṭāvarāhaṃ niratakta kakṣāt
GV01rv_10_u:555: RV_10.028.05.1{20} katha ta etadahamā ciketaṃ gṛtsasya pākastavasomanīṣām
GV01rv_10_u:556: RV_10.028.05.2{20} tvaṃ no vidvān ṛtuthā vi voco yamardhaṃ temaghavan kṣemyā dhūḥ
GV01rv_10_u:557: RV_10.028.06.1{20} evā hi māṃ tavasaṃ vardhayanti divaścin me bṛhatauttarā dhuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:558: RV_10.028.06.2{20} purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi sākamaśatruṃhi ma janitā jajāna
GV01rv_10_u:559: RV_10.028.07.1{21} evā hi māṃ tavasaṃ jajñurugraṃ karman-karman vṛṣaṇamindra devāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:560: RV_10.028.07.2{21} vadhīṃ vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasano 'pa vrajammahinā dāśuṣe vam
GV01rv_10_u:561: RV_10.028.08.1{21} devāsa āyan paraśūnrabibhran vanā vṛścanto abhi viḍbhirāyan
GV01rv_10_u:562: RV_10.028.08.2{21} ni sudrvaṃ dadhato vakṣaṇāsu yatrā kṛpīṭamanutad dahanti
GV01rv_10_u:563: RV_10.028.09.1{21} śaśaḥ kṣuraṃ pratyañcaṃ jagārādriṃ logena vyabhedamārāt
GV01rv_10_u:564: RV_10.028.09.2{21} bṛhantaṃ cid ṛhate randhayāni vayad vatso vṛṣabhaṃśūśuvānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:565: RV_10.028.10.1{21} suparṇa itthā nakhamā siṣāyāvaruddhaḥ paripadaṃ nasiṃhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:566: RV_10.028.10.2{21} niruddhaścin mahiṣastarṣyāvān godhā tasmāayathaṃ karṣadetat
GV01rv_10_u:567: RV_10.028.11.1{21} tebhyo godhā ayathaṃ karṣadetad ye brahmaṇaḥ pratipiyantyannaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:568: RV_10.028.11.2{21} sima ukṣṇo 'vasṛṣṭānadanti svayaṃ balānitanvaḥ śṛṇānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:569: RV_10.028.12.1{21} ete śamībhiḥ suśamī abhūvan ye hinvire tanvaḥ somaukthaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:570: RV_10.028.12.2{21} nṛvad vadannupa no māhi vājān divi śravodadhiṣe nāma vīraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:571: RV_10.029.01.1{22} vane na vā yo nyadhāyi cākañchucirvāṃ stomo bhuraṇāvajīgaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:572: RV_10.029.01.2{22} yasyedindraḥ purudineṣu hotā nṛṇāṃ naryonṛtamaḥ kṣapāvān
GV01rv_10_u:573: RV_10.029.02.1{22} pra te asyā uṣasaḥ prāparasyā nṛtau syāma nṛtamasyanṛṇām
GV01rv_10_u:574: RV_10.029.02.2{22} anu triśokaḥ śatamāvahan nṝn kutsena ratho yoasat sasavān
GV01rv_10_u:575: RV_10.029.03.1{22} kaste mada indra rantyo bhūd duro giro abhyugro vi dhāva
GV01rv_10_u:576: RV_10.029.03.2{22} kad vāho arvāgupa mā manīṣā ā tvā śakyamupamaṃrādho annaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:577: RV_10.029.04.1{22} kadu dyumnamindra tvāvato nṝn kayā dhiyā karase kan naāgan
GV01rv_10_u:578: RV_10.029.04.2{22} mitro na satya urugāya bhṛtyā anne samasya yadasanmanīṣāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:579: RV_10.029.05.1{22} preraya sūro arthaṃ na pāraṃ ye asya kāmaṃ janidhā ivagman
GV01rv_10_u:580: RV_10.029.05.2{22} giraśca ye te tuvijāta pūrvīrnara indrapratiśikṣantyannaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:581: RV_10.029.06.1{23} mātre nu te sumite indra pūrvī dyaurmajmanā pṛthivīkāvyena
GV01rv_10_u:582: RV_10.029.06.2{23} varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ svādman bhavantupītaye madhūni
GV01rv_10_u:583: RV_10.029.07.1{23} ā madhvo asmā asicannamatramindrāya pūrṇaṃ sa hisatyarādhāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:584: RV_10.029.07.2{23} sa vāvṛdhe varimannā pṛthivyā abhi kratvānaryaḥ pauṃsyaiśca
GV01rv_10_u:585: RV_10.029.08.1{23} vyānaḷ indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojā āsmai yatante sakhyāyapūrvīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:586: RV_10.029.08.2{23} ā smā rathaṃ na pṛtanāsu tiṣṭha yaṃ bhadrayāsumatyā codayāse
GV01rv_10_u:587: RV_10.030.01.1{24} pra devatrā brāhmaṇe gāturetvapo achā manaso naprayukti
GV01rv_10_u:588: RV_10.030.01.2{24} mahīṃ mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsiṃ pṛthujrayaserīradhā suvṛktim
GV01rv_10_u:589: RV_10.030.02.1{24} adhvaryavo haviṣmanto hi bhūtāchāpa itośatīruśantaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:590: RV_10.030.02.2{24} ava yāścaṣṭe aruṇaḥ suparṇastamāsyadhvamūrmimadyā suhastāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:591: RV_10.030.03.1{24} adhvaryavo 'pa itā samudramapāṃ napātaṃ haviṣā yajadhvam
GV01rv_10_u:592: RV_10.030.03.2{24} sa vo dadadūrmimadyā supūtaṃ tasmai somaṃ madhumantaṃsunota
GV01rv_10_u:593: RV_10.030.04.1{24} yo anidhmo dīdayadapsvantaryaṃ viprāsa īḷateadhvareṣu
GV01rv_10_u:594: RV_10.030.04.2{24} apāṃ napān madhumatīrapo dā yābhirindrovāvṛdhe vīryāya
GV01rv_10_u:595: RV_10.030.05.1{24} yābhiḥ somo modate harṣate ca kalyāṇībhiryuvatibhirnamaryaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:596: RV_10.030.05.2{24} tā adhvaryo apo achā parehi yadāsiñcāoṣadhībhiḥ punītāt
GV01rv_10_u:597: RV_10.030.06.1{25} eved yūne yuvatayo namanta yadīmuśannuśatīretyacha
GV01rv_10_u:598: RV_10.030.06.2{25} saṃ jānate manasā saṃ cikitre 'dhvaryavo dhiṣaṇāpaścadevīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:599: RV_10.030.07.1{25} yo vo vṛtābhyo akṛṇodu lokaṃ yo vo mahyā abhiśasteramuñcat
GV01rv_10_u:600: RV_10.030.07.2{25} tasmā indrāya madhumantamūrmiṃ devamādanampra hiṇotanāpaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:601: RV_10.030.08.1{25} prāsmai hinota madhumantamūrmiṃ garbho yo vaḥ sindhavomadhva utsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:603: RV_10.030.09.1{25} taṃ sindhavo matsaramindrapānamūrmiṃ pra heta ya ubheiyarti
GV01rv_10_u:605: RV_10.030.10.1{25} āvarvṛtatīradha nu dvidhārā goṣuyudho na niyavaṃcarantīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:606: RV_10.030.10.2{25} ṛṣe janitrīrbhuvanasya patnīrapo vandasvasavṛdhaḥ sayonīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:607: RV_10.030.11.1{26} hinotā no adhvaraṃ devayajyā hinota brahma sanayedhanānām
GV01rv_10_u:608: RV_10.030.11.2{26} ṛtasya yoge vi śyadhvamūdhaḥ śruṣṭīvarīrbhūtanāsmabhyamāpaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:609: RV_10.030.12.1{26} āpo revatīḥ kṣayathā hi vasvaḥ kratuṃ ca bhadrambibhṛthāmṛtaṃ ca
GV01rv_10_u:610: RV_10.030.12.2{26} rāyaśca stha svapatyasya patnīḥsarasvatī tad gṛṇate vayo dhāt
GV01rv_10_u:611: RV_10.030.13.1{26} prati yadāpo adṛśramāyatīrghṛtaṃ payāṃsi bibhratīrmadhūni
GV01rv_10_u:612: RV_10.030.13.2{26} adhvaryubhirmanasā saṃvidānā indrāya somaṃsuṣutaṃ bharantīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:613: RV_10.030.14.1{26} emā agman revatīrjīvadhanyā adhvaryavaḥ sādayatāsakhāyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:614: RV_10.030.14.2{26} ni barhiṣi dhattana somyāso 'pāṃ naptrāsaṃvidānāsa enāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:616: RV_10.030.15.2{26} adhvaryavaḥ sunutendrāya somamabhūdu vaḥsuśakā devayajyā
GV01rv_10_u:617: RV_10.031.01.1{27} ā no devānāmupa vetu śaṃso viśvebhisturairavaseyajatraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:618: RV_10.031.01.2{27} tebhirvayaṃ suṣakhāyo bhavema taranto viśvāduritā syāma
GV01rv_10_u:619: RV_10.031.02.1{27} pari cin marto draviṇaṃ mamanyād ṛtasya pathā namasāvivāset
GV01rv_10_u:620: RV_10.031.02.2{27} ata svena kratunā saṃ vadeta śreyāṃsandakṣaṃ manasā jagṛbhyāt
GV01rv_10_u:624: RV_10.031.04.1{27} nityaścākanyāt svapatirdāmūnā yasmā u devaḥ savitajajāna
GV01rv_10_u:625: RV_10.031.04.2{27} bhago vā gobhiraryamemanajyāt so asmai caruśchadayaduta syāt
GV01rv_10_u:626: RV_10.031.05.1{27} iyaṃ sā bhūyā uṣasāmiva kṣa yad dha kṣumantaḥśavasā samāyan
GV01rv_10_u:627: RV_10.031.05.2{27} asya stutiṃ jariturbhikṣamāṇā ānaḥ śagmāsa upa yantu vājāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:628: RV_10.031.06.1{28} asyedeṣā sumatiḥ paprathānābhavat pūrvyā bhumanāgauḥ
GV01rv_10_u:629: RV_10.031.06.2{28} asya sanīḷā asurasya yonau samāna ā bharaṇebibhramāṇāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:630: RV_10.031.07.1{28} kiṃ svid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsa yato dyāvāpṛthivīniṣṭatakṣuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:631: RV_10.031.07.2{28} santasthāne ajare itaūtī ahāni pūrvīruṣaso jaranta
GV01rv_10_u:632: RV_10.031.08.1{28} naitāvadenā paro anyadastyukṣā sa dyāvāpṛthivībibharti
GV01rv_10_u:633: RV_10.031.08.2{28} tvadaṃ pavitraṃ kṛṇuta svadhāvān yadīṃsūryaṃ na harito vahanti
GV01rv_10_u:634: RV_10.031.09.1{28} stego na kṣāmatyeti pṛthvīṃ mihaṃ na vāto vi havāti bhūma
GV01rv_10_u:635: RV_10.031.09.2{28} mitro yatra varuṇo ajyamāno 'gnirvane na vyasṛṣṭa śokam
GV01rv_10_u:636: RV_10.031.10.1{28} starīryat sūta sadyo ajyamānā vyathiravyathiḥ kṛṇutasvagopā
GV01rv_10_u:637: RV_10.031.10.2{28} putro yat purvaḥ pitrorjaniṣṭa śamyāṃ gaurjagāra yad dha pṛchān
GV01rv_10_u:638: RV_10.031.11.1{28} uta kaṇvaṃ nṛṣadaḥ putramāhuruta śyāvo dhanamādattavāji
GV01rv_10_u:639: RV_10.031.11.2{28} pra kṛṣṇāya ruśadapinvatodhar{ṛ}tamatra nakirasmā apīpet
GV01rv_10_u:640: RV_10.032.01.1{29} pra su gmantā dhiyasānasya sakṣaṇi varebhirvarānabhiṣu prasīdataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:641: RV_10.032.01.2{29} asmākamindra ubhayaṃ jujoṣati yatsomyasyāndhaso bubodhati
GV01rv_10_u:642: RV_10.032.02.1{29} vīndra yāsi divyāni rocanā vi pārthivāni rajasāpuruṣṭuta
GV01rv_10_u:643: RV_10.032.02.2{29} ye tvā vahanti muhuradhvarānupa te suvanvantu vagyanānarādhasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:644: RV_10.032.03.1{29} tadin me chantsat vapuṣo vapuṣṭaraṃ putro yajjānampitroradhīyati
GV01rv_10_u:645: RV_10.032.03.2{29} jāyā patiṃ vahati vagnunā sumat puṃsaid bhadro vahatuḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:646: RV_10.032.04.1{29} tadit sadhasthamabhi cāru dīdhaya gāvo yacchāsanvahatuṃ na dhenavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:647: RV_10.032.04.2{29} mātā yan manturyūthasyapūrvyābhi vāṇasya saptadhāturijjanaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:648: RV_10.032.05.1{29} pra vo 'chā ririce devayuṣ padameko rudrebhiryātiturvaṇiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:649: RV_10.032.05.2{29} jarā vā yeṣvamṛteṣu dāvane pari vaūmebhyaḥ siñcatā madhu
GV01rv_10_u:650: RV_10.032.06.1{30} nidhīyamānamapagūḷamapsu pra me devānāṃ vratapāuvāca
GV01rv_10_u:651: RV_10.032.06.2{30} indro vidvānanu hi tvā cacakṣa tenāhamagneanuśiṣṭa āgām
GV01rv_10_u:652: RV_10.032.07.1{30} akṣetravit kṣetravidaṃ hyaprāṭ sa praitikṣetravidānuśiṣṭaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:655: RV_10.032.08.2{30} emenamāpa jarimā yuvānamaheḷan vasuḥ sumanābabhūva
GV01rv_10_u:656: RV_10.032.09.1{30} etāni bhadrā kalaśa kriyāma kuruśravaṇa dadato maghāni
GV01rv_10_u:657: RV_10.032.09.2{30} dāna id vo maghavānaḥ so astvayaṃ ca somo hṛdi yambibharmi
GV01rv_10_u:658: RV_10.033.01.1{01} pra mā yuyujre prayujo janānāṃ vahāmi sma puṣaṇamantareṇa
GV01rv_10_u:659: RV_10.033.01.2{01} viśve devāso adha māmarakṣan duḥśāsurāgāditi ghoṣa āsīt
GV01rv_10_u:660: RV_10.033.02.1{01} saṃ mā tapantyabhitaḥ sapatnīriva parśavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:661: RV_10.033.02.2{01} ni bādhateamatirnagnatā jasurverna vevīyate matiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:662: RV_10.033.03.1{01} mūṣo na śiśnā vyadanti mādhya stotāraṃ te śatakrato
GV01rv_10_u:663: RV_10.033.03.2{01} sakṛt su no maghavannindra mṛḷayādhā piteva no bhava
GV01rv_10_u:666: RV_10.033.05.1{01} yasya mā harito rathe tisro vahanti sādhuyā
GV01rv_10_u:668: RV_10.033.06.1{02} yasya prasvādaso gira upamaśravasaḥ pituḥ
GV01rv_10_u:674: RV_10.033.09.1{02} na devānāmati vrataṃ śatātmā cana jīvati
GV01rv_10_u:676: RV_10.034.01.1{03} prāvepā mā bṛhato mādayanti pravātejā iriṇe varvṛtānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:677: RV_10.034.01.2{03} somasyeva maujavatasya bhakṣo vibhīdako jāgṛvirmahyamachān
GV01rv_10_u:678: RV_10.034.02.1{03} na mā mimetha na jihīḷa eṣā śivā sakhibhya uta mahyamāsīt
GV01rv_10_u:680: RV_10.034.03.1{03} dveṣṭi śvaśrūrapa jāyā ruṇaddhi na nāthito vindatemarḍitāram
GV01rv_10_u:681: RV_10.034.03.2{03} aśvasyeva jarato vasnyasya nāhaṃ vindāmikitavasya bhogam
GV01rv_10_u:682: RV_10.034.04.1{03} anye jāyāṃ pari mṛśantyasya yasyāgṛdhad vedane vājyakṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:683: RV_10.034.04.2{03} pitā matā bhrātara enamāhurna jānīmo nayatābaddhametam
GV01rv_10_u:684: RV_10.034.05.1{03} yadādīdhye na daviṣāṇyebhiḥ parāyadbhyo 'va hīyesakhibhyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:685: RV_10.034.05.2{03} nyuptāśca babhravo vācamakratanemīdeṣāṃ niṣkṛtaṃ jāriṇīva
GV01rv_10_u:686: RV_10.034.06.1{04} sabhāmeti kitavaḥ pṛchamāno jeṣyāmīti tanvāśūśujānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:687: RV_10.034.06.2{04} akṣāso asya vi tiranti kāmaṃ pratidīvnedadhata ā kṛtāni
GV01rv_10_u:690: RV_10.034.07.2{04} kumāradeṣṇā jayataḥ punarhaṇo madhvāsampṛktāḥ kitavasya barhaṇā
GV01rv_10_u:691: RV_10.034.08.1{04} tripañcāśaḥ krīḷati vrāta eṣāṃ deva iva savitāsatyadharmā
GV01rv_10_u:692: RV_10.034.08.2{04} ugrasya cin manyave nā namante rājā cidebhyonama it kṛṇoti
GV01rv_10_u:693: RV_10.034.09.1{04} nīcā vartanta upari sphurantyahastāso hastavantaṃ sahante
GV01rv_10_u:694: RV_10.034.09.2{04} divyā aṅgārā iriṇe nyuptāḥ śītāḥ santo hṛdayaṃnirdahanti
GV01rv_10_u:695: RV_10.034.10.1{04} jāyā tapyate kitavasya hīnā mātā putrasya carataḥ kvasvit
GV01rv_10_u:697: RV_10.034.11.1{05} striyaṃ dṛṣṭvāya kitavaṃ tatāpānyeṣāṃ jāyāṃsukṛtaṃ ca yonim
GV01rv_10_u:698: RV_10.034.11.2{05} pūrvāhṇe aśvān yuyuje hi babhrūn soagnerante vṛṣalaḥ papāda
GV01rv_10_u:699: RV_10.034.12.1{05} yo vaḥ senānīrmahato gaṇasya rājā vrātasya prathamobabhūva
GV01rv_10_u:700: RV_10.034.12.2{05} tasmai kṛṇomi na dhanā ruṇadhmi daśāhamprācīstad ṛtaṃ vadāmi
GV01rv_10_u:701: RV_10.034.13.1{05} akṣairmā dīvyaḥ kṛṣimit kṛṣasva vitte ramasva bahumanyamānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:702: RV_10.034.13.2{05} tatra gāvaḥ kitava tatra jāyā tan me vicaṣṭe savitāyamaryaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:703: RV_10.034.14.1{05} mitraṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ khalu mṛlatā no mā no ghoreṇa caratābhidhṛṣṇu
GV01rv_10_u:704: RV_10.034.14.2{05} ni vo nu manyurviśatāmarātiranyo babhrūṇāmprasitau nvastu
GV01rv_10_u:705: RV_10.035.01.1{06} abudhramu tya indravanto agnayo jyotirbharanta uṣasovyuṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_10_u:706: RV_10.035.01.2{06} mahī dyāvāpṛthivī cetatāmapo 'dyādevānāmava ā vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:707: RV_10.035.02.1{06} divaspṛthivyorava ā vṛṇīmahe mātṝn sindhūn parvatāñcharyaṇāvataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:708: RV_10.035.02.2{06} anāgāstvaṃ sūryamuṣāsamīmahe bhadraṃsomaḥ suvāno adyā kṛṇotu naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:709: RV_10.035.03.1{06} dyāvā no adya pṛthivī anāgaso mahī trāyetāṃ suvitāyamātarā
GV01rv_10_u:711: RV_10.035.04.1{06} iyaṃ na usrā prathamā sudevyaṃ revat sanibhyo revatī vyuchatu
GV01rv_10_u:712: RV_10.035.04.2{06} āre manyuṃ durvidatrasya dhīmahi svastyagniṃsamidhānamīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:713: RV_10.035.05.1{06} pra yāḥ sisrate sūryasya raśmibhirjyotirbharantīruṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_10_u:714: RV_10.035.05.2{06} bhadrā no adya śravase vyuchata svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:715: RV_10.035.06.1{07} anamīvā uṣasa ā carantu na udagnayo jihatāṃ jyotiṣābṛhat
GV01rv_10_u:717: RV_10.035.07.1{07} śreṣṭhaṃ no adya savitarvareṇyaṃ bhāgamā suva sa hiratnadhā asi
GV01rv_10_u:718: RV_10.035.07.2{07} rāyo janitrīṃ dhiṣaṇāmupa bruve svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:719: RV_10.035.08.1{07} pipartu mā tad ṛtasya pravācanaṃ devānāṃ yan manuṣyāamanmahi
GV01rv_10_u:720: RV_10.035.08.2{07} viśvā idusrā spaḷ udeti sūryaḥ svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:721: RV_10.035.09.1{07} adveṣo adya barhiṣa starīmaṇi grāvṇāṃ yoge manmanaḥsādha īmahe
GV01rv_10_u:722: RV_10.035.09.2{07} ādityānāṃ śarmaṇi sthā bhuraṇyasi svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:723: RV_10.035.10.1{07} ā no barhiḥ sadhamāde bṛhad divi devānīḷe sādayāsapta hotṝn
GV01rv_10_u:724: RV_10.035.10.2{07} indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sātaye bhagaṃ svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:725: RV_10.035.11.1{08} ta ādityā ā gatā sarvatātaye vṛdhe no yajñamavatāsajoṣasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:726: RV_10.035.11.2{08} bṛhaspatiṃ pūṣaṇamaśvinā bhagaṃ svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:727: RV_10.035.12.1{08} tan no devā yachata supravācanaṃ chardirādityāḥ subharaṃnṛpāyyam
GV01rv_10_u:728: RV_10.035.12.2{08} paśve tokāya tanayāya jīvase svastyagniṃsamidhānamīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:729: RV_10.035.13.1{08} viśve adya maruto viśva ūtī viśve bhavantvagnayaḥsamiddhāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:730: RV_10.035.13.2{08} viśve no devā avasā gamantu viśvamastudraviṇaṃ vājo asme
GV01rv_10_u:731: RV_10.035.14.1{08} yaṃ devāso 'vatha vājasātau yaṃ trāyadhve yaṃ pipṛthātyaṃhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:732: RV_10.035.14.2{08} yo vo gopīthe na bhayasya veda te syāmadevavītaye turāsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:733: RV_10.036.01.1{09} uṣāsānaktā bṛhatī supeśasā dyāvākṣāmā varuṇomitro aryamā
GV01rv_10_u:734: RV_10.036.01.2{09} indraṃ huve marutaḥ parvatānapa ādityāndyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:735: RV_10.036.02.1{09} dyauśca naḥ pṛthivī ca pracetasa ṛtāvarī rakṣatāmaṃhasoriṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:736: RV_10.036.02.2{09} mā durvidatrā nir{ṛ}tirna īśata tad devānāmavoadyā vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:737: RV_10.036.03.1{09} viśvasmān no aditiḥ pātvaṃhaso mātā mitrasya varuṇasyarevataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:739: RV_10.036.04.1{09} grāvā vadannapa rakṣāṃsi sedhatu duṣvapnyaṃ nir{ṛ}tiṃviśvamatriṇam
GV01rv_10_u:741: RV_10.036.05.1{09} endro barhiḥ sīdatu pinvatāmiḷā bṛhaspatiḥ sāmabhir{ṛ}kvo arcatu
GV01rv_10_u:742: RV_10.036.05.2{09} supraketaṃ jīvase manma dhīmahi taddevānāṃ ...
GV01rv_10_u:745: RV_10.036.07.1{10} upa hvaye suhavaṃ mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ pāvakam ṛṣvaṃ sakhyāyaśambhuvam
GV01rv_10_u:746: RV_10.036.07.2{10} rāyas poṣaṃ sauśravasāya dhīmahi taddevānāṃ ...
GV01rv_10_u:747: RV_10.036.08.1{10} apāṃ peruṃ jīvadhanyaṃ bharāmahe devāvyaṃ suhavamadhvaraśriyam
GV01rv_10_u:749: RV_10.036.09.1{10} sanema tat susanitā sanitvabhirvayaṃ jīvā jīvaputrāanāgasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:751: RV_10.036.10.1{10} ye sthā manoryajñiyāste śṛṇotana yad vo devā īmahetad dadātana
GV01rv_10_u:752: RV_10.036.10.2{10} jaitraṃ kratuṃ rayimad vīravad yaśastaddevānāṃ ...
GV01rv_10_u:753: RV_10.036.11.1{11} mahadadya mahatāmā vṛṇīmahe 'vo devānāṃ bṛhatāmanarvaṇām
GV01rv_10_u:754: RV_10.036.11.2{11} yathā vasu vīrajātaṃ naśāmahai taddevānāṃ ...
GV01rv_10_u:755: RV_10.036.12.1{11} maho agneḥ samidhānasya śarmaṇyanāgā mitre varuṇesvastaye
GV01rv_10_u:756: RV_10.036.12.2{11} śreṣṭhe syāma savituḥ savīmani taddevānāṃ ...
GV01rv_10_u:757: RV_10.036.13.1{11} ye savituḥ satyasavasya viśve mitrasya vrate varuṇasyadevāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:758: RV_10.036.13.2{11} te saubhagaṃ vīravad gomadapno dadhātanadraviṇaṃ citramasme
GV01rv_10_u:759: RV_10.036.14.1{11} savitā paścātāt savitā purastāt savitottarāttātsavitādharāttāt
GV01rv_10_u:760: RV_10.036.14.2{11} savitā naḥ suvatu sarvatātiṃ savitā norāsatāṃ dīrghamayuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:761: RV_10.037.01.1{12} namo mitrasya varuṇasya cakṣase maho devāya tad ṛtaṃsaparyata
GV01rv_10_u:762: RV_10.037.01.2{12} dūredṛśe devajātāya ketave divas putrāyasūryāya śaṃsata
GV01rv_10_u:763: RV_10.037.02.1{12} sā mā satyoktiḥ pari pātu viśvato dyāvā ca yatratatanannahāni ca
GV01rv_10_u:764: RV_10.037.02.2{12} viśvamanyan ni viśate yadejativiśvāhāpo viśvāhodeti sūryaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:765: RV_10.037.03.1{12} na te adevaḥ pradivo ni vāsate yadetaśebhiḥ patarairatharyasi
GV01rv_10_u:766: RV_10.037.03.2{12} prācīnamanyadanu vartate raja udanyenajyotiṣā yāsi sūrya
GV01rv_10_u:767: RV_10.037.04.1{12} yena sūrya jyotiṣā bādhase tamo jagacca viśvamudiyarṣibhānunā
GV01rv_10_u:769: RV_10.037.05.1{12} viśvasya hi preṣito rakṣasi vratamaheḷayannuccarasisvadhā anu
GV01rv_10_u:770: RV_10.037.05.2{12} yadadya tvā sūryopabravāmahai taṃ no devāanu maṃsīrata kratum
GV01rv_10_u:771: RV_10.037.06.1{12} taṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī tan na āpa indraḥ śṛṇvantu marutohavaṃ vacaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:772: RV_10.037.06.2{12} mā śūne bhūma sūryasya sandṛśibhadraṃ jīvanto jaraṇāmaśīmahi
GV01rv_10_u:773: RV_10.037.07.1{13} viśvāhā tvā sumanasaḥ sucakṣasaḥ prajāvanto anamīvāanāgasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:774: RV_10.037.07.2{13} udyantaṃ tvā mitramaho dive-dive jyog jīvāḥprati paśyema sūrya
GV01rv_10_u:775: RV_10.037.08.1{13} mahi jyotirbibhrataṃ tvā vicakṣaṇa bhāsvantaṃ cakṣuṣe cakṣuṣe mayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:776: RV_10.037.08.2{13} ārohantaṃ bṛhataḥ pājasas pari vayaṃjīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya
GV01rv_10_u:777: RV_10.037.09.1{13} yasya te viśvā bhuvanāni ketunā pra cerate ni ca viśanteaktubhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:779: RV_10.037.10.1{13} śaṃ no bhava cakṣasā śaṃ no ahnā śaṃ bhānunā śaṃhimā śaṃ ghṛṇena
GV01rv_10_u:780: RV_10.037.10.2{13} yathā śamadhvañchamasad duroṇetat sūrya draviṇaṃ dhehi citram
GV01rv_10_u:781: RV_10.037.11.1{13} asmākaṃ devā ubhayāya janmane śarma yachata dvipadecatuṣpade
GV01rv_10_u:782: RV_10.037.11.2{13} adat pibadūrjayamānamāśitaṃ tadasmeśaṃ yorarapo dadhātana
GV01rv_10_u:783: RV_10.037.12.1{13} yad vo devāścakṛma jihvayā guru manaso vā prayutīdevaheḷanam
GV01rv_10_u:784: RV_10.037.12.2{13} arāvā yo no abhi duchunāyate tasmin tadenovasavo ni dhetana
GV01rv_10_u:785: RV_10.038.01.1{14} asmin na indra pṛtsutau yaśasvati śimīvati krandasi prāvasātaye
GV01rv_10_u:786: RV_10.038.01.2{14} yatra goṣātā dhṛṣiteṣu khādiṣu viṣvakpatanti didyavo nṛṣāhye
GV01rv_10_u:787: RV_10.038.02.1{14} sa naḥ kṣumantaṃ sadane vyūrṇuhi goarṇasaṃ rayimindraśravāyyam
GV01rv_10_u:788: RV_10.038.02.2{14} syāma te jayataḥ śakra medino yathā vayamuśmasi tad vaso kṛdhi
GV01rv_10_u:789: RV_10.038.03.1{14} yo no dāsa āryo vā puruṣṭutādeva indra yudhaye ciketati
GV01rv_10_u:790: RV_10.038.03.2{14} asmābhiṣ ṭe suṣahāḥ santu śatravastvayā vayaṃ tānvanuyāma saṃgame
GV01rv_10_u:791: RV_10.038.04.1{14} yo dabhrebhirhavyo yaśca bhūribhiryo abhīke varivovinnṛṣāhye
GV01rv_10_u:792: RV_10.038.04.2{14} taṃ vikhāde sasnimadya śrutaṃ naramarvāñcamindramavase karāmahe
GV01rv_10_u:793: RV_10.038.05.1{14} svavṛjaṃ hi tvāmahamindra śuśravānānudaṃ vṛṣabharadhracodanam
GV01rv_10_u:794: RV_10.038.05.2{14} pra muñcasva pari kutsādihā gahi kimutvāvān muṣkayorbaddha āsate
GV01rv_10_u:795: RV_10.039.01.1{15} yo vāṃ parijmā suvṛdaśvinā ratho doṣāmuṣāso havyohaviṣmatā
GV01rv_10_u:796: RV_10.039.01.2{15} śaśvattamāsastamu vāmidaṃ vayaṃ piturnanāma suhavaṃ havāmahe
GV01rv_10_u:797: RV_10.039.02.1{15} codayataṃ sūnṛtāḥ pinvataṃ dhiya ut purandhīrīrayatantaduśmasi
GV01rv_10_u:798: RV_10.039.02.2{15} yaśasaṃ bhāgaṃ kṛṇutaṃ no aśvinā somaṃ nacāruṃ maghavatsu nas kṛtam
GV01rv_10_u:799: RV_10.039.03.1{15} amājuraścid bhavatho yuvaṃ bhago 'nāśościdavitārāpamasya cit
GV01rv_10_u:800: RV_10.039.03.2{15} andhasya cin nāsatyā kṛśasya cid yuvāmidāhurbhiṣajā rutasya cit
GV01rv_10_u:801: RV_10.039.04.1{15} yuvaṃ cyavānaṃ sanayaṃ yathā rathaṃ punaryuvānaṃcarathāya takṣathuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:802: RV_10.039.04.2{15} niṣ ṭaugryamūhathuradbhyas pariviśvet tā vāṃ savaneṣu pravācyā
GV01rv_10_u:803: RV_10.039.05.1{15} purāṇā vāṃ vīryā pra bravā jane 'tho hāsathurbhiṣajāmayobhuvā
GV01rv_10_u:804: RV_10.039.05.2{15} tā vāṃ nu navyāvavase karāmahe 'yaṃnāsatyā śradariryathā dadhat
GV01rv_10_u:805: RV_10.039.06.1{16} iyaṃ vāmahve śṛṇutaṃ me aśvinā putrāyeva pitarā mahyaṃśikṣatam
GV01rv_10_u:806: RV_10.039.06.2{16} anāpirajñā asajātyāmatiḥ purā tasyāabhiśasterava spṛtam
GV01rv_10_u:807: RV_10.039.07.1{16} yuvaṃ rathena vimadāya śundhyuvaṃ nyūhathuḥ purumitrasyayoṣaṇām
GV01rv_10_u:808: RV_10.039.07.2{16} yuvaṃ havaṃ vadhrimatyā agachataṃ yuvaṃsuṣutiṃ cakrathuḥ purandhaye
GV01rv_10_u:809: RV_10.039.08.1{16} yuvaṃ viprasya jaraṇāmupeyuṣaḥ punaḥ kalerakṛṇutaṃyuvad vayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:810: RV_10.039.08.2{16} yuvaṃ vandanam ṛśyadādudūpathuryuvaṃsadyo viśpalāmetave kṛthaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:811: RV_10.039.09.1{16} yuvaṃ ha rebhaṃ vṛṣaṇā guhā hitamudairayatammamṛvāṃsamaśvinā
GV01rv_10_u:812: RV_10.039.09.2{16} yuvam ṛbīsamuta taptamatrayaomanvantaṃ cakrathuḥ saptavadhraye
GV01rv_10_u:813: RV_10.039.10.1{16} yuvaṃ śvetaṃ pedave 'śvināśvaṃ navabhirvājairnavatīca vājinam
GV01rv_10_u:814: RV_10.039.10.2{16} carkṛtyaṃ dadathurdrāvayatsakhaṃ bhagaṃ nanṛbhyo havyaṃ mayobhubam
GV01rv_10_u:815: RV_10.039.11.1{17} na taṃ rājānāvadite kutaścana nāṃho aśnoti duritaṃnakirbhayam
GV01rv_10_u:816: RV_10.039.11.2{17} yamaśvinā suhavā rudravartanī purorathaṃkṛṇuthaḥ patnyā saha
GV01rv_10_u:817: RV_10.039.12.1{17} ā tena yātaṃ manaso javīyasā rathaṃ yaṃ vām ṛbhavaścakruraśvinā
GV01rv_10_u:818: RV_10.039.12.2{17} yasya yoge duhitā jāyate diva ubhe ahanīsudine vivasvataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:819: RV_10.039.13.1{17} tā vartiryātaṃ jayuṣā vi parvatamapinvataṃ śayavedhenumaśvinā
GV01rv_10_u:821: RV_10.039.14.1{17} etaṃ vāṃ stomamaśvināvakarmātakṣāma bhṛgavo na ratham
GV01rv_10_u:822: RV_10.039.14.2{17} nyamṛkṣāma yoṣaṇāṃ na marye nityaṃ na sūnuntanayaṃ dadhānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:823: RV_10.040.01.1{18} rathaṃ yāntaṃ kuha ko ha vāṃ narā prati dyumantaṃsuvitāya bhūṣati
GV01rv_10_u:824: RV_10.040.01.2{18} prātaryāvāṇaṃ vibhvaṃ viśe-viśevastor vastorvahamānaṃ dhiyā śami
GV01rv_10_u:825: RV_10.040.02.1{18} kuha svid doṣā kuha vastoraśvinā kuhābhipitvaṃ karataḥkuhoṣatuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:826: RV_10.040.02.2{18} ko vāṃ śayutrā vidhaveva devaraṃ maryaṃ nayoṣā kṛṇute sadhastha ā
GV01rv_10_u:827: RV_10.040.03.1{18} prātarjarethe jaraṇeva kāpayā vastor-vastoryajatā gachathogṛham
GV01rv_10_u:828: RV_10.040.03.2{18} kasya dhvasrā bhavathaḥ kasya vā narā rājaputrevasavanāva gachathaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:829: RV_10.040.04.1{18} yuvāṃ mṛgeva vāraṇā mṛgaṇyavo doṣā vastorhaviṣā nihvayāmahe
GV01rv_10_u:830: RV_10.040.04.2{18} yuvaṃ hotrām ṛtuthā juhvate nareṣaṃ janāyavahathaḥ śubhas patī
GV01rv_10_u:831: RV_10.040.05.1{18} yuvāṃ ha ghoṣā paryaśvinā yatī rājña ūce duhitāpṛche vāṃ narā
GV01rv_10_u:832: RV_10.040.05.2{18} bhūtaṃ me ahna uta bhūtamaktave'śvāvate rathine śaktamarvate
GV01rv_10_u:833: RV_10.040.06.1{19} yuvaṃ kavī ṣṭhaḥ paryaśvinā rathaṃ viśo na kutsojariturnaśāyathaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:834: RV_10.040.06.2{19} yuvorha makṣā paryaśvinā madhvāsā bharata niṣkṛtaṃ na yoṣaṇā
GV01rv_10_u:835: RV_10.040.07.1{19} yuvaṃ ha bhujyuṃ yuvamaśvinā vaśaṃ yuvaṃ śiñjāramuśanāmupārathuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:836: RV_10.040.07.2{19} yuvo rarāvā pari sakhyamāsate yuvorahamavasā sumnamā cake
GV01rv_10_u:837: RV_10.040.08.1{19} yuvaṃ ha kṛśaṃ yuvamaśvinā śayuṃ yuvaṃ vidhantaṃvidhavāmuruṣyathaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:839: RV_10.040.09.1{19} janiṣṭa yoṣā patayat kanīnako vi cāruhan vīrudhodaṃsanā anu
GV01rv_10_u:840: RV_10.040.09.2{19} āsmai rīyante nivaneva sindhavo 'smā ahnebhavati tat patitvanam
GV01rv_10_u:841: RV_10.040.10.1{19} jīvaṃ rudanti vi mayante adhvare dīrghāmanu prasitindīdhiyurnaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:842: RV_10.040.10.2{19} vāmaṃ pitṛbhyo ya idaṃ samerire mayaḥpatibhyo janayaḥ pariṣvaje
GV01rv_10_u:843: RV_10.040.11.1{20} na tasya vidma tadu ṣu pra vocata yuvā ha yad yuvatyāḥkṣeti yoniṣu
GV01rv_10_u:844: RV_10.040.11.2{20} priyosriyasya vṛṣabhasya retino gṛhaṃgamemāśvinā taduśmasi
GV01rv_10_u:845: RV_10.040.12.1{20} ā vāmagan sumatirvājinīvasū nyaśvinā hṛtsu kāmāayaṃsata
GV01rv_10_u:846: RV_10.040.12.2{20} abhūtaṃ gopā mithunā śubhas patī priyāaryamṇo duryānaśīmahi
GV01rv_10_u:847: RV_10.040.13.1{20} tā mandasānā manuṣo duroṇa ā dhattaṃ rayiṃ sahavīraṃvacasyave
GV01rv_10_u:848: RV_10.040.13.2{20} kṛtaṃ tīrthaṃ suprapāṇaṃ śubhas patīsthāṇuṃ patheṣṭhāmapa durmatiṃ hatam
GV01rv_10_u:849: RV_10.040.14.1{20} kva svidadya katamāsvaśvinā vikṣu dasrā mādayeteśubhas patī
GV01rv_10_u:850: RV_10.040.14.2{20} ka īṃ ni yeme katamasya jagmaturviprasya vāyajamānasya vā gṛham
GV01rv_10_u:851: RV_10.041.01.1{21} samānamu tyaṃ puruhūtamukthyaṃ rathaṃ tricakraṃ savanāganigmatam
GV01rv_10_u:852: RV_10.041.01.2{21} parijmānaṃ vidathyaṃ suvṛktibhirvayaṃvyuṣṭā uṣaso havāmahe
GV01rv_10_u:853: RV_10.041.02.1{21} prātaryujaṃ nāsatyādhi tiṣṭhathaḥ prātaryāvāṇammadhuvāhanaṃ ratham
GV01rv_10_u:854: RV_10.041.02.2{21} viśo yena gachatho yajvarīrnarākīreścid yajñaṃ hotṛmantamaśvinā
GV01rv_10_u:855: RV_10.041.03.1{21} adhvaryuṃ vā madhupāṇiṃ suhastyamagnidhaṃ vādhṛtadakṣaṃ damūnasam
GV01rv_10_u:856: RV_10.041.03.2{21} viprasya vā yat savanani gachatho'ta ā yātaṃ madhupeyamaśvinā
GV01rv_10_u:857: RV_10.042.01.1{22} asteva su prataraṃ lāyamasyan bhūṣanniva pra bharāstomamasmai
GV01rv_10_u:858: RV_10.042.01.2{22} vācā viprāstarata vācamaryo ni rāmayajaritaḥ soma indram
GV01rv_10_u:859: RV_10.042.02.1{22} dohena gāmupa śikṣā sakhāyaṃ pra bodhaya jaritarjāramindram
GV01rv_10_u:860: RV_10.042.02.2{22} kośaṃ na pūrṇaṃ vasunā nyṛṣṭamā cyāvayamaghadeyāya śūram
GV01rv_10_u:861: RV_10.042.03.1{22} kimaṅga tvā maghavan bhojamāhuḥ śiśīhi mā śiśayantvā śṛṇomi
GV01rv_10_u:862: RV_10.042.03.2{22} apnasvatī mama dhīrastu śakra vasuvidambhagamindrā bharā naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:863: RV_10.042.04.1{22} tvāṃ janā mamasatyeṣvindra santasthānā vi hvayantesamīke
GV01rv_10_u:864: RV_10.042.04.2{22} atrā yujaṃ kṛṇute yo haviṣmān nāsunvatāsakhyaṃ vaṣṭi śūraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:865: RV_10.042.05.1{22} dhanaṃ na syandraṃ bahulaṃ yo asmai tīvrān somānāsunotiprayasvān
GV01rv_10_u:866: RV_10.042.05.2{22} tasmai śatrūn sutukān prātarahno nisvaṣṭrān yuvati hanti vṛtram
GV01rv_10_u:867: RV_10.042.06.1{23} yasmin vayaṃ dadhimā śaṃsamindre yaḥ śiśrāya maghavākāmamasme
GV01rv_10_u:868: RV_10.042.06.2{23} ārāccit san bhayatāmasya śatrurnyasmaidyumnā janyā namantām
GV01rv_10_u:869: RV_10.042.07.1{23} ārācchatrumapa bādhasva dūramugro yaḥ śambaḥpuruhūta tena
GV01rv_10_u:870: RV_10.042.07.2{23} asme dhehi yavamad gomadindra kṛdhī dhiyaṃjaritre vājaratnām
GV01rv_10_u:871: RV_10.042.08.1{23} pra yamantarvṛṣasavāso agman tīvrāḥ somā bahulāntāsaindram
GV01rv_10_u:872: RV_10.042.08.2{23} nāha dāmānaṃ maghavā ni yaṃsan ni sunvate vahatibhūri vāmam
GV01rv_10_u:873: RV_10.042.09.1{23} uta prahāmatidīvyā jayāti kṛtaṃ yacchvaghnī vicinotikāle
GV01rv_10_u:874: RV_10.042.09.2{23} yo devakāmo na dhanā ruṇaddhi samit taṃ rāyāsṛjati svadhāvān
GV01rv_10_u:875: RV_10.042.10.1{23} gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena kṣudhaṃ puruhūtaviśvām
GV01rv_10_u:876: RV_10.042.10.2{23} vayaṃ rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanānyasmākenavṛjanenā jayema
GV01rv_10_u:878: RV_10.042.11.2{23} idraḥ purastāduta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyovarivaḥ kṛṇotu
GV01rv_10_u:879: RV_10.043.01.1{24} achā ma indraṃ matayaḥ svarvidaḥ sadhrīcīrviśvāuśatīranūṣata
GV01rv_10_u:880: RV_10.043.01.2{24} pari ṣvajante janayo yathā patiṃ maryaṃna śundhyuṃ maghavānamūtaye
GV01rv_10_u:881: RV_10.043.02.1{24} na ghā tvadrigapa veti me manastve it kāmaṃ puruhūtaśiśraya
GV01rv_10_u:882: RV_10.043.02.2{24} rājeva dasma ni ṣado 'dhi barhiṣyasmin su some'vapānamastu te
GV01rv_10_u:883: RV_10.043.03.1{24} viṣūvṛdindro amateruta kṣudhaḥ sa id rāyo maghavāvasva īśate
GV01rv_10_u:884: RV_10.043.03.2{24} tasyedime pravaṇe sapta sindhavo vayovardhanti vṛṣabhasya śuṣmiṇaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:885: RV_10.043.04.1{24} vayo na vṛkṣaṃ supalāśamāsadan somāsa indraṃ mandinaścamūṣadaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:886: RV_10.043.04.2{24} praiṣāmanīkaṃ śavasā davidyutad vidatsvarmanave jyotirāryam
GV01rv_10_u:887: RV_10.043.05.1{24} kṛtaṃ na śvaghnī vi cinoti devane saṃvargaṃ yan maghavāsūryaṃ jayat
GV01rv_10_u:888: RV_10.043.05.2{24} na tat te anyo anu vīryaṃ śakan napurāṇo maghavan nota nūtanaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:889: RV_10.043.06.1{25} viśaṃ-viśaṃ maghavā paryaśāyata janānāṃ dhenāavacākaśad vṛṣā
GV01rv_10_u:890: RV_10.043.06.2{25} yasyāha śakraḥ savaneṣu raṇyati satīvraiḥ somaiḥ sahate pṛtanyataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:891: RV_10.043.07.1{25} āpo na sindhumabhi yat samakṣaran somāsa indraṃ kulyāiva hradam
GV01rv_10_u:892: RV_10.043.07.2{25} vardhanti viprā maho asya sādane yavaṃ navṛṣṭirdivyena dānunā
GV01rv_10_u:893: RV_10.043.08.1{25} vṛṣā na kruddhaḥ patayad rajassvā yo aryapatnīrakṛṇodimā apaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:894: RV_10.043.08.2{25} sa sunvate maghavā jīradānave 'vindajjyotirmanave haviṣmate
GV01rv_10_u:895: RV_10.043.09.1{25} ujjāyatāṃ paraśurjyotiṣā saha bhūyā ṛtasya sudughāpurāṇavat
GV01rv_10_u:896: RV_10.043.09.2{25} vi rocatāmaruṣo bhānunā śuciḥ svarṇaśukraṃ śuśucīta satpatiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:899: RV_10.044.01.1{26} ā yātvindraḥ svapatirmadāya yo dharmaṇā tūtujānastuviṣmān
GV01rv_10_u:900: RV_10.044.01.2{26} pratvakṣāṇo ati viśvā sahāṃsyapāreṇamahatā vṛṣṇyena
GV01rv_10_u:901: RV_10.044.02.1{26} suṣṭhāmā rathaḥ suyamā harī te mimyakṣa vajro nṛpategabhastau
GV01rv_10_u:902: RV_10.044.02.2{26} śībhaṃ rājan supathā yāhyarvāṃ vardhāmate papuṣo vṛṣṇyāni
GV01rv_10_u:905: RV_10.044.04.1{26} evā patiṃ droṇasācaṃ sacetasamūrja skambhaṃ dharuṇaā vṛṣāyase
GV01rv_10_u:906: RV_10.044.04.2{26} ojaḥ kṛṣva saṃ gṛbhāya tve apyaso yathākenipānāmino vṛdhe
GV01rv_10_u:907: RV_10.044.05.1{26} gamannasme vasūnyā hi śaṃsiṣaṃ svāśiṣaṃ bharamāyāhi sominaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:908: RV_10.044.05.2{26} tvamīśiṣe sāsminnā satsi barhiṣyanādhṛṣyā tava pātrāṇi dharmaṇā
GV01rv_10_u:909: RV_10.044.06.1{27} pṛthak prāyan prathamā devahūtayo 'kṛṇvata śravasyāniduṣṭarā
GV01rv_10_u:910: RV_10.044.06.2{27} na ye śekuryajñiyāṃ nāvamāruhamīrmaivate nyaviśanta kepayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:911: RV_10.044.07.1{27} evaivāpāgapare santu dūḍhyo 'śvā yeṣāṃ duryujaāyuyujre
GV01rv_10_u:912: RV_10.044.07.2{27} itthā ye prāgupare santi dāvane purūṇiyatra vayunāni bhojanā
GV01rv_10_u:913: RV_10.044.08.1{27} girīnrajrān rejamānānadhārayad dyauḥ krandadantarikṣāṇi kopayat
GV01rv_10_u:914: RV_10.044.08.2{27} samīcīne dhiṣaṇe vi ṣkabhāyativṛṣṇaḥ pītvā mada ukthāni śaṃsati
GV01rv_10_u:915: RV_10.044.09.1{27} imaṃ bibharmi sukṛtaṃ te aṅkuśaṃ yenārujāsi maghavañchaphārujaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:916: RV_10.044.09.2{27} asmin su te savane astvokyaṃ suta iṣṭaumaghavan bodhyābhagaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:919: RV_10.045.01.1{28} divas pari prathamaṃ jajñe agnirasmad dvitīyaṃ parijātavedāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:920: RV_10.045.01.2{28} tṛtīyamapsu nṛmaṇā ajasramindhāna enaṃjarate svādhīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:921: RV_10.045.02.1{28} vidmā te agne tredhā trayāṇi vidmā te dhāma vibhṛtāpurutrā
GV01rv_10_u:922: RV_10.045.02.2{28} vidmā te nāma paramaṃ guhā yad vidmā tamutsaṃ yata ājagantha
GV01rv_10_u:923: RV_10.045.03.1{28} samudre tvā nṛmaṇā apsvantarnṛcakṣā īdhe divo agnaūdhan
GV01rv_10_u:924: RV_10.045.03.2{28} tṛtīye tvā rajasi tasthivāṃsamapāmupasthemahiṣā avardhan
GV01rv_10_u:925: RV_10.045.04.1{28} akrandadagni stanayanniva dyauḥ kṣāmā rerihad vīrudhaḥsamañjan
GV01rv_10_u:926: RV_10.045.04.2{28} sadyo jajñāno vi hīmiddho akhyadā rodasībhānunā bhātyantaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:927: RV_10.045.05.1{28} śrīṇāmudāro dharuṇo rayīṇāṃ manīṣāṇāmprārpaṇaḥ somagopāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:928: RV_10.045.05.2{28} vasuḥ sūnuḥ sahaso apsu rājāvi bhātyagra uṣasāmidhānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:929: RV_10.045.06.1{28} viśvasya keturbhuvanasya garbha ā rodasī apṛṇājjāyamānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:930: RV_10.045.06.2{28} vīḷuṃ cidadrimabhinat parāyañ janā yadagnimayajanta pañca
GV01rv_10_u:931: RV_10.045.07.1{29} uśik pāvako aratiḥ sumedhā marteṣvagniramṛto ni dhāyi
GV01rv_10_u:932: RV_10.045.07.2{29} iyarti dhūmamaruṣaṃ bharibhraducchukreṇa śociṣādyā inakṣan
GV01rv_10_u:933: RV_10.045.08.1{29} dṛśāno rukma urviyā vyadyaud durmarṣamāyuḥ śriyerucānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:934: RV_10.045.08.2{29} agniramṛto abhavad vayobhiryadenaṃ dyaurjanayat suretāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:935: RV_10.045.09.1{29} yaste adya kṛṇavad bhadraśoce 'pūpaṃ deva ghṛtavantamagne
GV01rv_10_u:936: RV_10.045.09.2{29} pra taṃ naya prataraṃ vasyo achābhi sumnaṃ devabhaktaṃyaviṣṭha
GV01rv_10_u:937: RV_10.045.10.1{29} ā taṃ bhaja sauśravaseṣvagna ukthauktha ā bhaja śasyamāne
GV01rv_10_u:938: RV_10.045.10.2{29} priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavātyujjātena bhinadadujjanitvaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:939: RV_10.045.11.1{29} tvāmagne yajamānā anu dyūn viśvā vasu dadhire vāryāṇi
GV01rv_10_u:940: RV_10.045.11.2{29} tvayā saha draviṇamichamānā vrajaṃ gomantamuśijo vivavruḥ
GV01rv_10_u:942: RV_10.045.12.2{29} adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devā dhatta rayimasme suvīram
GV01rv_10_u:943: RV_10.046.01.1{01} pra hotā jāto mahān nabhovin nṛṣadvā sīdadapāmupasthe
GV01rv_10_u:944: RV_10.046.01.2{01} dadhiryo dhāyi sa te vayāṃsi yantā vasūni vidhatetanūpāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:945: RV_10.046.02.1{01} imaṃ vidhanto apāṃ sadhasthe paśuṃ na naṣṭaṃ padairanu gman
GV01rv_10_u:947: RV_10.046.03.1{01} imaṃ trito bhūryavindadichan vaibhūvaso mūrdhanyaghnyāyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:948: RV_10.046.03.2{01} sa śevṛdho jāta ā harmyeṣu nābhiryuvābhavati rocanasya
GV01rv_10_u:949: RV_10.046.04.1{01} mandraṃ hotāramuśijo namobhiḥ prāñcaṃ yajñaṃ netāramadhvarāṇām
GV01rv_10_u:951: RV_10.046.05.1{01} pra bhūrjayantaṃ mahāṃ vipodhāṃ mūrā amūraṃ purāndarmāṇam
GV01rv_10_u:952: RV_10.046.05.2{01} nayanto garbhaṃ vanāṃ dhiyaṃ dhurhiriśmaśruṃ nārvāṇaṃ dhanarcam
GV01rv_10_u:953: RV_10.046.06.1{02} ni pastyāsu trita stabhūyan parivīto yonau sīdadantaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:954: RV_10.046.06.2{02} ataḥ saṃgṛbhyā viśāṃ damūnā vidharmaṇāyantrairīyatenṝn
GV01rv_10_u:955: RV_10.046.07.1{02} asyājarāso damāmaritrā arcaddhūmāso agnayaḥ pāvakāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:956: RV_10.046.07.2{02} śvitīcayaḥ śvātrāso bhuraṇyavo vanarṣado vāyavo nasomāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:957: RV_10.046.08.1{02} pra jihvayā bharate vepo agniḥ pra vayunāni cetasāpṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:958: RV_10.046.08.2{02} tamāyavaḥ śucayantaṃ pāvakaṃ mandraṃhotāraṃ dadhire yajiṣṭham
GV01rv_10_u:959: RV_10.046.09.1{02} dyāvā yamagniṃ pṛthivī janiṣṭāmāpastvaṣṭā bhṛgavoyaṃ sahobhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:960: RV_10.046.09.2{02} īḷenyaṃ prathamaṃ mātariśvā devāstatakṣurmanave yajatram
GV01rv_10_u:961: RV_10.046.10.1{02} yaṃ tvā devā dadhire havyavāhaṃ puruspṛho mānuṣāsoyajatram
GV01rv_10_u:962: RV_10.046.10.2{02} sa yāmannagne stuvate vayo dhāḥ pra devayanyaśasaḥ saṃ hi pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:963: RV_10.047.01.1{03} jagṛbhmā te dakṣiṇamindra hastaṃ vasūyavo vasupatevasūnām
GV01rv_10_u:964: RV_10.047.01.2{03} vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonāmasmabhyaṃcitraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:965: RV_10.047.02.1{03} svāyudhaṃ svavasaṃ sunīthaṃ catuḥsamudraṃ dharunaṃrayīṇām
GV01rv_10_u:966: RV_10.047.02.2{03} carkṛtyaṃ śaṃsyaṃ bhūrivāramasmabhyaṃcitraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:967: RV_10.047.03.1{03} subrahmāṇaṃ devavantaṃ bṛhantamuruṃ gabhīraṃ pṛthubudhnamindra
GV01rv_10_u:969: RV_10.047.04.1{03} sanadvājaṃ vipravīraṃ tarutraṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ śūśuvāṃsaṃsudakṣam
GV01rv_10_u:970: RV_10.047.04.2{03} dasyuhanaṃ pūrbhidamindra satyamasmabhyaṃcitraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:971: RV_10.047.05.1{03} aśvāvantaṃ rathinaṃ vīravantaṃ sahasriṇaṃ śatinaṃvājamindra
GV01rv_10_u:972: RV_10.047.05.2{03} bhadravrātaṃ vipravīraṃ svarṣāmasmabhyaṃcitraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:973: RV_10.047.06.1{04} pra saptagum ṛtadhītiṃ sumedhāṃ bṛhaspatiṃ matirachājigāti
GV01rv_10_u:974: RV_10.047.06.2{04} ya āṅgiraso namasopasadyo 'smabhyaṃ citraṃvṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:975: RV_10.047.07.1{04} vanīvāno mama dūtāsa indraṃ stomāścaranti sumatīriyānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:976: RV_10.047.07.2{04} hṛdispṛśo manasā vacyamānā asmabhyaṃ citraṃvṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:977: RV_10.047.08.1{04} yat tvā yāmi daddhi tan na indra bṛhantaṃ kṣayamasamaṃjanānām
GV01rv_10_u:978: RV_10.047.08.2{04} abhi tad dyāvāpṛthivī gṛṇītāmasmabhyaṃcitraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:979: RV_10.048.01.1{05} ahaṃ bhuvaṃ vasunaḥ pūrvyas patirahaṃ dhanāni saṃjayāmi śaśvataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:980: RV_10.048.01.2{05} māṃ havante pitaraṃ na jantavo 'handāśuṣe vi bhajāmi bhojanam
GV01rv_10_u:981: RV_10.048.02.1{05} ahamindro rodho vakṣo atharvaṇastritāya gā ajanayamaheradhi
GV01rv_10_u:982: RV_10.048.02.2{05} ahaṃ dasyubhyaḥ pari nṛmṇamā dade gotrā śikṣandadhīce mātariśvane
GV01rv_10_u:983: RV_10.048.03.1{05} mahyaṃ tvaṣṭā vajramatakṣadāyasaṃ mayi devāso 'vṛjannapi kratum
GV01rv_10_u:984: RV_10.048.03.2{05} mamānīkaṃ sūryasyeva duṣṭaraṃ māmāryantikṛtena kartvena ca
GV01rv_10_u:985: RV_10.048.04.1{05} ahametaṃ gavyayamaśvyaṃ paśuṃ purīṣiṇaṃ sāyakenāhiraṇyayam
GV01rv_10_u:986: RV_10.048.04.2{05} purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi dāśuṣe yan māsomāsa ukthino amandiṣuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:987: RV_10.048.05.1{05} ahamindro na parā jigya id dhanaṃ na mṛtyave 'va tasthekadā cana
GV01rv_10_u:988: RV_10.048.05.2{05} somamin mā sunvanto yācatā vasu na mepūravaḥ sakhye riṣāthana
GV01rv_10_u:989: RV_10.048.06.1{06} ahametāñchāśvasato dvā-dvendraṃ ye vajraṃ yudhaye'kṛṇvata
GV01rv_10_u:991: RV_10.048.07.1{06} abhīdamekameko asmi niṣṣāḷ abhī dvā kimu trayaḥkaranti
GV01rv_10_u:992: RV_10.048.07.2{06} khale na parṣān prati hanmi bhūri kiṃ mā nindantiśatravo 'nindrāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:993: RV_10.048.08.1{06} ahaṃ guṅgubhyo atithigvamiṣkaramiṣaṃ na vṛtraturaṃvikṣu dhārayam
GV01rv_10_u:994: RV_10.048.08.2{06} yat parṇayaghna uta vā karañjahe prāhammahe vṛtrahatye aśuśravi
GV01rv_10_u:995: RV_10.048.09.1{06} pra me namī sāpya iṣe bhuje bhūd gavāmeṣe sakhyākṛṇuta dvitā
GV01rv_10_u:996: RV_10.048.09.2{06} didyuṃ yadasya samitheṣu maṃhayamādidenaṃ śaṃsyamukthyaṃ karam
GV01rv_10_u:997: RV_10.048.10.1{06} pra nemasmin dadṛśe somo antargopā nemamāvirasthākṛṇoti
GV01rv_10_u:998: RV_10.048.10.2{06} sa tigmaśṛṅgaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ yuyutsan druhastasthaubahule baddho antaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:999: RV_10.048.11.1{06} ādityānāṃ vasūnāṃ rudriyāṇāṃ devo devānāṃ namināmi dhāma
GV01rv_10_u:1000: RV_10.048.11.2{06} te mā bhadrāya śavase tatakṣuraparājitamastṛtamaṣāḷam
GV01rv_10_u:1001: RV_10.049.01.1{07} ahaṃ dāṃ gṛṇate pūrvyaṃ vasvahaṃ brahma kṛṇavaṃ mahyaṃvardhanam
GV01rv_10_u:1002: RV_10.049.01.2{07} ahaṃ bhuvaṃ yajamānasya coditāyajvanaḥ sākṣiviśvasmin bhare
GV01rv_10_u:1003: RV_10.049.02.1{07} māṃ dhurindraṃ nāma devatā divaśca gmaścāpāṃ cajantavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1004: RV_10.049.02.2{07} ahaṃ harī vṛṣaṇā vivratā raghū ahaṃvajraṃ śavase dhṛṣṇvā dade
GV01rv_10_u:1005: RV_10.049.03.1{07} ahamatkaṃ kavaye śiśnathaṃ hathairahaṃ kutsamāvamābhirūtibhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1006: RV_10.049.03.2{07} ahaṃ śuṣṇasya śnathitā vadharyamaṃna yo rara āryaṃ nāma dasyave
GV01rv_10_u:1007: RV_10.049.04.1{07} ahaṃ piteva vetasūnrabhiṣṭaye tugraṃ kutsāya smadibhaṃca randhayam
GV01rv_10_u:1008: RV_10.049.04.2{07} ahaṃ bhuvaṃ yajamānasya rājani pra yad bharetujaye na priyādhṛṣe
GV01rv_10_u:1009: RV_10.049.05.1{07} ahaṃ randhayaṃ mṛgayaṃ śrutarvaṇe yan mājihīta vayunācanānuṣak
GV01rv_10_u:1011: RV_10.049.06.1{08} ahaṃ sa yo navavāstvaṃ bṛhadrathaṃ saṃ vṛtreva dāsaṃvṛtrahārujam
GV01rv_10_u:1012: RV_10.049.06.2{08} yad vardhayantaṃ prathayantamānuṣag dūrepāre rajaso rocanākaram
GV01rv_10_u:1013: RV_10.049.07.1{08} ahaṃ sūryasya pari yāmyāśubhiḥ praitaśebhirvahamānaojasā
GV01rv_10_u:1014: RV_10.049.07.2{08} yan mā sāvo manuṣa āha nirṇija ṛdhak kṛṣedāsaṃ kṛtvyaṃ hathaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1015: RV_10.049.08.1{08} ahaṃ saptahā nahuṣo nahuṣṭaraḥ prāśrāva yaṃ śavasāturvaśaṃ yadum
GV01rv_10_u:1016: RV_10.049.08.2{08} ahaṃ nyanyaṃ sahasā sahas karaṃ navavrādhato navatiṃ ca vakṣayam
GV01rv_10_u:1017: RV_10.049.09.1{08} ahaṃ sapta sravato dhārayaṃ vṛṣā dravitnvaḥ pṛthivyāṃsīrā adhi
GV01rv_10_u:1018: RV_10.049.09.2{08} ahamarṇāṃsi vi tirāmi sukraturyudhā vidammanave gātumiṣṭaye
GV01rv_10_u:1019: RV_10.049.10.1{08} ahaṃ tadāsu dhārayaṃ yadāsu na devaścanatvaṣṭādhārayad ruśat
GV01rv_10_u:1020: RV_10.049.10.2{08} spārhaṃ gavāmūdhassuvakṣaṇāsvā madhormadhu śvātryaṃ somamāśiram
GV01rv_10_u:1021: RV_10.049.11.1{08} evā devānindro vivye nṝn pra cyautnena maghavāsatyarādhāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1022: RV_10.049.11.2{08} viśvet tā te harivaḥ śacīvo 'bhiturāsaḥ svayaśo gṛṇanti
GV01rv_10_u:1023: RV_10.050.01.1{09} pra vo mahe mandamānāyāndhaso 'rcā viśvānarāyaviśvābhuve
GV01rv_10_u:1024: RV_10.050.01.2{09} indrasya yasya sumakhaṃ saho mahi śravonṛmṇaṃ ca rodasī saparyataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1025: RV_10.050.02.1{09} so cin nu sakhyā narya ina stutaścarkṛtya indro māvatenare
GV01rv_10_u:1026: RV_10.050.02.2{09} viśvāsu dhūrṣu vājakṛtyeṣu satpate vṛtre vāpsvabhi śūra mandase
GV01rv_10_u:1027: RV_10.050.03.1{09} ke te nara indra ye ta iṣe ye te sumnaṃ sadhanyamiyakṣān
GV01rv_10_u:1028: RV_10.050.03.2{09} ke te vājāyāsuryāya hinvire ke apsu svāsūrvarāsupauṃsye
GV01rv_10_u:1029: RV_10.050.04.1{09} bhuvastvamindra brahmaṇā mahān bhuvo viśveṣu savaneṣuyajñiyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1030: RV_10.050.04.2{09} bhuvo nṝṃścyautno viśvasmin bharejyeṣṭhaśca mantro viśvacarṣaṇe
GV01rv_10_u:1031: RV_10.050.05.1{09} avā nu kaṃ jyāyān yajñavanaso mahīṃ ta omātrāṃkṛṣṭayo viduḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1032: RV_10.050.05.2{09} aso nu kamajaro vardhāśca viśvedetāsavanā tūtumā kṛṣe
GV01rv_10_u:1033: RV_10.050.06.1{09} etā viśvā savanā tūtumākṛṣe svayaṃ sūno sahaso yānidadhiṣe
GV01rv_10_u:1034: RV_10.050.06.2{09} varāya te pātraṃ dharmaṇe tanā yajño mantrobrahmodyataṃ vacaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1035: RV_10.050.07.1{09} ye te vipra brahmakṛtaḥ sute sacā vasūnāṃ ca vasunaścadāvane
GV01rv_10_u:1036: RV_10.050.07.2{09} pra te sumnasya manasā pathā bhuvan made sutasyasomyasyāndhasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1037: RV_10.051.01.1{10} mahat tadulbaṃ sthaviraṃ tadāsīd yenāviṣṭitaḥpraviveśithāpaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1038: RV_10.051.01.2{10} viśvā apaśyad bahudhā te agne jātavedastanvo deva ekaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1039: RV_10.051.02.1{10} ko mā dadarśa katamaḥ sa devo yo me tanvo bahudhāparyapaśyat
GV01rv_10_u:1041: RV_10.051.03.1{10} aichāma tvā bahudhā jātavedaḥ praviṣṭamagne apsvoṣadhīṣu
GV01rv_10_u:1042: RV_10.051.03.2{10} taṃ tvā yamo acikeccitrabhāno daśāntaruṣyādatirocamānam
GV01rv_10_u:1043: RV_10.051.04.1{10} hotrādahaṃ varuṇa bibhyadāyaṃ nedeva mā yunajannatradevāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1044: RV_10.051.04.2{10} tasya me tanvo bahudhā niviṣṭā etamarthaṃ naciketāhamagniḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1046: RV_10.051.05.2{10} sugān pathaḥ kṛṇuhi devayānān vaha havyānisumanasyamānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1047: RV_10.051.06.1{11} agneḥ pūrve bhrātaro arthametaṃ rathīvādhvānamanvāvarīvuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1048: RV_10.051.06.2{11} tasmād bhiyā varuṇa dūramāyaṃ gauro nakṣepnoravije jyāyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1049: RV_10.051.07.1{11} kurmasta āyurajaraṃ yadagne yathā yukto jātavedo nariṣyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1050: RV_10.051.07.2{11} athā vahāsi sumanasyamāno bhāgaṃ devebhyohaviṣaḥ sujāta
GV01rv_10_u:1051: RV_10.051.08.1{11} prayājān me anuyājāṃśca kevalānūrjasvantaṃ haviṣodatta bhāgam
GV01rv_10_u:1052: RV_10.051.08.2{11} ghṛtaṃ cāpāṃ puruṣaṃ cauṣadhīnāmagneśca dīrghamāyurastu devāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1053: RV_10.051.09.1{11} tava prayājā anuyājāśca kevala ūrjasvanto haviṣaḥ santubhāgāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1055: RV_10.052.01.1{12} viśve devāḥ śāstana mā yatheha hotā vṛto manavai yanniṣadya
GV01rv_10_u:1056: RV_10.052.01.2{12} pra me brūta bhāgadheyaṃ yathā vo yena pathāhavyamā vo vahāni
GV01rv_10_u:1057: RV_10.052.02.1{12} ahaṃ hotā nyasīdaṃ yajīyān viśve devā maruto mājunanti
GV01rv_10_u:1058: RV_10.052.02.2{12} ahar-aharaśvinādhvaryavaṃ vāṃ brahmā samid bhavatisāhutirvām
GV01rv_10_u:1059: RV_10.052.03.1{12} ayaṃ yo hotā kiru sa yamasya kamapyūhe yat samañjantidevāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1061: RV_10.052.04.1{12} māṃ devā dadhire havyavāhamapamluktaṃ bahu kṛchrācarantam
GV01rv_10_u:1062: RV_10.052.04.2{12} agnirvidvān yajñaṃ naḥ kalpayāti pañcayāmantrivṛtaṃ saptatantum
GV01rv_10_u:1063: RV_10.052.05.1{12} ā vo yakṣyamṛtatvaṃ suvīraṃ yathā vo devā varivaḥkarāṇi
GV01rv_10_u:1064: RV_10.052.05.2{12} ā bāhvorvajramindrasya dheyāmathemāviśvāḥ pṛtanā jayāti
GV01rv_10_u:1065: RV_10.052.06.1{12} trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇyagniṃ triṃśacca devā navacāsaparyan
GV01rv_10_u:1066: RV_10.052.06.2{12} aukṣan ghṛtairastṛṇan barhirasmā ādiddhotāraṃ nyasādayanta
GV01rv_10_u:1067: RV_10.053.01.1{13} yamaichāma manasā so 'yamāgād yajñasya vidvānparuṣaścikitvān
GV01rv_10_u:1068: RV_10.053.01.2{13} sa no yakṣad devatātā yajīyān ni hiṣatsadantaraḥ pūrvo asmat
GV01rv_10_u:1069: RV_10.053.02.1{13} arādhi hotā niṣadā yajīyanabhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hikhyat
GV01rv_10_u:1071: RV_10.053.03.1{13} sādhvīmakardevavītiṃ no adya yajñasya jihvāmavidāmaguhyām
GV01rv_10_u:1072: RV_10.053.03.2{13} sa āyurāgāt surabhirvasāno bhadrāmakardevahūtiṃ no adya
GV01rv_10_u:1073: RV_10.053.04.1{13} tadadya vācaḥ prathamaṃ masīya yenāsurānabhi devāasāma
GV01rv_10_u:1074: RV_10.053.04.2{13} ūrjāda uta yajñiyasaḥ pañca janā mama hotraṃjuṣadhvam
GV01rv_10_u:1075: RV_10.053.05.1{13} pañca janā mama hotraṃ juṣantāṃ gojātā uta yeyajñiyāsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1078: RV_10.053.06.1{14} tantuṃ tanvan rajaso bhānumanvihi jyotiṣmataḥ pathorakṣa dhiyā kṛtān
GV01rv_10_u:1079: RV_10.053.06.2{14} anulbaṇaṃ vayata joguvāmapo manurbhava janayā daivyaṃ janam
GV01rv_10_u:1080: RV_10.053.07.1{14} akṣānaho nahyatanota somyā iṣkṛṇudhvaṃ raśanā otapiṃśata
GV01rv_10_u:1081: RV_10.053.07.2{14} aṣṭāvandhuraṃ vahatābhito rathaṃ yena devāsoanayannabhi priyam
GV01rv_10_u:1082: RV_10.053.08.1{14} aśmanvatī rīyate saṃ rabhadhvamut tiṣṭhata pra taratāsakhāyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1083: RV_10.053.08.2{14} atrā jahāma ye asannaśevāḥ śivān vayamuttaremābhi vājān
GV01rv_10_u:1084: RV_10.053.09.1{14} tvaṣṭā māyā vedapasāmapastamo bibhrat pātrādevapānāni śantamā
GV01rv_10_u:1085: RV_10.053.09.2{14} śiśīte nūnaṃ paraśuṃ svāyasaṃyena vṛścādetaśo brahmaṇas patiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1086: RV_10.053.10.1{14} sato nūnaṃ kavayaḥ saṃ śiśīta vāśībhiryābhiramṛtāya takṣatha
GV01rv_10_u:1087: RV_10.053.10.2{14} vidvāṃsaḥ padā guhyāni kartana yenadevāso amṛtatvamānaśuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1089: RV_10.053.11.2{14} sa viśvāhā sumanā yogyā abhi siṣāsanirvanatekāra ijjitim
GV01rv_10_u:1090: RV_10.054.01.1{15} tāṃ su te kīrtiṃ maghavan mahitvā yat tvā bhīte rodasīahvayetām
GV01rv_10_u:1091: RV_10.054.01.2{15} prāvo devānātiro dāsamojaḥ prajāyaitvasyai yadaśikṣa indra
GV01rv_10_u:1092: RV_10.054.02.1{15} yadacarastanvā vāvṛdhāno balānīndra prabruvāṇo janeṣu
GV01rv_10_u:1093: RV_10.054.02.2{15} māyet sā te yāni yuddhānyāhurnādya śatruṃ nanupurā vivitse
GV01rv_10_u:1094: RV_10.054.03.1{15} ka u nu te mahimanaḥ samasyāsmat pūrva ṛṣayo 'ntamāpuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1095: RV_10.054.03.2{15} yan mātaraṃ ca pitaraṃ ca sākamajanayathāstanvaḥsvāyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1096: RV_10.054.04.1{15} catvāri te asuryāṇi nāmādābhyāni mahiṣasya santi
GV01rv_10_u:1097: RV_10.054.04.2{15} tvamaṅga tāni viśvāni vitse yebhiḥ karmāṇi maghavañcakartha
GV01rv_10_u:1098: RV_10.054.05.1{15} tvaṃ viśvā dadhiṣe kevalāni yānyāviryā ca guhāvasūni
GV01rv_10_u:1099: RV_10.054.05.2{15} kāmamin me maghavan mā vi tārīstvamājñātātvamindrāsi dātā
GV01rv_10_u:1100: RV_10.054.06.1{15} yo adadhājjyotiṣi jyotirantaryo asṛjan madhunā sammadhūni
GV01rv_10_u:1101: RV_10.054.06.2{15} adha priyaṃ śūṣamindrāya manma brahmakṛtobṛhadukthādavāci
GV01rv_10_u:1102: RV_10.055.01.1{16} dūre tan nāma guhyaṃ parācairyat tvā bhīte ahvayetāṃvayodhai
GV01rv_10_u:1103: RV_10.055.01.2{16} udastabhnāḥ pṛthivīṃ dyāmabhīke bhrātuḥputrān maghavan titviṣāṇaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1104: RV_10.055.02.1{16} mahat tan nāma guhyaṃ puruspṛg yena bhūtaṃ janayo yenabhavyam
GV01rv_10_u:1105: RV_10.055.02.2{16} pratnaṃ jātaṃ jyotiryadasya priyaṃ priyāḥ samaviśanta pañca
GV01rv_10_u:1106: RV_10.055.03.1{16} ā rodasī apṛṇādota madhyaṃ pañca devān ṛtuśaḥ sapta sapta
GV01rv_10_u:1107: RV_10.055.03.2{16} catustriṃśatā purudhā vi caṣṭe sarūpeṇa jyotiṣāvivratena
GV01rv_10_u:1108: RV_10.055.04.1{16} yaduṣa auchaḥ prathamā vibhānāmajanayo yena puṣṭasyapuṣṭam
GV01rv_10_u:1109: RV_10.055.04.2{16} yat te jāmitvamavaraṃ parasyā mahan mahatyāasuratvamekam
GV01rv_10_u:1110: RV_10.055.05.1{16} vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ samane bahūnāṃ yuvānaṃ santaṃ palitojagāra
GV01rv_10_u:1111: RV_10.055.05.2{16} devasya paśya kāvyaṃ mahitvādyā mamāra sa hyaḥsamāna
GV01rv_10_u:1112: RV_10.055.06.1{17} śākmanā śāko aruṇaḥ suparṇa ā yo mahaḥ śūraḥsanādanīḷaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1113: RV_10.055.06.2{17} yacciketa satyamit tan na moghaṃ vasuspārhamuta jetota dātā
