GV01rv_10_u:1297: RV_10.063.06.1{04} ko va stomaṃ rādhati yaṃ jujoṣatha viśve devāso manuṣoyati ṣṭhana
GV01rv_10_u:1298: RV_10.063.06.2{04} ko vo 'dhvaraṃ tuvijātā araṃ karad yo naḥparṣadatyaṃhaḥ svastaye
GV01rv_10_u:1299: RV_10.063.07.1{04} yebhyo hotrāṃ prathamāmāyeje manuḥ samiddhāgnirmanasāsapta hotṛbhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1300: RV_10.063.07.2{04} ta ādityā abhayaṃ śarma yachata sugā naḥkarta supathā svastaye
GV01rv_10_u:1301: RV_10.063.08.1{04} ya īśire bhuvanasya pracetaso viśvasya sthāturjagataścamantavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1302: RV_10.063.08.2{04} te naḥ kṛtādakṛtādenasas paryadyā devāsaḥpipṛtā svastaye
GV01rv_10_u:1303: RV_10.063.09.1{04} bhareṣvindraṃ suhavaṃ havāmahe 'ṃhomucaṃ sukṛtandaivyaṃ janam
GV01rv_10_u:1304: RV_10.063.09.2{04} agniṃ mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sātaye bhagandyāvāpṛthivī marutaḥ svastaye
GV01rv_10_u:1306: RV_10.063.10.2{04} daivīṃ nāvaṃ svaritrāmanāgasamasravantīmā ruhemā svastaye
GV01rv_10_u:1307: RV_10.063.11.1{05} viśve yajatrā adhi vocatotaye trāyadhvaṃ no durevāyāabhihrutaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1308: RV_10.063.11.2{05} satyayā vo devahūtyā huvema śṛṇvato devāavase svastaye
GV01rv_10_u:1310: RV_10.063.12.2{05} āre devā dveṣo asmad yuyotanoru ṇaḥ śarmayachatā svastaye
GV01rv_10_u:1311: RV_10.063.13.1{05} ariṣṭaḥ sa marto viśva edhate pra prajābhirjāyatedharmaṇas pari
GV01rv_10_u:1312: RV_10.063.13.2{05} yamādityāso nayathā sunītibhirativiśvāni duritā svastaye
GV01rv_10_u:1313: RV_10.063.14.1{05} yaṃ devāso 'vatha vājasātau yaṃ śūrasātā maruto hitedhane
GV01rv_10_u:1315: RV_10.063.15.1{05} svasti naḥ pathyāsu dhanvasu svastyapsu vṛjane svarvati
GV01rv_10_u:1316: RV_10.063.15.2{05} svasti naḥ putrakṛtheṣu yoniṣu svasti rāye maruto dadhātana
GV01rv_10_u:1317: RV_10.063.16.1{05} svastirid dhi prapathe śreṣṭhā rekṇasvatyabhi yāvāmameti
GV01rv_10_u:1318: RV_10.063.16.2{05} sā no amā so araṇe ni pātu svāveśā bhavatudevagopā
GV01rv_10_u:1319: RV_10.063.17.1{05} evā plateḥ sūnuravīvṛdhad vo viśva ādityā aditemanīṣī
GV01rv_10_u:1320: RV_10.063.17.2{05} īśānāso naro amartyenāstāvi jano divyogayena
GV01rv_10_u:1321: RV_10.064.01.1{06} kathā devānāṃ katamasya yāmani sumantu nāma śṛṇvatāmmanāmahe
GV01rv_10_u:1322: RV_10.064.01.2{06} ko mṛḷāti katamo no mayas karat katama ūtī abhyā vavartati
GV01rv_10_u:1323: RV_10.064.02.1{06} kratūyanti kratavo hṛtsu dhītayo venanti venāḥ patayantyā diśaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1324: RV_10.064.02.2{06} na marḍitā vidyate anya ebhyo deveṣu me adhikāmā ayaṃsata
GV01rv_10_u:1325: RV_10.064.03.1{06} narā vā śaṃsaṃ pūṣaṇamagohyamagniṃ deveddhamabhyarcase girā
GV01rv_10_u:1326: RV_10.064.03.2{06} sūryāmāsā candramasā yamaṃ divi tritaṃvātamuṣasamaktumaśvinā
GV01rv_10_u:1327: RV_10.064.04.1{06} kathā kavistuvīravān kayā girā bṛhaspatirvāvṛdhatesuvṛktibhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1328: RV_10.064.04.2{06} aja ekapāt suhavebhir{ṛ}kvabhirahiḥ śṛṇotubudhnyo havīmani
GV01rv_10_u:1329: RV_10.064.05.1{06} dakṣasya vādite janmani vrate rājānā mitrāvaruṇāvivāsasi
GV01rv_10_u:1330: RV_10.064.05.2{06} atūrtapanthāḥ pururatho aryamā saptahotāviṣurūpeṣu janmasu
GV01rv_10_u:1331: RV_10.064.06.1{07} te no arvanto havanaśruto havaṃ viśve śṛṇvantu vājinomitadravaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1332: RV_10.064.06.2{07} sahasrasā medhasātāviva tmanā maho yedhanaṃ samitheṣu jabhrire
GV01rv_10_u:1333: RV_10.064.07.1{07} pra vo vāyuṃ rathayujaṃ purandhiṃ stomaiḥ kṛṇudhvaṃsakhyāya pūṣaṇam
GV01rv_10_u:1334: RV_10.064.07.2{07} te hi devasya savituḥ savīmanikratuṃ sacante sacitaḥ sacetasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1335: RV_10.064.08.1{07} triḥ sapta sasrā nadyo mahīrapo vanaspatīn parvatānagnimūtaye
GV01rv_10_u:1336: RV_10.064.08.2{07} kṛśānumastṝn tiṣyaṃ sadhastha ā rudraṃrudreṣu rudriyaṃ havāmahe
GV01rv_10_u:1337: RV_10.064.09.1{07} sarasvatī sarayuḥ sindhurūrmibhirmaho mahīravasā yantuvakṣaṇīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1338: RV_10.064.09.2{07} devīrāpo mātaraḥ sūdayitnvo ghṛtavat payomadhuman no arcata
GV01rv_10_u:1339: RV_10.064.10.1{07} uta mātā bṛhaddivā śṛṇotu nastvaṣṭā devebhirjanibhiḥpitā vacaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1340: RV_10.064.10.2{07} ṛbhukṣā vājo rathaspatirbhago raṇvaḥśaṇsaḥ śaśamānasya pātu naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1341: RV_10.064.11.1{08} raṇvaḥ sandṛṣṭau pitumāniva kṣayo bhadrā rudrāṇāmmarutāmupastutiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1342: RV_10.064.11.2{08} gobhiḥ ṣyāma yaśaso janeṣvā sadādevāsa iḷayā sacemahi
GV01rv_10_u:1343: RV_10.064.12.1{08} yāṃ me dhiyaṃ maruta indra devā adadāta varuṇa mitra yūyam
GV01rv_10_u:1344: RV_10.064.12.2{08} tāṃ pīpayata payaseva dhenuṃ kuvid giro adhi rathevahātha
GV01rv_10_u:1345: RV_10.064.13.1{08} kuvidaṅga prati yathā cidasya naḥ sajātyasya marutobubodhatha
GV01rv_10_u:1346: RV_10.064.13.2{08} nābhā yatra prathamaṃ saṃnaśāmahe tatrajāmitvamaditirdadhātu naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1347: RV_10.064.14.1{08} te hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātarā mahī devī devāñ janmanāyajñiye itaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1348: RV_10.064.14.2{08} ubhe bibhṛta ubhayaṃ bharīmabhiḥ purūretāṃsi pitṛbhiśca siñcataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1349: RV_10.064.15.1{08} vi ṣā hotrā viśvamaśnoti vāryaṃ bṛhaspatiraramatiḥpanīyasī
GV01rv_10_u:1352: RV_10.064.16.2{08} ukthebhiratra matibhiśca vipro 'pīpayad gayodivyāni janma
GV01rv_10_u:1354: RV_10.065.01.1{09} agnirindro varuṇo mitro aryamā vāyuḥ pūṣā sarasvatīsajoṣasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1355: RV_10.065.01.2{09} ādityā viṣṇurmarutaḥ svarbṛhat somo rudroaditirbrahmaṇas patiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1356: RV_10.065.02.1{09} indrāgnī vṛtrahatyeṣu satpatī mitho hinvānā tanvāsamokasā
GV01rv_10_u:1357: RV_10.065.02.2{09} antarikṣaṃ mahyā paprurojasā somo ghṛtaśrīrmahimānamīrayan
GV01rv_10_u:1358: RV_10.065.03.1{09} teṣāṃ hi mahnā mahatāmanarvaṇāṃ stomāniyarmyṛtajñā ṛtāvṛdhām
GV01rv_10_u:1359: RV_10.065.03.2{09} ye apsavamarṇavaṃ citrarādhasasteno rāsantāṃ mahaye sumitryāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1361: RV_10.065.04.2{09} pṛkṣā iva mahayantaḥ surātayo devāstavante manuṣāya sūrayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1362: RV_10.065.05.1{09} mitrāya śikṣa varuṇāya dāśuṣe yā samrājā manasā naprayuchataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1363: RV_10.065.05.2{09} yayordhāma dharmaṇā rocate bṛhad yayorubherodasī nādhasī vṛtau
GV01rv_10_u:1364: RV_10.065.06.1{10} yā gaurvartaniṃ paryeti niṣkṛtaṃ payo duhānā vratanīravārataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1365: RV_10.065.06.2{10} sā prabruvāṇā varuṇāya dāśuṣe devebhyodāśad dhaviṣā vivasvate
GV01rv_10_u:1366: RV_10.065.07.1{10} divakṣaso agnijihvā ṛtāvṛdha ṛtasya yoniṃ vimṛśanta āsate
GV01rv_10_u:1367: RV_10.065.07.2{10} dyāṃ skabhitvyapa ā cakrurojasā yajñaṃ janitvītanvī ni māmṛjuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1368: RV_10.065.08.1{10} parikṣitā pitarā pūrvajāvarī ṛtasya yonā kṣayataḥsamokasā
GV01rv_10_u:1369: RV_10.065.08.2{10} dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇāya savrate ghṛtavat payomahiṣāya pinvataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1370: RV_10.065.09.1{10} parjanyāvātā vṛṣabhā purīṣiṇendravāyū varuṇo mitroaryamā
GV01rv_10_u:1371: RV_10.065.09.2{10} devānādityānaditiṃ havāmahe ye pārthivāsodivyāso apsu ye
GV01rv_10_u:1372: RV_10.065.10.1{10} tvaṣṭāraṃ vāyum ṛbhavo ya ohate daivyā hotārā uṣasaṃsvastaye
GV01rv_10_u:1373: RV_10.065.10.2{10} bṛhaspatiṃ vṛtrakhādaṃ sumedhasamindriyaṃsomaṃ dhanasā u īmahe
GV01rv_10_u:1374: RV_10.065.11.1{11} brahma gāmaśvaṃ janayanta oṣadhīrvanaspatīn pṛthivīmparvatānapaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1375: RV_10.065.11.2{11} sūryaṃ divi rohayantaḥ sudānava āryāvratā visṛjanto adhi kṣami
GV01rv_10_u:1376: RV_10.065.12.1{11} bhujyumaṃhasaḥ pipṛtho niraśvinā śyāvaṃ putraṃvadhrimatyā ajinvatam
GV01rv_10_u:1378: RV_10.065.13.1{11} pāvīravī tanyaturekapādajo divo dhartā sindhurāpaḥsamudriyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1379: RV_10.065.13.2{11} viśve devāsaḥ śṛṇavan vacāṃsi me sarasvatīsaha dhībhiḥ purandhyā
GV01rv_10_u:1380: RV_10.065.14.1{11} viśve devāḥ saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā manoryajatrāamṛtā ṛtajñāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1381: RV_10.065.14.2{11} rātiṣāco abhiṣācaḥ svarvidaḥ svargiro brahma sūktaṃ juṣerata
GV01rv_10_u:1382: RV_10.065.15.1{11} devān vasiṣṭho amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanābhipratasthuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1383: RV_10.065.15.2{11} te no rāsantāmurugāyamadya yūyaṃ pātasvastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1384: RV_10.066.01.1{12} devān huve bṛhacchravasaḥ svastaye jyotiṣkṛto adhvarasyapracetasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1385: RV_10.066.01.2{12} ye vāvṛdhuḥ prataraṃ viśvavedasaindrajyeṣṭhāso amṛtā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1386: RV_10.066.02.1{12} indraprasūtā varuṇapraśiṣṭā ye sūryasya jyotiṣo bhāgamānaśuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1387: RV_10.066.02.2{12} marudgaṇe vṛjane manma dhīmahi māghone yajñaṃjanayanta sūrayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1388: RV_10.066.03.1{12} indro vasubhiḥ pari pātu no gayamādityairno aditḥ śarmayachtu
GV01rv_10_u:1389: RV_10.066.03.2{12} rudro rudrebhirdevo mṛḷayāti nastvaṣṭā nognābhiḥ suvitāya jinvatu
GV01rv_10_u:1391: RV_10.066.04.2{12} devānādityānavase havāmahe vasūn rudrāṃsavitāraṃ sudaṃsasam
GV01rv_10_u:1392: RV_10.066.05.1{12} sarasvān dhībhirvaruṇo dhṛtavratḥ pūṣā viṣṇurmahimāvāyuraśvinā
GV01rv_10_u:1393: RV_10.066.05.2{12} brahmakṛto amṛtā viśvavedasaḥ śarma noyaṃsan trivarūthamaṃhasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1394: RV_10.066.06.1{13} vṛṣā yajño vṛṣaṇaḥ santu yajñiyā vṛṣaṇo devāvṛṣaṇo haviṣkṛtaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1395: RV_10.066.06.2{13} vṛṣaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvarīvṛṣā parjanyo vṛṣaṇo vṛṣastubhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1396: RV_10.066.07.1{13} agnīṣomā vṛṣaṇā vājasātaye purupraśastā vṛṣaṇā upabruve
GV01rv_10_u:1397: RV_10.066.07.2{13} yāvījire vṛṣaṇo devayajyayā tā naḥ śarmatrivarūthaṃ vi yaṃsataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1398: RV_10.066.08.1{13} dhṛtavratāḥ kṣatriyā yajñaniṣkṛto bṛhaddivā adhvarāṇāmabhiśriyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1401: RV_10.066.09.2{13} antarikṣaṃ svarā paprurūtaye vaśaṃ devāsastanvī ni māmṛjuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1402: RV_10.066.10.1{13} dhartāro diva ṛbhavaḥ suhastā vātāparjanyā mahiṣasyatanyatoḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1403: RV_10.066.10.2{13} āpa oṣadhīḥ pra tirantu no giro bhago rātirvājino yantu me havam
GV01rv_10_u:1404: RV_10.066.11.1{14} samudraḥ sindhū rajo antarikṣamaja ekapāt tanayitnurarṇavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1405: RV_10.066.11.2{14} ahirbudhnyaḥ śṛṇavad vacāṃsi me viśve devāsauta sūrayo mama
GV01rv_10_u:1406: RV_10.066.12.1{14} syāma vo manavo devavītaye prāñcaṃ no yajñaṃ pra ṇayatasādhuyā
GV01rv_10_u:1407: RV_10.066.12.2{14} ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sudānava imā brahmaśasyamānāni jinvata
GV01rv_10_u:1408: RV_10.066.13.1{14} daivyā hotārā prathamā purohita ṛtasya panthāmanvemisādhuyā
GV01rv_10_u:1409: RV_10.066.13.2{14} kṣetrasya patiṃ prativeśamīmahe viśvān devānamṛtānaprayuchataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1410: RV_10.066.14.1{14} vasiṣṭhāsaḥ pitṛvad vācamakrata devānīḷānā ṛṣivatsvastaye
GV01rv_10_u:1411: RV_10.066.14.2{14} prītā iva jñātayaḥ kāmametyāsme devāso 'vadhūnutā vasu
GV01rv_10_u:1413: RV_10.067.01.1{15} imāṃ dhiyaṃ saptaśīrṣṇīṃ pitā na ṛtaprajātāṃ bṛhatīmavindat
GV01rv_10_u:1414: RV_10.067.01.2{15} turīyaṃ svijjanayad viśvajanyo 'yāsya ukthamindrāya śaṃsan
GV01rv_10_u:1415: RV_10.067.02.1{15} ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛju dīdhyānā divas putrāso asurasyavīrāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1416: RV_10.067.02.2{15} vipraṃ padamaṅgiraso dadhānā yajñasya dhāmaprathamaṃ mananta
GV01rv_10_u:1419: RV_10.067.04.1{15} avo dvābhyāṃ para ekayā gā guhā tiṣṭhantīranṛtasyasetau
GV01rv_10_u:1420: RV_10.067.04.2{15} bṛhaspatistamasi jyotirichannudusrā ākarvihi tisra āvaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1421: RV_10.067.05.1{15} vibhidyā puraṃ śayāthemapācīṃ nistrīṇi sākamudadherakṛntat
GV01rv_10_u:1422: RV_10.067.05.2{15} bṛhaspatiruṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gāmarkaṃviveda stanayanniva dyauḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1423: RV_10.067.06.1{15} indro valaṃ rakṣitāraṃ dughānāṃ kareṇeva vi cakartāraveṇa
GV01rv_10_u:1425: RV_10.067.07.1{16} sa īṃ satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhirgodhāyasaṃ vidhanasairadardaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1427: RV_10.067.08.1{16} te satyena manasā gopatiṃ gā iyānāsa iṣaṇayantadhībhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1429: RV_10.067.09.1{16} taṃ vardhayanto matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃ)
GV01rv_10_u:1431: RV_10.067.09.2{16} bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ śūrasātau bhare-bhare anumadema jiṣṇum
GV01rv_10_u:1433: RV_10.067.10.2{16} bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhayanto nānā santobibhrato jyotirāsā
GV01rv_10_u:1434: RV_10.067.11.1{16} satyāmāśiṣaṃ kṛṇutā vayodhai kīriṃ cid dhyavathasvebhirevaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1435: RV_10.067.11.2{16} paścā mṛdho apa bhavantu viśvāstadrodasī śṛṇutaṃ viśvaminve
GV01rv_10_u:1436: RV_10.067.12.1{16} indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vi mūrdhānamabhinadarbudasya
GV01rv_10_u:1437: RV_10.067.12.2{16} ahannahimariṇāt sapta sindhūn devairdyāvāpṛthivīprāvataṃ naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1438: RV_10.068.01.1{17} udapruto na vayo rakṣamāṇā vāvadato abhriyasyeva ghoṣāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1439: RV_10.068.01.2{17} giribhrajo normayo madanto bṛhaspatimabhyarkā anāvan
GV01rv_10_u:1440: RV_10.068.02.1{17} saṃ gobhirāṅgiraso nakṣamāṇo bhaga ivedaryamaṇaṃnināya
GV01rv_10_u:1441: RV_10.068.02.2{17} jane mitro na dampatī anakti bṛhaspatevājayāśūnrivājau
GV01rv_10_u:1443: RV_10.068.03.2{17} bṛhaspatiḥ parvate bhyo vitūryā nirgāūpe yavamiva sthivibhyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1444: RV_10.068.04.1{17} āpruṣāyan madhuna ṛtasya yonimavakṣipannarka ulkāmivadyoḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1445: RV_10.068.04.2{17} bṛhaspatiruddharannaśmano gā bhūmyā udneva vitvacaṃ bibheda
GV01rv_10_u:1446: RV_10.068.05.1{17} apa jyotiṣā tamo antarikṣādudnaḥ śīpālamiva vātaājat
GV01rv_10_u:1447: RV_10.068.05.2{17} bṛhaspatiranumṛśyā valasyābhramiva vāta ā cakraā gāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1448: RV_10.068.06.1{17} yadā valasya pīyato jasuṃ bhed bṛhaspatiragnitapobhirarkaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1450: RV_10.068.07.1{18} bṛhaspatiramata hi tyadāsāṃ nāma svarīṇāṃ sadaneguhā yat
GV01rv_10_u:1451: RV_10.068.07.2{18} āṇḍeva bhittvā śakunasya garbhamudusriyāḥparvatasya tmanājat
GV01rv_10_u:1452: RV_10.068.08.1{18} aśnāpinaddhaṃ madhu paryapaśyan matsyaṃ na dīna udanikṣiyantam
GV01rv_10_u:1453: RV_10.068.08.2{18} niṣ ṭajjabhāra camasaṃ na vṛkṣādbṛhaspatirviraveṇā vikṛtya
GV01rv_10_u:1454: RV_10.068.09.1{18} soṣāmavindat sa svaḥ so agniṃ so arkeṇa vi babādhetamāṃsi
GV01rv_10_u:1455: RV_10.068.09.2{18} bṛhaspatirgovapuṣo valasya nirmajjānaṃ naparvaṇo jabhāra
GV01rv_10_u:1456: RV_10.068.10.1{18} himeva parṇā muṣitā vanāni bṛhaspatinākṛpayad valo gāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1458: RV_10.068.11.1{18} abhi śyāvaṃ na kṛśanebhiraśvaṃ nakṣatrebhiḥ pitarodyāmapiṃśan
GV01rv_10_u:1459: RV_10.068.11.2{18} rātryāṃ tamo adadhurjyotirahanbṛhaspatirbhinadadriṃ vidad gāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1460: RV_10.068.12.1{18} idamakarma namo abhriyāya yaḥ pūrvīranvānonavīti
GV01rv_10_u:1461: RV_10.068.12.2{18} bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ so aśvaiḥ sa vīrebhiḥ sanṛbhirno vayo dhāt
GV01rv_10_u:1462: RV_10.069.01.1{19} bhadrā agnervadhryaśvasya sandṛśo vāmī praṇītiḥsuraṇā upetayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1463: RV_10.069.01.2{19} yadīṃ sumitrā viśo agra indhateghṛtenāhuto jarate davidyutat
GV01rv_10_u:1464: RV_10.069.02.1{19} ghṛtamagnervadhryaśvasya vardhanaṃ ghṛtamannaṃ ghṛtaṃ vasya medanam
GV01rv_10_u:1465: RV_10.069.02.2{19} ghṛtenāhuta urviyā vi paprathe sūrya ivarocate sarpirāsutiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1466: RV_10.069.03.1{19} yat te manuryadanīkaṃ sumitraḥ samīdhe agne tadidaṃnavīyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1467: RV_10.069.03.2{19} sa revacchoca sa giro juṣasva sa vājaṃ darṣisa iha śravo dhāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1468: RV_10.069.04.1{19} yaṃ tvā pūrvamīḷito vadhryaśvaḥ samīdhe agne sa idaṃjuṣasva
GV01rv_10_u:1469: RV_10.069.04.2{19} sa na stipā uta bhavā tanūpā dātraṃ rakṣasvayadidaṃ te asme
GV01rv_10_u:1470: RV_10.069.05.1{19} bhavā dyumnī vādhryaśvota gopā mā tvā tārīdabhimātirjanānām
GV01rv_10_u:1471: RV_10.069.05.2{19} śūra iva dhṛṣṇuścyavanaḥ sumitraḥ pra nuvocaṃ vādhryaśvasya nāma
GV01rv_10_u:1472: RV_10.069.06.1{19} samajryā parvatyā vasūni dāsā vṛtrāṇyāryā jigetha
GV01rv_10_u:1473: RV_10.069.06.2{19} śūra iva dhṛṣṇuścyavano janānāṃ tvamagne pṛtanāyūnrabhi ṣyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1475: RV_10.069.07.2{20} dyumān dyumatsu nṛbhirmṛjyamānaḥ sumitreṣu dīdayodevayatsu
GV01rv_10_u:1476: RV_10.069.08.1{20} tve dhenuḥ sudughā jātavedo 'saścateva samanā sabardhuk
GV01rv_10_u:1478: RV_10.069.09.1{20} devāścit te amṛtā jātavedo mahimānaṃ vādhryaśva pra vocan
GV01rv_10_u:1479: RV_10.069.09.2{20} yat sampṛchaṃ mānuṣīrviśa āyan tvaṃ nṛbhirajayastvāvṛdhebhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1480: RV_10.069.10.1{20} piteva putramabibharupasthe tvāmagne vadhryaśvaḥ saparyanjuṣāṇo asya samidhaṃ yaviṣṭhota pūrvānavanorvrādhataścit
GV01rv_10_u:1484: RV_10.069.12.2{20} sa no ajāmīnruta vā vijāmīnabhitiṣṭha śardhato vādhryaśva
GV01rv_10_u:1485: RV_10.070.01.1{21} imāṃ me agne samidhaṃ juṣasveḷas pade prati haryāghṛtācīm
GV01rv_10_u:1486: RV_10.070.01.2{21} varṣman pṛthivyāḥ sudinatve ahnāmūrdhvobhava sukrato devayajyā
GV01rv_10_u:1487: RV_10.070.02.1{21} ā devānāmagrayāveha yātu narāśaṃso viśvarūpebhiraśvaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1488: RV_10.070.02.2{21} ṛtasya pathā namasā miyedho devebhyo devatamaḥsuṣūdat
GV01rv_10_u:1489: RV_10.070.03.1{21} śaśvattamamīḷate dūtyāya haviṣmanto manuṣyāso agnim
GV01rv_10_u:1490: RV_10.070.03.2{21} vahiṣṭhairaśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathenā devān vakṣi niṣadeha hotā
GV01rv_10_u:1491: RV_10.070.04.1{21} vi prathatāṃ devajuṣṭaṃ tiraścā dīrghaṃ drāghmāsurabhi bhūtvasme
GV01rv_10_u:1492: RV_10.070.04.2{21} aheḷatā manasā deva barhirindrajyeṣṭhānuśato yakṣi devān
GV01rv_10_u:1493: RV_10.070.05.1{21} divo vā sānu spṛśatā varīyaḥ pṛthivyā vā mātrayā viśrayadhvam
GV01rv_10_u:1495: RV_10.070.06.1{22} devī divo duhitarā suśilpe uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ niyonau
GV01rv_10_u:1496: RV_10.070.06.2{22} ā vāṃ devāsa uśatī uśanta urau sīdantu subhageupasthe
GV01rv_10_u:1497: RV_10.070.07.1{22} ūrdhvo grāvā bṛhadagniḥ samiddhaḥ priyā dhāmānyaditerupasthe
GV01rv_10_u:1498: RV_10.070.07.2{22} purohitāv ṛtvijā yajñe asmin viduṣṭarādraviṇamā yajethām
GV01rv_10_u:1499: RV_10.070.08.1{22} tisro devīrbarhiridaṃ varīya ā sīdata cakṛmā vaḥsyonam
GV01rv_10_u:1500: RV_10.070.08.2{22} manuṣvad yajñaṃ sudhitā havīṃṣīḷā devīghṛtapadī juṣanta
GV01rv_10_u:1501: RV_10.070.09.1{22} deva tvaṣṭaryad dha cārutvamānaḍ yadaṅgirasāmabhavaḥ sacābhūḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1502: RV_10.070.09.2{22} sa devānāṃ pātha upa pra vidvānuśan yakṣi draviṇodaḥ suratnaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1503: RV_10.070.10.1{22} vanaspate raśanayā niyūyā devānāṃ pātha upa vakṣividvān
GV01rv_10_u:1504: RV_10.070.10.2{22} svadāti devaḥ kṛṇavad dhavīṃṣyavatāndyāvāpṛthivī havaṃ me
GV01rv_10_u:1505: RV_10.070.11.1{22} āgne vaha varuṇamiṣṭaye na indraṃ divo marutoantarikṣāt
GV01rv_10_u:1506: RV_10.070.11.2{22} sīdantu barhirviśva ā yajatrāḥ svāhādevā amṛtā mādayantām
GV01rv_10_u:1507: RV_10.071.01.1{23} bṛhaspate prathamaṃ vāco agraṃ yat prairata nāmadheyandadhānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1508: RV_10.071.01.2{23} yadeṣāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yadaripramāsītpreṇā tadeṣāṃ nihitaṃ guhāviḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1509: RV_10.071.02.1{23} saktumiva-tita-unā punanto yatra dhīrā manasā vācamakrata
GV01rv_10_u:1510: RV_10.071.02.2{23} atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate bhadraiṣāṃlakṣmīrnihitādhi vāci
GV01rv_10_u:1512: RV_10.071.03.2{23} tāmābhṛtyā vyadadhuḥ purutrā tāṃ saptarebhā abhi saṃ navante
GV01rv_10_u:1513: RV_10.071.04.1{23} uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vācamuta tvaḥ śṛṇvan naśṛṇotyenām
GV01rv_10_u:1514: RV_10.071.04.2{23} uto tvasmai tanvaṃ vi sasre jāyeva patyauśatī suvāsāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1515: RV_10.071.05.1{23} uta tvaṃ sakhye sthirapītamāhurnainaṃ hinvantyapivājineṣu
GV01rv_10_u:1516: RV_10.071.05.2{23} adhenvā carati māyayaiṣa vācaṃ śuśruvānaphalāmapuṣpām
GV01rv_10_u:1517: RV_10.071.06.1{24} yastityāja sacividaṃ sakhāyaṃ na tasya vācyapi bhāgoasti
GV01rv_10_u:1518: RV_10.071.06.2{24} yadīṃ śṛṇotyalakaṃ śṛṇoti nahi praveda sukṛtasyapanthām
GV01rv_10_u:1520: RV_10.071.07.2{24} ādaghnāsa upakakṣāsa u tve hradā iva snātvā utve dadṛśre
GV01rv_10_u:1521: RV_10.071.08.1{24} hṛdā taṣṭeṣu manaso javeṣu yad brāhmaṇāḥ saṃyajantesakhāyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1522: RV_10.071.08.2{24} atrāha tvaṃ vi jahurvedyābhirohabrahmāṇo vicarantyu tve
GV01rv_10_u:1523: RV_10.071.09.1{24} ime ye nārvāṃ na paraścaranti na brāhmaṇāso nasutekarāsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1524: RV_10.071.09.2{24} ta ete vācamabhipadya pāpayā sirīstantraṃ tanvate aprajajñayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1525: RV_10.071.10.1{24} sarve nandanti yaśasāgatena sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1527: RV_10.071.11.1{24} ṛcāṃ tvaḥ poṣamāste pupuṣvān gāyatraṃ tvo gāyatiśakvarīṣu
GV01rv_10_u:1528: RV_10.071.11.2{24} brahmā tvo vadati jātavidyāṃ yajñasyamātrāṃ vi mimīta u tvaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1529: RV_10.072.01.1{01} devānāṃ nu vayaṃ jānā pra vocāma vipanyayā
GV01rv_10_u:1531: RV_10.072.02.1{01} brahmaṇas patiretā saṃ karmāra ivādhamat
GV01rv_10_u:1535: RV_10.072.04.1{01} bhūrjajña uttānapado bhuva āśā ajāyanta
GV01rv_10_u:1537: RV_10.072.05.1{01} aditirhyajaniṣṭa dakṣa yā duhitā tava
GV01rv_10_u:1539: RV_10.072.06.1{02} yad devā adaḥ salile susaṃrabdhā atiṣṭhata
GV01rv_10_u:1541: RV_10.072.07.1{02} yad devā yatayo yathā bhuvanānyapinvata
GV01rv_10_u:1543: RV_10.072.08.1{02} aṣṭau putrāso aditerye jātāstanvas pari
GV01rv_10_u:1545: RV_10.072.09.1{02} saptabhiḥ putrairaditirupa prait pūrvyaṃ yugam
GV01rv_10_u:1547: RV_10.073.01.1{03} janiṣthā ugraḥ sahase turāya mandra ojiṣṭhobahulābhimānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1548: RV_10.073.01.2{03} avardhannindraṃ marutaścidatra mātāyad vīraṃ dadhanad dhaniṣṭhā
GV01rv_10_u:1549: RV_10.073.02.1{03} druho niṣattā pṛśanī cidevaiḥ purū śaṃsena vāvṛdhuṣṭa indram
GV01rv_10_u:1550: RV_10.073.02.2{03} abhīvṛteva tā mahāpadena dhvāntāt prapitvādudaranta garbhāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1551: RV_10.073.03.1{03} ṛṣvā te pādā pra yajjigāsyavardhan vājā uta ye cidatra
GV01rv_10_u:1552: RV_10.073.03.2{03} tvamindra sālāvṛkān sahasramāsan dadhiṣe aśvināvavṛtyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1553: RV_10.073.04.1{03} samanā tūrṇirupa yāsi yajñamā nāsatyā sakhyāyavakṣi
GV01rv_10_u:1554: RV_10.073.04.2{03} vasāvyāmindra dhārayaḥ sahasrāśvinā śūra dadaturmaghāni
GV01rv_10_u:1555: RV_10.073.05.1{03} mandamāna ṛtādadhi prajāyai sakhibhirindra iṣirebhirartham
GV01rv_10_u:1556: RV_10.073.05.2{03} ābhirhi māyā upa dasyumāgān mihaḥ pratamrā avapat tamāṃsi
GV01rv_10_u:1557: RV_10.073.06.1{04} sanāmānā cid dhvasayo nyasmā avāhannindra uṣasoyathānaḥ ṛṣvairagachaḥ sakhibhirnikāmaiḥ sākampratiṣṭhā hṛdyā jaghantha
GV01rv_10_u:1558: RV_10.073.07.1{04} tvaṃ jaghantha namuciṃ makhasyuṃ dāsaṃ kṛṇvāna ṛṣayevimāyam
GV01rv_10_u:1559: RV_10.073.07.2{04} tvaṃ cakartha manave syonān patho devatrāñjasevayānān
GV01rv_10_u:1560: RV_10.073.08.1{04} tvametāni papriṣe vi nāmeśāna indra dadhiṣe gabhastau
GV01rv_10_u:1561: RV_10.073.08.2{04} anu tvā devāḥ śavasā madantyuparibudhnān vaninaścakartha
GV01rv_10_u:1562: RV_10.073.09.1{04} cakraṃ yadasyāpsvā niṣattamuto tadasmai madhviccachadyāt
GV01rv_10_u:1563: RV_10.073.09.2{04} pṛthivyāmatiṣitaṃ yadūdhaḥ payo goṣvadadhā oṣadhīṣu
GV01rv_10_u:1564: RV_10.073.10.1{04} aśvādiyāyeti yad vadantyojaso jātamuta manya enam
GV01rv_10_u:1565: RV_10.073.10.2{04} manyoriyāya harmyeṣu tasthau yataḥ prajajña indro asya veda
GV01rv_10_u:1566: RV_10.073.11.1{04} vayaḥ suparṇā upa sedurindraṃ priyamedhā ṛṣayonādhamānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1567: RV_10.073.11.2{04} apa dhvāntamūrṇuhi pūrdhi cakṣurmumugdhyasmān nidhayeva baddhān
GV01rv_10_u:1568: RV_10.074.01.1{05} vasūnāṃ vā carkṛṣa iyakṣan dhiyā vā yajñairvārodasyoḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1569: RV_10.074.01.2{05} arvanto vā ye rayimantaḥ sātau vanuṃ vā yesuśruṇaṃ suśruto dhuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1570: RV_10.074.02.1{05} hava eṣāmasuro nakṣata dyāṃ śravasyatā manasā niṃsatakṣā
GV01rv_10_u:1571: RV_10.074.02.2{05} cakṣāṇā yatra suvitāya devā dyaurna vārebhiḥkṛṇavanta svaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1572: RV_10.074.03.1{05} iyameṣāmamṛtānāṃ gīḥ sarvatātā ye kṛpaṇanta ratnam
GV01rv_10_u:1573: RV_10.074.03.2{05} dhiyaṃ ca yajñaṃ ca sādhantaste no dhāntu vasavyamasāmi
GV01rv_10_u:1574: RV_10.074.04.1{05} ā tat ta indrāyavaḥ panantabhi ya ūrvaṃ gomantantitṛtsān
GV01rv_10_u:1575: RV_10.074.04.2{05} sakṛtsvaṃ ye puruputrāṃ mahīṃ sahasradhārāmbṛhatīṃ dudukṣan
GV01rv_10_u:1576: RV_10.074.05.1{05} śacīva indramavase kṛṇudhvamanānataṃ damayantaṃ pṛtanyūn
GV01rv_10_u:1577: RV_10.074.05.2{05} ṛbhukṣaṇaṃ maghavānaṃ suvṛktiṃ bhartā yo vajraṃ naryampurukṣuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1578: RV_10.074.06.1{05} yad vāvāna purutamaṃ purāṣāḷ ā vṛtrahendro nāmānyaprāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1579: RV_10.074.06.2{05} aceti prāsahas patistuviṣmān yadīmuśmasikartave karat tat
GV01rv_10_u:1580: RV_10.075.01.1{06} pra su va āpo mahimānamuttamaṃ kārurvocāti sadanevivasvataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1581: RV_10.075.01.2{06} pra sapta-sapta tredhā hi cakramuḥ prasṛtvarīṇāmati sindhurojasā
GV01rv_10_u:1582: RV_10.075.02.1{06} pra te 'radad varuṇo yātave pathaḥ sindho yad vājānabhyadravastvam
GV01rv_10_u:1583: RV_10.075.02.2{06} bhūmyā adhi pravatā yāsi sānunā yadeṣāmagraṃ jagatāmirajyasi
GV01rv_10_u:1584: RV_10.075.03.1{06} divi svano yatate bhūmyoparyanantaṃ śuṣmamudiyartibhānunā
GV01rv_10_u:1585: RV_10.075.03.2{06} abhrādiva pra stanayanti vṛṣṭayaḥ sindhuryadeti vṛṣabho na roruvat
GV01rv_10_u:1586: RV_10.075.04.1{06} abhi tvā sindho śiśumin na mātaro vāśrā arṣantipayaseva dhenavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1587: RV_10.075.04.2{06} rājeva yudhvā nayasi tvamit sicau yadāsāmagraṃ pravatāminakṣasi
GV01rv_10_u:1588: RV_10.075.05.1{06} imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri stemaṃ sacatā paruṣṇyā
GV01rv_10_u:1590: RV_10.075.06.1{07} tṛṣṭāmayā prathamaṃ yātave sajūḥ sasartvā rasayāśvetyā tyā
GV01rv_10_u:1591: RV_10.075.06.2{07} tvaṃ sindho kubhayā gomatīṃ krumummehatnvā sarathaṃ yābhirīyase
GV01rv_10_u:1592: RV_10.075.07.1{07} ṛjītyenī ruśatī mahitvā pari jrayāṃsi bharate rajāṃsi
GV01rv_10_u:1593: RV_10.075.07.2{07} adabdhā sindhurapasāmapastamāśvā na citrāvapuṣīva darśatā
GV01rv_10_u:1594: RV_10.075.08.1{07} svaśvā sindhuḥ surathā suvāsā hiraṇyayī sukṛtāvājinīvatī
GV01rv_10_u:1595: RV_10.075.08.2{07} ūrṇāvatī yuvatiḥ sīlamāvatyutādhi vastesubhagā madhuvṛdham
GV01rv_10_u:1596: RV_10.075.09.1{07} sukhaṃ rathaṃ yuyuje sidhuraśvinaṃ tena vājaṃ saniṣadasminnājau
GV01rv_10_u:1597: RV_10.075.09.2{07} mahān hyasya mahimā panasyate 'dabdhasyasvayaśaso virapśinaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1598: RV_10.076.01.1{08} ā va ṛñjasa ūrjāṃ vyuṣṭiṣvindraṃ maruto rodasīanaktana
GV01rv_10_u:1599: RV_10.076.01.2{08} ubhe yathā no ahanī sacābhuvā sadaḥ-sadovarivasyāta udbhidā
GV01rv_10_u:1602: RV_10.076.02.2{08} vidad dhyaryo abhibhūti pauṃsyaṃ maho rāye cittarute yadarvataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1603: RV_10.076.03.1{08} tadid dhyasya savanaṃ viverapo yathā purā manavegātumaśret
GV01rv_10_u:1605: RV_10.076.04.1{08} apa hata rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvata skabhāyata nir{ṛ}tiṃsedhatāmatim
GV01rv_10_u:1606: RV_10.076.04.2{08} ā no rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ sunotana devāvyambharata ślokamadrayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1609: RV_10.076.06.1{09} bhurantu no yaśasaḥ sotvandhaso grāvāṇo vācā divitādivitmatā
GV01rv_10_u:1610: RV_10.076.06.2{09} naro yatra duhate kāmyaṃ madhvāghoṣayantoabhito mithasturaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1611: RV_10.076.07.1{09} sunvanti somaṃ rathirāso adrayo nirasya rasaṃ gaviṣoduhanti te
GV01rv_10_u:1612: RV_10.076.07.2{09} duhantyūdharupasecanāya kaṃ naro havya nāmarjayanta āsabhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1613: RV_10.076.08.1{09} ete naraḥ svapaso abhūtana ya indrāya sunutha somamadrayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1614: RV_10.076.08.2{09} vāmaṃ-vāmaṃ vo divyāya dhāmne vasu-vasu vaḥ pārthivayasunvate
GV01rv_10_u:1615: RV_10.077.01.1{10} abhrapruṣo na vācā pruṣā vasu haviṣmanto na yajñāvijānuṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1616: RV_10.077.01.2{10} sumārutaṃ na brahmāṇamarhase gaṇamastoṣyeṣāṃ na śobhase
GV01rv_10_u:1617: RV_10.077.02.1{10} śriye maryāso añjīnrakṛṇvata sumarutaṃ na pūrviratikṣapaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1618: RV_10.077.02.2{10} divas putrāsa etā na yetira ādityāsaste akrana vāvṛdhuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1619: RV_10.077.03.1{10} pra ye divaḥ pṛthivya na barhaṇā tmanā riricre abhrānna sūryaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1620: RV_10.077.03.2{10} pājasvanto na vīrāḥ panasyavo riśādaso namaryā abhidyavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1621: RV_10.077.04.1{10} yuṣmākaṃ budhne apāṃ na yāmani vithuryati na mahīśratharyati
GV01rv_10_u:1622: RV_10.077.04.2{10} viśvapsuryajño arvāgayaṃ su vaḥprayasvanto na satrāca ā gata
GV01rv_10_u:1623: RV_10.077.05.1{10} yūyaṃ dhūrṣu prayujo na raśmibhirjyotiṣmanto na bhāsāvyuṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_10_u:1624: RV_10.077.05.2{10} śyenāso na svayaśaso riśādasaḥ pravāsona prasitāsaḥ paripruṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1625: RV_10.077.06.1{11} pra yad vahadhve marutaḥ parākād yūyaṃ mahaḥsaṃvaraṇasya vasvaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1627: RV_10.077.07.1{11} ya udṛci yajñe adhvareṣṭhā marudbhyo na mānuṣo dadāśat
GV01rv_10_u:1628: RV_10.077.07.2{11} revat sa vayo dadhate suvīraṃ sa devānāmapi gopītheastu
GV01rv_10_u:1629: RV_10.077.08.1{11} te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsa ūmā ādityena nāmnāśambhaviṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1630: RV_10.077.08.2{11} te no 'vantu rathatūrmanīṣāṃ mahaścayāmannadhvare cakānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1631: RV_10.078.01.1{12} viprāso na manmabhiḥ svādhyo devāvyo na yajñaiḥsvapnasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1632: RV_10.078.01.2{12} rājāno na citrāḥ susandṛśaḥ kṣitīnāṃ namaryā arepasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1633: RV_10.078.02.1{12} agnirna ye bhājasā rukmavakṣaso vātāso na svayujaḥsadyaūtayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1634: RV_10.078.02.2{12} prajñātāro na jyeṣṭhāḥ sunītayaḥsuśarmāṇo na somā ṛtaṃ yate
GV01rv_10_u:1635: RV_10.078.03.1{12} vātāso na ye dhunayo jigatnavo 'gnīnāṃ na jihvāvirokiṇaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1636: RV_10.078.03.2{12} varmaṇvanto na yodhāḥ śimīvantaḥ pitṝṇāṃna śaṃsāḥ surātayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1637: RV_10.078.04.1{12} rathānāṃ na ye 'rāḥ sanābhayo jigīvāṃso na śūrāabhidyavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1638: RV_10.078.04.2{12} vareyavo na maryā ghṛtapruṣo 'bhisvartāroarkaṃ na suṣṭubhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1639: RV_10.078.05.1{12} aśvāso na ye jyeṣṭhāsa āśavo didhiṣavo na rathyaḥsudānavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1640: RV_10.078.05.2{12} āpo na nimnairudabhirjigatnavo viśvarūpāaṅgiraso na sāmabhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1641: RV_10.078.06.1{13} grāvāṇo na sūrayaḥ sindhumātara ādardirāso adrayo naviśvahā
GV01rv_10_u:1642: RV_10.078.06.2{13} śiśūlā na krīḷayaḥ sumātaro mahāgrāmo nayāmannuta tviṣā
GV01rv_10_u:1643: RV_10.078.07.1{13} uṣasāṃ na ketavo 'dhvaraśriyaḥ śubhaṃyavo nāñjibhirvyaśvitan
GV01rv_10_u:1644: RV_10.078.07.2{13} sindhavo na yayiyo bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ parāvato nayojanāni mamire
GV01rv_10_u:1645: RV_10.078.08.1{13} subhāgān no devāḥ kṛṇutā suratnānasmān stotṝn marutovāvṛdhānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1646: RV_10.078.08.2{13} adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gāta sanād dhi voratnadheyāni santi
GV01rv_10_u:1647: RV_10.079.01.1{14} apaśyamasya mahato mahitvamamartyasya martyāsu vikṣu
GV01rv_10_u:1648: RV_10.079.01.2{14} nānā hanū vibhṛte saṃ bharete asinvatī bapsatī bhūryattaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1649: RV_10.079.02.1{14} guhā śiro nihitam ṛdhagakṣī asinvannatti jihvayāvanāni
GV01rv_10_u:1650: RV_10.079.02.2{14} atrāṇyasmai paḍbhiḥ saṃ bharantyuttānahastānamasādhi vikṣu
GV01rv_10_u:1651: RV_10.079.03.1{14} pra mātuḥ prataraṃ guhyamichan kumāro na vīrudhaḥsarpadurvīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1652: RV_10.079.03.2{14} sasaṃ na pakvamavidacchucantaṃririhvāṃsaṃ ripa upasthe antaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1653: RV_10.079.04.1{14} tad vām ṛtaṃ rodasī pra bravīmi jāyamāno mātarā garbhoatti
GV01rv_10_u:1654: RV_10.079.04.2{14} nāhaṃ devasya martyaściketāgniraṅga vicetāḥ sapracetāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1656: RV_10.079.05.2{14} tasmai sahasramakṣabhirvi cakṣe 'gne viśvataḥpratyaṃṃ asi tvam
GV01rv_10_u:1657: RV_10.079.06.1{14} kiṃ deveṣu tyaja enaścakarthāgne pṛchāmi nu tvāmavidvān
GV01rv_10_u:1658: RV_10.079.06.2{14} akrīḷan krīḷan harirattave 'dan vi parvaśaścakarta gāmivāsiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1659: RV_10.079.07.1{14} viṣūco aśvān yuyuje vanejā ṛjītibhī raśanābhirgṛbhītān
GV01rv_10_u:1660: RV_10.079.07.2{14} cakṣade mitro vasubhiḥ sujātaḥ samānṛdheparvabhirvāvṛdhānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1661: RV_10.080.01.1{15} agniḥ saptiṃ vājambharaṃ dadātyagnirvīraṃ śrutyaṃkarmaniṣṭhām
GV01rv_10_u:1662: RV_10.080.01.2{15} agnī rodasī vi carat samañjannagnirnārīṃ vīrakukṣiṃ purandhim
GV01rv_10_u:1663: RV_10.080.02.1{15} agnerapnasaḥ samidastu bhadrāgnirmahī rodasī ā viveśa
GV01rv_10_u:1664: RV_10.080.02.2{15} agnirekaṃ codayat samatsvagnirvṛtrāṇi dayate purūṇi
GV01rv_10_u:1665: RV_10.080.03.1{15} agnirha tyaṃ jarataḥ karṇamāvāgniradbhyo niradahajjarūtham
GV01rv_10_u:1666: RV_10.080.03.2{15} agniratriṃ gharma uruṣyadantaragnirnṛmedhampra jayāsṛjat sam
GV01rv_10_u:1667: RV_10.080.04.1{15} agnirdād draviṇaṃ vīrapeśā agnir{ṛ}ṣiṃ yaḥ sahasrāsanoti
GV01rv_10_u:1669: RV_10.080.05.1{15} agnimukthair{ṛ}ṣayo vi hvayante 'gniṃ naro yāmanibādhitāsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1670: RV_10.080.05.2{15} agniṃ vayo antarikṣe patanto 'gniḥ sahasrāpari yāti gonām
GV01rv_10_u:1671: RV_10.080.06.1{15} agniṃ viśa īḷate mānuṣīryā agniṃ manuṣo nahuṣo vijātāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1672: RV_10.080.06.2{15} agnirgāndharvīṃ pathyām ṛtasyāgnergavyūtirghṛta ā niṣattā
GV01rv_10_u:1673: RV_10.080.07.1{15} agnaye brahma ṛbhavastatakṣuragniṃ mahāmavocāmā suvṛktim
GV01rv_10_u:1674: RV_10.080.07.2{15} agne prāva jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭhāgne mahi draviṇamāyajasva
GV01rv_10_u:1675: RV_10.081.01.1{16} ya imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhvad ṛṣirhotā nyasīdatpitā naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1676: RV_10.081.01.2{16} sa āśiṣā draviṇamichamānaḥ prathamachadavarānā viveśa
GV01rv_10_u:1678: RV_10.081.02.2{16} yato bhūmiṃ janayan viśvakarma vi dyāmaurṇon mahinā viśvacakṣāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1680: RV_10.081.03.2{16} saṃ bāhubhyāṃ dhamati saṃ patatrairdyāvābhūmī janayan deva ekaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1681: RV_10.081.04.1{16} kiṃ svid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsa yato dyāvāpṛthivīniṣṭatakṣuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1682: RV_10.081.04.2{16} manīṣiṇo manasā pṛchatedu tad yadadhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni dhārayan
GV01rv_10_u:1683: RV_10.081.05.1{16} yā te dhāmāni paramāṇi yāvamā yā madhyamāviśvakarmannutemā
GV01rv_10_u:1684: RV_10.081.05.2{16} śikṣā sakhibhyo haviṣi svadhāvaḥsvayaṃ yajasva tanvaṃ vṛdhānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1685: RV_10.081.06.1{16} viśvakarman haviṣā vāvṛdhānaḥ svayaṃ yajasva pṛthivīmuta dyām
GV01rv_10_u:1686: RV_10.081.06.2{16} muhyantvanye abhito janāsa ihāsmākaṃ maghavāsūrirastu
GV01rv_10_u:1687: RV_10.081.07.1{16} vācas patiṃ viśvakarmāṇamūtaye manojuvaṃ vāje adyāhuvema
GV01rv_10_u:1688: RV_10.081.07.2{16} sa no viśvāni havanāni joṣad viśvaśambhūravasesādhukarmā
GV01rv_10_u:1689: RV_10.082.01.1{17} cakṣuṣaḥ pitā manasā hi dhīro ghṛtamene ajanannannamāne
GV01rv_10_u:1690: RV_10.082.01.2{17} yadedantā adadṛhanta pūrva ādiddyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām
GV01rv_10_u:1691: RV_10.082.02.1{17} viśvakarmā vimanā ād vihāyā dhātā vidhātā paramotasandṛk
GV01rv_10_u:1692: RV_10.082.02.2{17} teṣāmiṣṭāni samiṣā madanti yatrāsaptaṛṣīn para ekamāhuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1693: RV_10.082.03.1{17} yo naḥ pitā janitā yo vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāniviśvā
GV01rv_10_u:1694: RV_10.082.03.2{17} yo devānāṃ nāmadhā eka eva taṃ sampraśnambhuvanā yantyanyā
GV01rv_10_u:1695: RV_10.082.04.1{17} ta āyajanta draviṇaṃ samasmā ṛṣayaḥ pūrve jaritāro nabhūnā
GV01rv_10_u:1696: RV_10.082.04.2{17} asūrte sūrte rajasi niṣatte ye bhūtānisamakṛṇvannimāni
GV01rv_10_u:1697: RV_10.082.05.1{17} paro divā para enā pṛthivyā paro devebhirasurairyadasti
GV01rv_10_u:1698: RV_10.082.05.2{17} kaṃ svid garbhaṃ prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥsamapaśyanta viśve
GV01rv_10_u:1699: RV_10.082.06.1{17} tamid garbhaṃ prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥsamagachanta viśve
GV01rv_10_u:1700: RV_10.082.06.2{17} ajasya nābhāvadhyekamarpitaṃyasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1701: RV_10.082.07.1{17} na taṃ vidātha ya imā jajānāyad yuṣmākamantarambabhūva
GV01rv_10_u:1702: RV_10.082.07.2{17} nīhāreṇa prāvṛtā jalpyā cāsutṛpa ukthaśāsaścaranti
GV01rv_10_u:1703: RV_10.083.01.1{18} yaste manyo 'vidhad vajra sāyaka saha ojaḥ puṣyati viśvamānuṣak
GV01rv_10_u:1704: RV_10.083.01.2{18} sāhyāma dāsamāryaṃ tvayā yujā sahaskṛtenasahasā sahasvatā
GV01rv_10_u:1705: RV_10.083.02.1{18} manyurindro manyurevāsa devo manyurhotā varuṇojātavedāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1706: RV_10.083.02.2{18} manyuṃ viśa īḷate mānuṣīryāḥ pāhi nomanyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1707: RV_10.083.03.1{18} abhīhi manyo tavasastavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn
GV01rv_10_u:1708: RV_10.083.03.2{18} amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhā ca viśvā vasūnyā bharātvaṃ naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1709: RV_10.083.04.1{18} tvaṃ hi manyo abhibhūtyojāḥ svayambhūrbhāmoabhimātiṣāhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1710: RV_10.083.04.2{18} viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahāvānasmāsvojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi
GV01rv_10_u:1711: RV_10.083.05.1{18} abhāgaḥ sannapa pareto asmi tava kratvā taviṣasyapracetaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1712: RV_10.083.05.2{18} taṃ tvā manyo akraturjihīḷāhaṃ svā tanūrbaladeyāya mehi
GV01rv_10_u:1713: RV_10.083.06.1{18} ayaṃ te asmyupa mehyarvāṃ pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśvadhāyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1714: RV_10.083.06.2{18} manyo vajrinnabhi māmā vavṛtsva hanāva dasyūnrutabodhyāpeḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1715: RV_10.083.07.1{18} abhi prehi dakṣiṇato bhavā me 'dhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāvabhūri
GV01rv_10_u:1716: RV_10.083.07.2{18} juhomi te dharuṇaṃ madhvo agramubhā upāṃśuprathamā pibāva
GV01rv_10_u:1717: RV_10.084.01.1{19} tvayā manyo sarathamārujanto harṣamāṇāso dhṛṣitāmarutvaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1718: RV_10.084.01.2{19} tigmeṣava āyudhā saṃśiśānā abhi pra yantunaro agnirūpāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1719: RV_10.084.02.1{19} agniriva manyo tviṣitaḥ sahasva senānīrnaḥ sahure hūtaedhi
GV01rv_10_u:1720: RV_10.084.02.2{19} hatvāya śatrūn vi bhajasva veda ojo mimāno vi mṛdhonudasva
GV01rv_10_u:1721: RV_10.084.03.1{19} sahasva manyo abhimātimasme rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan prehiśatrūn
GV01rv_10_u:1722: RV_10.084.03.2{19} ugraṃ te pājo nanvā rurudhre vaśī vaśaṃnayasa ekaja tvam
GV01rv_10_u:1723: RV_10.084.04.1{19} eko bahūnāmasi manyavīḷito viśaṃ-viśaṃ yudhaye saṃśiśādhi
GV01rv_10_u:1724: RV_10.084.04.2{19} akṛttaruk tvayā yujā vayaṃ dyumantaṃ ghoṣaṃvijayāya kṛṇmahe
GV01rv_10_u:1725: RV_10.084.05.1{19} vijeṣakṛdindra ivānavabravo 'smākaṃ manyo adhipā bhaveha
GV01rv_10_u:1726: RV_10.084.05.2{19} priyaṃ te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidmā tamutsaṃ yataābabhūtha
GV01rv_10_u:1727: RV_10.084.06.1{19} ābhūtyā sahajā vajra sāyaka saho bibharṣyabhibhūtauttaram
GV01rv_10_u:1730: RV_10.084.07.1{19} saṃsṛṣṭaṃ dhanamubhayaṃ samākṛtamasmabhyaṃ dattāṃvaruṇaśca manyuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1731: RV_10.084.07.2{19} bhiyaṃ dadhānā hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥparājitāso apa ni layantām
GV01rv_10_u:1733: RV_10.085.01.2{20} ṛtenādityāstiṣṭhanti divi somo adhi śritaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1734: RV_10.085.02.1{20} somenādityā balinaḥ somena pṛthivī mahī
GV01rv_10_u:1736: RV_10.085.03.1{20} somaṃ manyate papivan yat sampiṃṣantyoṣadhim
GV01rv_10_u:1737: RV_10.085.03.2{20} somaṃ yambrahmāṇo vidurna tasyāśnāti kaścana
GV01rv_10_u:1739: RV_10.085.04.2{20} gravṇāmicchṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1740: RV_10.085.05.1{20} yat tvā deva prapibanti tata ā pyāyase punaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1741: RV_10.085.05.2{20} vāyuḥsomasya rakṣitā samānāṃ māsa ākṛtiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1745: RV_10.085.07.2{21} dyaurbhūmiḥkośa āsīd yadayāt sūryā patim
GV01rv_10_u:1746: RV_10.085.08.1{21} stomā āsan pratidhayaḥ kuriraṃ chanda opaśaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1749: RV_10.085.09.2{21} sūryāṃyat patye śaṃsantīṃ manasā savitādadāt
GV01rv_10_u:1750: RV_10.085.10.1{21} mano asyā ana āsīd dyaurāsīduta chadiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1753: RV_10.085.11.2{22} śrotraṃ tecakre āstāṃ divi panthāścarācāraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1754: RV_10.085.12.1{22} śucī te cakre yātyā vyāno akṣa āhataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1756: RV_10.085.13.1{22} sūryāyā vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yamavāsṛjat
GV01rv_10_u:1759: RV_10.085.14.2{22} viśve devā anu tad vāmajānan putraḥpitarāvavṛṇīta pūṣā
GV01rv_10_u:1760: RV_10.085.15.1{22} yadayātaṃ śubhas patī vareyaṃ sūryāmupa
GV01rv_10_u:1761: RV_10.085.15.2{22} kvaikaṃcakraṃ vāmāsīt kva deṣṭrāya tasthathuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1762: RV_10.085.16.1{23} dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇa ṛtutha viduḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1763: RV_10.085.16.2{23} athaikaṃcakraṃ yad guhā tadaddhātaya id viduḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1764: RV_10.085.17.1{23} sūryāyai devebhyo mitrāya varuṇāya ca
GV01rv_10_u:1765: RV_10.085.17.2{23} ye bhūtasyapracetasa idaṃ tebhyo 'karaṃ namaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1766: RV_10.085.18.1{23} pūrvāparaṃ carato māyayaitau śiśū kriḷantau pari yatoadhvaram
GV01rv_10_u:1769: RV_10.085.19.2{23} bhāgaṃ devebhyo vi dadhātyāyan pra candramāstiratedīrghamayuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1770: RV_10.085.20.1{23} sukiṃśukaṃ śalmaliṃ viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyavarṇaṃ suvṛtaṃsucakram
GV01rv_10_u:1771: RV_10.085.20.2{23} ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokaṃ syonaṃ patye vahatuṃkṛṇuṣva
GV01rv_10_u:1772: RV_10.085.21.1{24} udīrṣvātaḥ pativatī hyeṣā viśvāvasuṃ namasāgīrbhirīḷe
GV01rv_10_u:1773: RV_10.085.21.2{24} anyāmicha pitṛṣadaṃ vyaktāṃ sa te bhāgojanuṣā tasya viddhi
GV01rv_10_u:1774: RV_10.085.22.1{24} udīrṣvāto viśvāvaso namaseḷā mahe tvā
GV01rv_10_u:1775: RV_10.085.22.2{24} anyāmichaprapharvyaṃ saṃ jāyāṃ patyā sṛja
GV01rv_10_u:1776: RV_10.085.23.1{24} anṛkṣarā ṛjavaḥ santu panthā yebhiḥ sakhāyo yanti novareyam
GV01rv_10_u:1777: RV_10.085.23.2{24} samaryamā saṃ bhago no ninīyāt saṃ jaspatyaṃsuyamamastu devāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1778: RV_10.085.24.1{24} pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitāsuśevaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1779: RV_10.085.24.2{24} ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke 'riṣṭāṃ tvā sahapatyā dadhāmi
GV01rv_10_u:1780: RV_10.085.25.1{24} preto muñcāmi nāmutaḥ subaddhāmamutas karam
GV01rv_10_u:1782: RV_10.085.26.1{25} pūṣā tveto nayatu hastagṛhyāśvinā tvā pra vahatāṃrathena
GV01rv_10_u:1783: RV_10.085.26.2{25} gṛhān gacha gṛhapatnī yathāso vaśinī tvaṃvidathamā vadāsi
GV01rv_10_u:1784: RV_10.085.27.1{25} iha priyaṃ prajayā te sam ṛdhyatāmasmin gṛhe gārhapatyāyajāgṛhi
GV01rv_10_u:1785: RV_10.085.27.2{25} enā patyā tanvaṃ saṃ sṛjasvādhā jivrī vidathamā vadāthaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1788: RV_10.085.29.1{25} parā dehi śāmulyaṃ brahmabhyo vi bhajā vasu
GV01rv_10_u:1789: RV_10.085.29.2{25} kṛtyaiṣāpadvatī bhūtvyā jāyā viśate patim
GV01rv_10_u:1792: RV_10.085.31.1{26} ye vadhvaścandraṃ vahatuṃ yakṣmā yanti janādanu
GV01rv_10_u:1793: RV_10.085.31.2{26} punastān yajñiyā devā nayantu yata āgatāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1794: RV_10.085.32.1{26} mā vidan paripanthino ya āsīdanti dampatī
GV01rv_10_u:1799: RV_10.085.34.2{26} sūryāṃ yo brahmā vidyāt sa id vādhūyamarhati
GV01rv_10_u:1801: RV_10.085.35.2{26} sūryāyaḥ paśyarūpāṇi tāni brahmā tu śundhati
GV01rv_10_u:1802: RV_10.085.36.1{27} gṛbhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastaṃ mayā patyā jaradaṣṭiryathāsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1803: RV_10.085.36.2{27} bhago aryamā savitā purandhirmahyaṃ tvādurgārhapatyāya devāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1804: RV_10.085.37.1{27} tāṃ pūṣañchivatamāmerayasva yasyāṃ bījaṃ manuṣyāvapanti
GV01rv_10_u:1805: RV_10.085.37.2{27} yā na ūrū uśatī viśrayāte yasyāmuśantaḥpraharāma śepam
GV01rv_10_u:1806: RV_10.085.38.1{27} tubhyamagre paryavahan sūryāṃ vahatunā saha
GV01rv_10_u:1807: RV_10.085.38.2{27} punaḥpatibhyo jāyāṃ dā agne prajayā saha
GV01rv_10_u:1809: RV_10.085.39.2{27} dīrghāyurasyā yaḥ patirjīvāti śaradaḥ śatam
GV01rv_10_u:1810: RV_10.085.40.1{27} somaḥ prathamo vivide gandharvo vivida uttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1812: RV_10.085.41.1{28} somo dadad gandharvāya gandharvo dadadagnaye
GV01rv_10_u:1814: RV_10.085.42.1{28} ihaiva staṃ mā vi yauṣṭaṃ viśvamāyurvyaśnutam
GV01rv_10_u:1816: RV_10.085.43.1{28} ā naḥ prajāṃ hanayatu prajāpatirājarasāya samanaktvaryamā
GV01rv_10_u:1817: RV_10.085.43.2{28} adurmaṅgalīḥ patilokamā viśa śaṃ no bhavadvipade śaṃ catuṣpade
GV01rv_10_u:1819: RV_10.085.44.2{28} vīrasūrdevakāmā syonā śaṃ no bhava dvipadeśaṃ catuṣpade
GV01rv_10_u:1820: RV_10.085.45.1{28} imāṃ tvamindra mīḍhvaḥ suputrāṃ subhagāṃ kṛṇu
GV01rv_10_u:1821: RV_10.085.45.2{28} daśāsyāṃ putrānā dhehi patimekādaśaṃ kṛdhi
GV01rv_10_u:1822: RV_10.085.46.1{28} samrājñī śvaśure bhava samrājñī śvaśrvāṃ bhava
GV01rv_10_u:1823: RV_10.085.46.2{28} nanāndari samrājñī bhava samrājñī adhi devṛṣu
GV01rv_10_u:1824: RV_10.085.47.1{28} samañjantu viśve devāḥ samāpo hṛdayāni nau
GV01rv_10_u:1825: RV_10.085.47.2{28} sammātariśvā saṃ dhātā samu deṣṭrī dadhātu nau
GV01rv_10_u:1826: RV_10.086.01.1{01} vi hi sotorasṛkṣata nendraṃ devamamaṃsata
GV01rv_10_u:1828: RV_10.086.02.1{01} parā hīndra dhāvasi vṛṣākaperati vyathiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1829: RV_10.086.02.2{01} no aha pravindasyanyatra somapītaye viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1830: RV_10.086.03.1{01} kimayaṃ tvāṃ vṛṣākapiścakāra harito mṛgaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1831: RV_10.086.03.2{01} yasmāirasyasīdu nvaryo vā puṣṭimad vasu viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1833: RV_10.086.04.2{01} śvā nvasya jambhis“adapi karṇe varahayurviśvasmadindra uttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1834: RV_10.086.05.1{01} priyā taṣṭāni me kapirvyaktā vyadūduṣat
GV01rv_10_u:1835: RV_10.086.05.2{01} śiro nvasya rāviṣaṃ na sugaṃ duṣkṛte bhuvaṃ viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1836: RV_10.086.06.1{02} na mat strī subhasattarā na suyāśutarā bhuvat
GV01rv_10_u:1837: RV_10.086.06.2{02} na matpraticyavīyasī na sakthyudyamīyasī viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1838: RV_10.086.07.1{02} uve amba sulābhike yathevāṅga bhaviṣyati
GV01rv_10_u:1839: RV_10.086.07.2{02} bhasan me ambasakthi me śiro me vīva hṛṣyati viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1840: RV_10.086.08.1{02} kiṃ subāho svaṅgure pṛthuṣṭo pṛthujāghane
GV01rv_10_u:1841: RV_10.086.08.2{02} kiṃ śūrapatninastvamabhyamīṣi vṛṣākapiṃ viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1844: RV_10.086.10.1{02} saṃhotraṃ sma purā nārī samanaṃ vāva gachati
GV01rv_10_u:1845: RV_10.086.10.2{02} vedhāṛtasya vīriṇīndrapatnī mahīyate viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1847: RV_10.086.11.2{03} nahyasyāaparaṃ cana jarasā marate patirviśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1849: RV_10.086.12.2{03} yasyedamapyaṃ haviḥ priyaṃ deveṣu gachati viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1850: RV_10.086.13.1{03} vṛṣākapāyi revati sūputra ādu susnuṣe
GV01rv_10_u:1851: RV_10.086.13.2{03} ghasat ta indraukṣaṇaḥ priyaṃ kācitkaraṃ havirviśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1852: RV_10.086.14.1{03} ukṣṇo hi me pañcadaśa sākaṃ pacanti viṃśatim
GV01rv_10_u:1853: RV_10.086.14.2{03} utāhamadmi pīva idubhā kukṣī pṛṇanti me viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1855: RV_10.086.15.2{03} manthastaindra śaṃ hṛde yaṃ te sunoti bhāvayurviśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1856: RV_10.086.16.1{04} na seśe yasya rambate 'ntarā sakthyā kapṛt
GV01rv_10_u:1857: RV_10.086.16.2{04} sedīśeyasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1858: RV_10.086.17.1{04} na seśe yasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate
GV01rv_10_u:1859: RV_10.086.17.2{04} sedīśeyasya rambate 'ntarā sakthyā kapṛd viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1860: RV_10.086.18.1{04} ayamindra vṛṣākapiḥ parasvantaṃ hataṃ vidat
GV01rv_10_u:1861: RV_10.086.18.2{04} asiṃsūnāṃ navaṃ carumādedhasyāna ācitaṃ viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1864: RV_10.086.20.1{04} dhanva ca yat kṛntatraṃ ca kati svit tā vi yojanā
GV01rv_10_u:1869: RV_10.086.22.2{04} kva sya pulvaghomṛgaḥ kamagañ janayopano viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1870: RV_10.086.23.1{04} parśurha nāma mānavi sākaṃ sasūva viṃśa tim
GV01rv_10_u:1871: RV_10.086.23.2{04} bhadrambhala tyasyā abhūd yasyā udaramamayad viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1872: RV_10.087.01.1{05} rakṣohaṇaṃ vājinamā jigharmi mitraṃ prathiṣṭhamupayāmi śarma
GV01rv_10_u:1873: RV_10.087.01.2{05} śiśāno agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa nodivā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam
GV01rv_10_u:1874: RV_10.087.02.1{05} ayodaṃṣṭro arciṣā yātudhānānupa spṛśa jātavedaḥsamiddhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1875: RV_10.087.02.2{05} ā jihvayā muradevān rabhasva kravyādo vṛktvyapi dhatsvāsan
GV01rv_10_u:1876: RV_10.087.03.1{05} ubhobhayāvinnupa dhehi daṃṣṭrā hiṃsraḥ śiśāno 'varamparaṃ ca
GV01rv_10_u:1877: RV_10.087.03.2{05} utāntarikṣe pari yāhi rājañ jambhaiḥ sandhehyabhi yātudhānān
GV01rv_10_u:1878: RV_10.087.04.1{05} yajñairiṣūḥ saṃnamamāno agne vācā śalyānaśanibhirdihānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1879: RV_10.087.04.2{05} tābhirvidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīco bāhūnprati bhaṃdhyeṣām
GV01rv_10_u:1880: RV_10.087.05.1{05} agne tvacaṃ yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsrāśanirharasāhantvenam
GV01rv_10_u:1881: RV_10.087.05.2{05} pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyātkraviṣṇurvi cinotu vṛkṇam
GV01rv_10_u:1882: RV_10.087.06.1{06} yatredānīṃ paśyasi jātavedastiṣṭhantamagna uta vācarantam
GV01rv_10_u:1883: RV_10.087.06.2{06} yad vāntarikṣe pathibhiḥ patantaṃ tamastāvidhya śarvā śiśānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1884: RV_10.087.07.1{06} utālabdhaṃ spṛṇuhi jātaveda ālebhānād ṛṣṭibhiryātudhānāt
GV01rv_10_u:1885: RV_10.087.07.2{06} agne pūrvo ni jahi śośucāna āmādaḥkṣviṅkāstamadantvenīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1886: RV_10.087.08.1{06} iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ so agne yo yātudhāno ya idaṃkṛṇoti
GV01rv_10_u:1887: RV_10.087.08.2{06} tamā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛcakṣasaścakṣuṣe randhayainam
GV01rv_10_u:1888: RV_10.087.09.1{06} tīkṣṇenāgne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñaṃ prāñcaṃ vasubhyaḥpra ṇaya pracetaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1889: RV_10.087.09.2{06} hiṃsraṃ rakṣāṃsyabhi śośucānammā tvā dabhan yātudhānā nṛcakṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1890: RV_10.087.10.1{06} nṛcakṣā rakṣaḥ pari paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi pratiśṛṇīhyagrā
GV01rv_10_u:1891: RV_10.087.10.2{06} tasyāgne pṛṣṭīrharasā śṛṇīhi tredhāmūlaṃ yātudhānasya vṛśca
GV01rv_10_u:1892: RV_10.087.11.1{07} triryātudhānaḥ prasitiṃ ta etv ṛtaṃ yo agne anṛtena hanti
GV01rv_10_u:1893: RV_10.087.11.2{07} tamarciṣā sphūrjayañ jātavedaḥ samakṣamenaṃ gṛṇateni vṛṃdhi
GV01rv_10_u:1894: RV_10.087.12.1{07} tadagne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujaṃ yenapaśyasi yātudhānam
GV01rv_10_u:1896: RV_10.087.13.1{07} yadagne adya mithunā śapāto yad vācastṛṣṭaṃ janayantarebhāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1897: RV_10.087.13.2{07} manyormanasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhyahṛdaye yātudhānān
GV01rv_10_u:1898: RV_10.087.14.1{07} parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parāgne rakṣo harasāśṛṇīhi
GV01rv_10_u:1900: RV_10.087.15.1{07} parādya devā vṛjinaṃ śṛṇantu pratyagenaṃ śapathā yantutṛṣṭāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1901: RV_10.087.15.2{07} vācāstenaṃ śarava ṛchantu marman viśvasyaituprasitiṃ yātudhānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1902: RV_10.087.16.1{08} yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yo aśveyena paśunāyātudhānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1903: RV_10.087.16.2{08} yo aghnyāyā bharati kṣīramagne teṣāṃśīrṣāṇi harasāpi vṛśca
GV01rv_10_u:1904: RV_10.087.17.1{08} saṃvatsarīṇaṃ paya usriyāyāstasya māśīd yātudhānonṛcakṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1905: RV_10.087.17.2{08} pīyūṣamagne yatamastitṛpsāt taṃ pratyañcamarciṣā vidhya marman
GV01rv_10_u:1906: RV_10.087.18.1{08} viṣaṃ gavāṃ yātudhānāḥ pibantvā vṛścyantāmaditayedurevāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1907: RV_10.087.18.2{08} parainān devaḥ savitā dadātu parā bhāgamoṣadhīnāṃ jayantām
GV01rv_10_u:1908: RV_10.087.19.1{08} sanādagne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsujigyuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1909: RV_10.087.19.2{08} anu daha sahamūrān kravyādo mā te hetyā mukṣatadaivyāyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1910: RV_10.087.20.1{08} tvaṃ no agne adharādudaktāt tvaṃ paścāduta rakṣāpurastāt
GV01rv_10_u:1911: RV_10.087.20.2{08} prati te te ajarāsastapiṣṭhā aghaśaṃsaṃśośucato dahantu
GV01rv_10_u:1912: RV_10.087.21.1{09} paścāt purastādadharādudaktāt kaviḥ kāvyena pari pāhirājan
GV01rv_10_u:1913: RV_10.087.21.2{09} sakhe sakhāyamajaro jarimṇe 'gne martānamartyastvaṃ naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1914: RV_10.087.22.1{09} pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ vipraṃ sahasya dhīmahi
GV01rv_10_u:1916: RV_10.087.23.1{09} viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ prati ṣma rakṣaso daha
GV01rv_10_u:1918: RV_10.087.24.1{09} pratyagne mithuna daha yātudhānā kimīdinā
GV01rv_10_u:1919: RV_10.087.24.2{09} saṃ tvāśiśāmi jābṛhyadabdhaṃ vipra manmabhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1920: RV_10.087.25.1{09} pratyagne harasā haraḥ śṛṇīhi viśvataḥ prati
GV01rv_10_u:1921: RV_10.087.25.2{09} yātudhānasya rakṣaso balaṃ vi ruja vīryam
GV01rv_10_u:1922: RV_10.088.01.1{10} haviṣ pāntamajaraṃ svarvidi divispṛśyāhutaṃ juṣṭamagnau
GV01rv_10_u:1923: RV_10.088.01.2{10} tasya bharmaṇe bhuvanāya devā dharmaṇe kaṃsvadhayā paprathanta
GV01rv_10_u:1925: RV_10.088.02.2{10} tasya devāḥ pṛthivi dyaurutāpo 'raṇayannoṣadhīḥ sakhye asya
GV01rv_10_u:1927: RV_10.088.03.2{10} yo bhānunā pṛthiviṃ dyāmutemāmātatānarodasī antarikṣam
GV01rv_10_u:1928: RV_10.088.04.1{10} yo hotāsīt prathamo devajuṣṭo yaṃ samañjannājyenāvṛṇānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1929: RV_10.088.04.2{10} sa patatrītvaraṃ stha jagad yacchvātramagnirakṛnojjātavedaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1930: RV_10.088.05.1{10} yajjatavedo bhuvanasya mūrdhannatiṣṭho agne saha rocanena
GV01rv_10_u:1931: RV_10.088.05.2{10} taṃ tvahema matibhirgīrbhirukthaiḥ sa yajñiyo abhavorodasiprāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1932: RV_10.088.06.1{11} mūrdhā bhuvo bhavati naktamagnistataḥ suryo jāyateprātarudyan
GV01rv_10_u:1933: RV_10.088.06.2{11} mayāmu tu yajñiyānāmetamapo yattūrṇiścarati prajānan
GV01rv_10_u:1934: RV_10.088.07.1{11} dṛśenyo yo mahinā samiddho 'rocata diviyonirvibhāvā
GV01rv_10_u:1935: RV_10.088.07.2{11} tasminnagnau sūktavākena devā havirviśva ajuhavustanūpāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1937: RV_10.088.08.2{11} sa eṣāṃ yajño abhavat tanūpastaṃ dyaurvedataṃ prithivi tamāpaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1939: RV_10.088.09.2{11} so arciṣā pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemām ṛjūyamānoatapan mahitvā
GV01rv_10_u:1940: RV_10.088.10.1{11} stomena hi divi devāso agnimajījanañchaktibhīrodasiprām
GV01rv_10_u:1941: RV_10.088.10.2{11} tamū akṛṇvan tredhā bhuve kaṃ sa oṣadhīḥpacati viśvarūpāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1943: RV_10.088.11.2{12} yadā cariṣṇū mithunāvabhūtāmādit prāpaśyanbhuvanāni viśvā
GV01rv_10_u:1944: RV_10.088.12.1{12} viśvasmā agniṃ bhuvanāya devā vaiśvānaraṃ ketumahnāmakṛṇvan
GV01rv_10_u:1945: RV_10.088.12.2{12} ā yastatānoṣaso vibhātīrapo ūrṇoti tamoarciṣā yan
GV01rv_10_u:1946: RV_10.088.13.1{12} vaiśvānaraṃ kavayo yajñiyāso 'gniṃ devā ajanayannajuryam
GV01rv_10_u:1948: RV_10.088.14.1{12} vaiśvānaraṃ viśvahā dīdivāṃsaṃ mantrairagniṃ kavimachā vadāmaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1949: RV_10.088.14.2{12} yo mahimnā paribabhūvorvī utāvastādutadevaḥ parastāt
GV01rv_10_u:1950: RV_10.088.15.1{12} dve srutī aśṛṇavaṃ pitṝṇāmahaṃ devānāmutamartyānām
GV01rv_10_u:1951: RV_10.088.15.2{12} tābhyāmidaṃ viśvamejat sameti yadantarāpitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca
GV01rv_10_u:1952: RV_10.088.16.1{13} dve samīcī bibhṛtaścarantaṃ śīrṣato jātaṃ manasāvimṛṣṭam
GV01rv_10_u:1953: RV_10.088.16.2{13} sa pratyaṃ viśvā bhuvanāni tasthāvaprayuchantaraṇirbhrājamānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:1954: RV_10.088.17.1{13} yatrā vadete avaraḥ paraśca yajñanyoḥ kataro nau vi veda
GV01rv_10_u:1955: RV_10.088.17.2{13} ā śekurit sadhamādaṃ sakhāyo nakṣanta yajñaṃ kaidaṃ vi vocat
