GV01rv_10_u:2117: RV_10.094.01.1{29} praite vadantu pra vayaṃ vadāma grāvabhyo vācaṃ vadatāvadadbhyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2118: RV_10.094.01.2{29} yadadrayaḥ parvatāḥ sākamāśavaḥ ślokaṃghoṣaṃ bharathendrāya sominaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2119: RV_10.094.02.1{29} ete vadanti śatavat sahasravadabhi krandanti haritebhirāsabhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2120: RV_10.094.02.2{29} viṣṭvī grāvāṇaḥ sukṛtaḥ sukṛtyayā hotuścit pūrve haviradyamāśata
GV01rv_10_u:2121: RV_10.094.03.1{29} ete vadantyavidannanā madhu nyūṅkhayante adhi pakvaāmiṣi
GV01rv_10_u:2122: RV_10.094.03.2{29} vṛkṣasya śākhāmaruṇasya bapsataste sūbharvāvṛṣabhāḥ premarāviṣuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2123: RV_10.094.04.1{29} bṛhad vadanti madireṇa mandinendraṃ krośanto 'vidannanāmadhu
GV01rv_10_u:2125: RV_10.094.05.1{29} suparṇā vācamakratopa dyavyākhare kṛṣṇā iṣirāanartiṣuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2126: RV_10.094.05.2{29} nyaṃ ni yantyuparasya niṣkṛtaṃ purū retodadhire sūryaśvitaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2127: RV_10.094.06.1{30} ugrā iva pravahantaḥ samāyamuḥ sākaṃ yuktā vṛṣaṇobibhrato dhuraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2128: RV_10.094.06.2{30} yacchvasanto jagrasānā arāviṣuḥśṛṇva eṣāṃ prothatho arvatāmiva
GV01rv_10_u:2130: RV_10.094.07.2{30} daśābhīśubhyo arcatājarebhyo daśa dhuro daśa yuktāvahadbhyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2131: RV_10.094.08.1{30} te adrayo daśayantrāsa āśavasteṣāmādhānaṃ paryetiharyatam
GV01rv_10_u:2132: RV_10.094.08.2{30} ta ū sutasya somyasyāndhaso 'ṃśoḥ pīyūṣamprathamasya bhejire
GV01rv_10_u:2133: RV_10.094.09.1{30} te somādo harī indrasya niṃsate 'ṃśuṃ duhanto adhyāsategavi
GV01rv_10_u:2134: RV_10.094.09.2{30} tebhirdugdhaṃ papivān somyaṃ madhvindro vardhateprathate vṛṣāyate
GV01rv_10_u:2135: RV_10.094.10.1{30} vṛṣā vo aṃśurna kilā riṣāthanelāvantaḥ sadamitsthanāśitāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2136: RV_10.094.10.2{30} raivatyeva mahasā cārava sthana yasyagrāvāṇo ajuṣadhvamadhvaram
GV01rv_10_u:2137: RV_10.094.11.1{31} tṛdilā atṛdilāso adrayo 'śramaṇā aśṛthitā amṛtyavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2138: RV_10.094.11.2{31} anāturā ajarā sthāmaviṣṇavaḥ supīvaso atṛṣitāatṛṣṇajaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2139: RV_10.094.12.1{31} dhruvā eva vaḥ pitaro yuge-yuge kṣemakāmāsaḥ sadaso nayuñjate
GV01rv_10_u:2140: RV_10.094.12.2{31} ajuryāso hariṣāco haridrava ā dyāṃ raveṇapṛthivīmaśuśravuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2141: RV_10.094.13.1{31} tadid vadantyadrayo vimocane yāmannañjaspā iva ghedupabdibhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2142: RV_10.094.13.2{31} vapanto bījamiva dhānyākṛtaḥ pṛñcantisomaṃ na minanti bapsataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2143: RV_10.094.14.1{31} sute adhvare adhi vācamakratā krīḷayo na mātarantudantaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2144: RV_10.094.14.2{31} vi ṣū muñcā suṣuvuṣo manīṣāṃ vi vartantāmadrayaścāyamānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2145: RV_10.095.01.1{01} haye jāye manasā tiṣṭha ghore vacāṃsi miśrākṛṇavāvahai nu
GV01rv_10_u:2146: RV_10.095.01.2{01} na nau mantrā anuditāsa ete mayas karanparatare canāhan
GV01rv_10_u:2147: RV_10.095.02.1{01} kimetā vācā kṛṇavā tavāhaṃ prākramiṣamuṣasāmagriyeva
GV01rv_10_u:2148: RV_10.095.02.2{01} purūravaḥ punarastaṃ parehi durāpanā vātaivāhamasmi
GV01rv_10_u:2149: RV_10.095.03.1{01} iṣurna śriya iṣudherasanā goṣāḥ śatasā na raṃhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2150: RV_10.095.03.2{01} avīre kratau vi davidyutan norā na māyuṃ citayantadhunayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2151: RV_10.095.04.1{01} sā vasu dadhatī śvaśurāya vaya uṣo yadi vaṣṭyantigṛhāt
GV01rv_10_u:2152: RV_10.095.04.2{01} astaṃ nanakṣe yasmiñcākan divā naktaṃśnathitā vaitasena
GV01rv_10_u:2153: RV_10.095.05.1{01} triḥ sma māhnaḥ śnathayo vaitasenota sma me 'vyatyaipṛṇāsi
GV01rv_10_u:2154: RV_10.095.05.2{01} purūravo 'nu te ketamāyaṃ rājā me vīra tanvastadāsīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2155: RV_10.095.06.1{02} yā sujūrṇiḥ śreṇiḥ sumnaāpirhradecakṣurna granthinīcaraṇyuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2156: RV_10.095.06.2{02} tā añjayo 'ruṇayo na sasruḥ śriye gāvo nadhenavo 'navanta
GV01rv_10_u:2157: RV_10.095.07.1{02} samasmiñ jāyamāna āsata gnā utemavardhan nadyaḥsvagūrtāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2158: RV_10.095.07.2{02} mahe yat tvā purūravo raṇāyāvardhayandasyuhatyāya devāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2159: RV_10.095.08.1{02} sacā yadāsu jahatīṣvatkamamānuṣīṣu mānuṣo niṣeve
GV01rv_10_u:2160: RV_10.095.08.2{02} apa sma mat tarasantī na bhujyustā atrasan rathaspṛśonāśvāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2161: RV_10.095.09.1{02} yadāsu marto amṛtāsu nispṛk saṃ kṣoṇībhiḥ kratubhirnapṛṅkte
GV01rv_10_u:2162: RV_10.095.09.2{02} tā ātayo na tanvaḥ śumbhata svā aśvāso nakrīḷayo dandaśānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2163: RV_10.095.10.1{02} vidyun na yā patantī davidyod bharantī me apyā kāmyāni
GV01rv_10_u:2164: RV_10.095.10.2{02} janiṣṭo apo naryaḥ sujātaḥ prorvaśī tirata dīrghamāyuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2165: RV_10.095.11.1{03} jajñiṣa itthā gopīthyāya hi dadhātha tat purūravo maojaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2166: RV_10.095.11.2{03} aśāsaṃ tvā viduṣī sasminnahan na ma āśṛṇoḥkimabhug vadāsi
GV01rv_10_u:2167: RV_10.095.12.1{03} kadā sūnuḥ pitaraṃ jāta ichāccakran nāśru vartayadvijānan
GV01rv_10_u:2168: RV_10.095.12.2{03} ko dampatī samanasā vi yūyodadha yadagniḥśvaśureṣu dīdayat
GV01rv_10_u:2169: RV_10.095.13.1{03} prati bravāṇi vartayate aśru cakran na krandadādhyeśivāyai
GV01rv_10_u:2170: RV_10.095.13.2{03} pra tat te hinavā yat te asme parehyastaṃ nahimūra māpaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2171: RV_10.095.14.1{03} sudevo adya prapatedanāvṛt parāvataṃ paramāṃ gantavā u
GV01rv_10_u:2172: RV_10.095.14.2{03} adhā śayīta nir{ṛ}terupasthe 'dhainaṃ vṛkā rabhasāsoadyuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2173: RV_10.095.15.1{03} purūravo mā mṛthā mā pra papto mā tvā vṛkāso aśivāsa ukṣan
GV01rv_10_u:2174: RV_10.095.15.2{03} na vai straiṇāni sakhyāni santi sālāvṛkāṇāṃhṛdayānyetā
GV01rv_10_u:2175: RV_10.095.16.1{04} yad virūpācaraṃ martyeṣvavasaṃ rātrīḥ śaradaścatasraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2176: RV_10.095.16.2{04} ghṛtasya stokaṃ sakṛdahna āśnāṃ tādevedantātṛpāṇā carāmi
GV01rv_10_u:2178: RV_10.095.17.2{04} upa tvā rātiḥ sukṛtasya tiṣṭhān ni vartasvahṛdayaṃ tapyate me
GV01rv_10_u:2179: RV_10.095.18.1{04} iti tvā devā ima āhuraiḷa yathemetad bhavasimṛtyubandhuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2180: RV_10.095.18.2{04} prajā te devān haviṣā yajāti svarga u tvamapi mādayāse
GV01rv_10_u:2181: RV_10.096.01.1{05} pra te mahe vidathe śaṃsiṣaṃ harī pra te vanve vanuṣoharyataṃ madam
GV01rv_10_u:2182: RV_10.096.01.2{05} ghṛtaṃ na yo haribhiścāru secata ā tvāviśantu harivarpasaṃ giraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2183: RV_10.096.02.1{05} hariṃ hi yonimabhi ye samasvaran hinvanto harī divyaṃyathā sadaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2184: RV_10.096.02.2{05} ā yaṃ pṛṇanti haribhirna dhenava indrāyaśūṣaṃ harivantamarcata
GV01rv_10_u:2185: RV_10.096.03.1{05} so asya vajro harito ya āyaso harirnikāmo harirāgabhastyoḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2186: RV_10.096.03.2{05} dyumnī suśipro harimanyusāyaka indre ni rūpāharitā mimikṣire
GV01rv_10_u:2187: RV_10.096.04.1{05} divi na keturadhi dhāyi haryato vivyacad vajro harito naraṃhyā
GV01rv_10_u:2188: RV_10.096.04.2{05} tudadahiṃ hariśipro ya āyasaḥ sahasraśokāabhavad dharimbharaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2190: RV_10.096.05.2{05} tvaṃ haryasi tava viśvamukthyamasāmi rādhoharijāta haryatam
GV01rv_10_u:2191: RV_10.096.06.1{06} tā vajriṇaṃ mandinaṃ stomyaṃ mada indraṃ rathe vahatoharyatā harī
GV01rv_10_u:2192: RV_10.096.06.2{06} purūṇyasmai savanāni haryata indrāyasomā harayo dadhanvire
GV01rv_10_u:2193: RV_10.096.07.1{06} araṃ kāmāya harayo dadhanvire sthirāya hinvan harayo harīturā
GV01rv_10_u:2194: RV_10.096.07.2{06} arvadbhiryo haribhirjoṣamīyate so asya kāmaṃharivantamānaśe
GV01rv_10_u:2196: RV_10.096.08.2{06} arvadbhiryo haribhirvājinīvasurati viśvāduritā pāriṣad dharī
GV01rv_10_u:2197: RV_10.096.09.1{06} sruveva yasya hariṇī vipetatuḥ śipre vājāya hariṇīdavidhvataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2198: RV_10.096.09.2{06} pra yat kṛte camase marmṛjad dharī pītvāmadasya hayatasyādhasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2199: RV_10.096.10.1{06} uta sma sadma haryatasya pastyoratyo na vājaṃ harivānacikradat
GV01rv_10_u:2200: RV_10.096.10.2{06} mahī cid dhi dhiṣaṇāharyadojasā bṛhad vayodadhiṣe haryataścidā
GV01rv_10_u:2201: RV_10.096.11.1{07} ā rodasī haryamāṇo mahitvā navyaṃ-navyaṃ haryasi manmanu priyam
GV01rv_10_u:2202: RV_10.096.11.2{07} pra pastyamasura haryataṃ gorāviṣkṛdhi harayesūryāya
GV01rv_10_u:2203: RV_10.096.12.1{07} ā tvā haryantaṃ prayujo janānāṃ rathe vahantu hariśipramindra
GV01rv_10_u:2204: RV_10.096.12.2{07} pibā yathā pratibhṛtasya madhvo haryan yajñaṃsadhamāde daśoṇim
GV01rv_10_u:2205: RV_10.096.13.1{07} apāḥ pūrveṣāṃ harivaḥ sutānāmatho idaṃ savanaṃkevalaṃ te
GV01rv_10_u:2206: RV_10.096.13.2{07} mamaddhi somaṃ madhumantamindra satrā vṛṣañjaṭhara ā vṛṣasva
GV01rv_10_u:2207: RV_10.097.01.1{08} yā oṣadhīḥ pūrvā jātā devebhyastriyugaṃ purā
GV01rv_10_u:2208: RV_10.097.01.2{08} manainu babhrūṇāmahaṃ śataṃ dhāmāni sapta ca
GV01rv_10_u:2209: RV_10.097.02.1{08} śataṃ vo amba dhāmāni sahasramuta vo ruhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2210: RV_10.097.02.2{08} adhāśatakratvo yūyamimaṃ me agadaṃ kṛta
GV01rv_10_u:2211: RV_10.097.03.1{08} oṣadhīḥ prati modadhvaṃ puṣpavatīḥ prasūvarīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2213: RV_10.097.04.1{08} oṣadhīriti mātarastad vo devīrupa bruve
GV01rv_10_u:2214: RV_10.097.04.2{08} saneyamaśvaṃgāṃ vāsa ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa
GV01rv_10_u:2215: RV_10.097.05.1{08} aśvatthe vo niṣadanaṃ parṇe vo vasatiṣ kṛtā
GV01rv_10_u:2216: RV_10.097.05.2{08} gobhāja itkilāsatha yat sanavatha pūruṣam
GV01rv_10_u:2223: RV_10.097.09.1{09} iṣkṛtirnāma vo mātātho yūyaṃ stha niṣkṛtīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2224: RV_10.097.09.2{09} sīrāḥpatatṛṇī sthana yadāmayati niṣ kṛtha
GV01rv_10_u:2225: RV_10.097.10.1{09} ati viśvāḥ pariṣṭhā stena iva vrajamakramuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2226: RV_10.097.10.2{09} oṣadhīḥprācucyavuryat kiṃ ca tanvo rapaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2228: RV_10.097.11.2{10} ātmāyakṣmasya naśyati purā jīvagṛbho yathā
GV01rv_10_u:2230: RV_10.097.12.2{10} tatoyakṣmaṃ vi bādhadhva ugro madhyamaśīriva
GV01rv_10_u:2231: RV_10.097.13.1{10} sākaṃ yakṣma pra pata cāṣeṇa kikidīvinā
GV01rv_10_u:2232: RV_10.097.13.2{10} sākaṃvātasya dhrājyā sākaṃ naśya nihākayā
GV01rv_10_u:2234: RV_10.097.14.2{10} tāḥ sarvāḥsaṃvidānā idaṃ me prāvatā vacaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2235: RV_10.097.15.1{10} yāḥ phalinīryā aphalā apuṣpā yāśca puṣpiṇīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2240: RV_10.097.17.2{11} yaṃ jīvamaśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2242: RV_10.097.18.2{11} tāsāṃ tvamasyuttamāraṃ kāmāya śaṃ hṛde
GV01rv_10_u:2244: RV_10.097.19.2{11} bṛhaspatiprasūtā asyai saṃ datta vīryam
GV01rv_10_u:2245: RV_10.097.20.1{11} mā vo riṣat khanitā yasmai cāhaṃ khanāmi vaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2248: RV_10.097.21.2{11} sarvāḥ saṃgatya vīrudho 'syai saṃ datta vīryam
GV01rv_10_u:2249: RV_10.097.22.1{11} oṣadhayaḥ saṃ vadante somena saha rājñā
GV01rv_10_u:2253: RV_10.098.01.1{12} bṛhaspate prati me devatāmihi mitro vā yad varuṇo vāsipūṣā
GV01rv_10_u:2254: RV_10.098.01.2{12} ādityairvā yad vasubhirmarutvān sa parjanyaṃśantanave vṛṣāya
GV01rv_10_u:2255: RV_10.098.02.1{12} ā devo dūto ajiraścikitvān tvad devāpe abhi māmagachat
GV01rv_10_u:2256: RV_10.098.02.2{12} pratīcīnaḥ prati māmā vavṛtsva dadhāmi te dyumatīṃvācamāsan
GV01rv_10_u:2257: RV_10.098.03.1{12} asme dhehi dyumatīṃ vācamāsan bṛhaspate anamīvāmiṣirām
GV01rv_10_u:2258: RV_10.098.03.2{12} yayā vṛṣṭiṃ śantanave vanāva divo drapsomadhumānā viveśa
GV01rv_10_u:2259: RV_10.098.04.1{12} ā no drapsā madhumanto viśantvindra dehyadhirathaṃsahasram
GV01rv_10_u:2260: RV_10.098.04.2{12} ni ṣīda hotram ṛtuthā yajasva devān devāpehaviṣā saparya
GV01rv_10_u:2262: RV_10.098.05.2{12} sa uttarasmādadharaṃ samudramapo divyā asṛjadvarṣyā abhi
GV01rv_10_u:2263: RV_10.098.06.1{12} asmin samudre adhyuttarasminnāpo devebhirnivṛtā atiṣṭhan
GV01rv_10_u:2264: RV_10.098.06.2{12} tā adravannārṣṭiṣeṇena sṛṣṭā devāpinā preṣitāmṛkṣiṇīṣu
GV01rv_10_u:2265: RV_10.098.07.1{13} yad devāpiḥ śantanave purohito hotrāya vṛtaḥ kṛpayannadīdhet
GV01rv_10_u:2266: RV_10.098.07.2{13} devaśrutaṃ vṛṣṭivaniṃ rarāṇo bṛhaspatirvācamasmā ayachat
GV01rv_10_u:2267: RV_10.098.08.1{13} yaṃ tvā devāpiḥ śuśucāno agna ārṣṭiṣeṇo manuṣyaḥsamīdhe
GV01rv_10_u:2269: RV_10.098.09.1{13} tvāṃ pūrva ṛṣayo gīrbhirāyan tvāmadhvareṣu puruhūtaviśve
GV01rv_10_u:2270: RV_10.098.09.2{13} sahasrāṇyadhirathānyasme ā no yajñaṃrohidaśvopa yāhi
GV01rv_10_u:2271: RV_10.098.10.1{13} etānyagne navatirnava tve āhutānyadhirathā sahasra
GV01rv_10_u:2272: RV_10.098.10.2{13} tebhirvardhasva tanvaḥ śūra pūrvīrdivo no vṛṣṭimiṣitorirīhi
GV01rv_10_u:2273: RV_10.098.11.1{13} etānyagne navatiṃ sahasrā saṃ pra yacha vṛṣṇa indrāyabhāgam
GV01rv_10_u:2274: RV_10.098.11.2{13} vidvān patha ṛtuśo devayānānapyaulānaṃ divideveṣu dhehi
GV01rv_10_u:2275: RV_10.098.12.1{13} agne bādhasva vi mṛdho vi durgahāpāmīvāmaparakṣāṃsi sedha
GV01rv_10_u:2276: RV_10.098.12.2{13} asmāt samudrād bṛhato divo no 'pāmbhūmānamupa naḥ sṛjeha
GV01rv_10_u:2277: RV_10.099.01.1{14} kaṃ naścitramiṣaṇyasi cikitvān pṛthugmānaṃ vāśraṃvāvṛdhadhyai
GV01rv_10_u:2278: RV_10.099.01.2{14} kat tasya dātu śavaso vyuṣṭau takṣadvajraṃ vṛtraturamapinvat
GV01rv_10_u:2279: RV_10.099.02.1{14} sa hi dyutā vidyutā veti sāma pṛthuṃ yonimasuratvāsasāda
GV01rv_10_u:2280: RV_10.099.02.2{14} sa sanīḷebhiḥ prasahāno asya bhrāturna ṛtesaptathasya māyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2281: RV_10.099.03.1{14} sa vājaṃ yātāpaduṣpadā yan svarṣātā pari ṣadatsaniṣyan
GV01rv_10_u:2282: RV_10.099.03.2{14} anarvā yacchatadurasya vedo ghnañchiśnadevānabhi varpasā bhūt
GV01rv_10_u:2283: RV_10.099.04.1{14} sa yahvyo 'vanīrgoṣvarvā juhoti pradhanyāsu sasriḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2284: RV_10.099.04.2{14} apādo yatra yujyāso 'rathā droṇyaśvāsa īrate ghṛtaṃvāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2285: RV_10.099.05.1{14} sa rudrebhiraśastavāra ṛbhvā hitvī gayamāreavadyaāgāt
GV01rv_10_u:2286: RV_10.099.05.2{14} vamrasya manye mithunā vivavrī annamabhītyārodayanmuṣāyan
GV01rv_10_u:2287: RV_10.099.06.1{14} sa id dāsaṃ tuvīravaṃ patirdan ṣaḷakṣantriśīrṣāṇaṃ damanyat
GV01rv_10_u:2288: RV_10.099.06.2{14} asya trito nvojasā vṛdhāno vipāvarāhamayoagrayā han
GV01rv_10_u:2289: RV_10.099.07.1{15} sa druhvaṇe manuṣa ūrdhvasāna ā sāviṣadarśasānāyaśarum
GV01rv_10_u:2290: RV_10.099.07.2{15} sa nṛtamo nahuṣo 'smat sujātaḥ puro 'bhinadarhandasyuhatye
GV01rv_10_u:2291: RV_10.099.08.1{15} so abhriyo na yavasa udanyan kṣayāya gātuṃ vidan no asme
GV01rv_10_u:2292: RV_10.099.08.2{15} upa yat sīdadinduṃ śarīraiḥ śyeno 'yopāṣṭirhantidasyūn
GV01rv_10_u:2293: RV_10.099.09.1{15} sa vrādhataḥ śavasānebhirasya kutsāya śuṣṇaṃ kṛpaṇeparādāt
GV01rv_10_u:2294: RV_10.099.09.2{15} ayaṃ kavimanayacchasyamānamatkaṃ vo asyasanitota nṛṇām
GV01rv_10_u:2295: RV_10.099.10.1{15} ayaṃ daśasyan naryebhirasya dasmo devebhirvaruṇo namāyī
GV01rv_10_u:2296: RV_10.099.10.2{15} ayaṃ kanīna ṛtupā avedyamimītāraruṃ yaścatuṣpāt
GV01rv_10_u:2297: RV_10.099.11.1{15} asya stomebhirauśija ṛjiśvā vrajaṃ darayad vṛṣabheṇapiproḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2298: RV_10.099.11.2{15} sutvā yad yajato dīdayad gīḥ pura iyāno abhivarpasā bhūt
GV01rv_10_u:2299: RV_10.099.12.1{15} evā maho asura vakṣathāya vamrakaḥ paḍbhirupa sarpadindram
GV01rv_10_u:2300: RV_10.099.12.2{15} sa iyānaḥ karati svastimasmā iṣamūrjaṃsukṣitiṃ viśvamābhāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2301: RV_10.100.01.1{16} indra dṛhya maghavan tvāvadid bhuja iha stutaḥ sutapābodhi no vṛdhe
GV01rv_10_u:2302: RV_10.100.01.2{16} devebhirnaḥ savitā prāvatu śrutamāsarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:2303: RV_10.100.02.1{16} bharāya su bharata bhāgam ṛtviyaṃ pra vāyave śucipekrandadiṣṭaye
GV01rv_10_u:2304: RV_10.100.02.2{16} gaurasya yaḥ payasaḥ pītimānaśa āsarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:2305: RV_10.100.03.1{16} ā no devaḥ savitā sāviṣad vaya ṛjūyate yajamānāyasunvate
GV01rv_10_u:2306: RV_10.100.03.2{16} yathā devān pratibhūṣema pākavadā sarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:2307: RV_10.100.04.1{16} indro asme sumanā astu viśvahā rājā somaḥ suvitasyādhyetu naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2308: RV_10.100.04.2{16} yathā-yathā mitradhitāni sandadhurā sarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:2309: RV_10.100.05.1{16} indra ukthena śavasā parurdadhe bṛhaspate pratarītāsyāyuṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2310: RV_10.100.05.2{16} yajño manuḥ pramatirnaḥ pitā hi kamāsarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:2311: RV_10.100.06.1{16} indrasya nu sukṛtaṃ daivyaṃ saho 'gnirgṛhe jaritāmedhiraḥ kaviḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2312: RV_10.100.06.2{16} yajñaśca bhūd vidathe cārurantama āsarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:2313: RV_10.100.07.1{17} na vo guhā cakṛma bhūri duṣkṛtaṃ nāviṣṭyaṃ vasavodevaheḷanam
GV01rv_10_u:2314: RV_10.100.07.2{17} mākirno devā anṛtasya varpasa ā sarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:2315: RV_10.100.08.1{17} apāmīvāṃ savitā sāviṣan nyag varīya idapa sedhantvadrayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2316: RV_10.100.08.2{17} grāvā yatra madhuṣuducyate bṛhadāsarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:2317: RV_10.100.09.1{17} ūrdhvo grāvā vasavo 'stu sotari viśvā dveṣāṃsi sanutaryuyota
GV01rv_10_u:2318: RV_10.100.09.2{17} sa no devaḥ savitā pāyurīḍya ā sarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:2319: RV_10.100.10.1{17} ūrjaṃ gāvo yavase pīvo attana ṛtasya yāḥ sadane kośeaṅgdhve
GV01rv_10_u:2320: RV_10.100.10.2{17} tanūreva tanvo astu bheṣajamā sarvatātiṃaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:2321: RV_10.100.11.1{17} kratuprāvā jaritā śaśvatāmava indra id bhadrāpramatiḥ sutāvatām
GV01rv_10_u:2322: RV_10.100.11.2{17} pūrṇamūdhardivyaṃ yasya siktayaā sarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:2323: RV_10.100.12.1{17} citraste bhānuḥ kratuprā abhiṣṭiḥ santi spṛdhojaraṇiprā adhṛṣṭāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2324: RV_10.100.12.2{17} rajiṣṭhayā rajyā paśva ā gostūtūrṣaty paryagraṃ duvasyuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2325: RV_10.101.01.1{18} ud budhyadhvaṃ samanasaḥ sakhāyaḥ samagnimindhvaṃ bahavaḥsanīḷāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2326: RV_10.101.01.2{18} dadhikrāmagnimuṣasaṃ ca devīmindrāvato'vase ni hvaye vaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2327: RV_10.101.02.1{18} mandrā kṛṇudhvaṃ dhiya ā tanudhvaṃ nāvamaritraparaṇīṃkṛṇudhvam
GV01rv_10_u:2328: RV_10.101.02.2{18} iṣkṛṇudhvamāyudhāraṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ prāñcaṃyajñaṃ pra ṇayatā sakhāyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2329: RV_10.101.03.1{18} yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanudhvaṃ kṛte yonau vapateha bījam
GV01rv_10_u:2330: RV_10.101.03.2{18} girā ca śruṣṭiḥ śabharā asan no nedīya it sṛṇyaḥpakvameyāt
GV01rv_10_u:2331: RV_10.101.04.1{18} sīrā yuñjanti kavayo yugā vi tanvate pṛthak
GV01rv_10_u:2333: RV_10.101.05.1{18} nirāhāvān kṛṇotana saṃ varatrā dadhātana
GV01rv_10_u:2337: RV_10.101.07.1{19} prīṇītāśvān hitaṃ jayātha svastivāhaṃ rathamitkṛṇudhvam
GV01rv_10_u:2339: RV_10.101.08.1{19} vrajaṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ sa hi vo nṛpāṇo varma sīvyadhvaṃ bahulāpṛthūni
GV01rv_10_u:2340: RV_10.101.08.2{19} puraḥ kṛṇudhvamāyasīradhṛṣṭā mā vaḥ susroccamaso dṛṃhatā tam
GV01rv_10_u:2341: RV_10.101.09.1{19} ā vo dhiyaṃ yajñiyāṃ varta ūtaye devā devīṃ yajatāṃyajñiyāmiha
GV01rv_10_u:2342: RV_10.101.09.2{19} sā no duhīyad yavaseva gatvī sahasradhārāpayasā mahī gauḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2343: RV_10.101.10.1{19} ā tū ṣiñca harimīṃ drorupasthe vāśībhistakṣatāśmanmayībhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2344: RV_10.101.10.2{19} pari ṣvajadhvaṃ daśa kakṣyābhirubhe dhurau prati vahniṃ yunakta
GV01rv_10_u:2345: RV_10.101.11.1{19} ubhe dhurau vahnirāpibdamāno 'ntaryoneva carati dvijāniḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2346: RV_10.101.11.2{19} vanaspatiṃ vana āsthāpayadhvaṃ ni ṣū dadhidhvamakhananta utsam
GV01rv_10_u:2347: RV_10.101.12.1{19} kapṛn naraḥ kapṛthamud dadhātana codayata khudatavājasātaye
GV01rv_10_u:2348: RV_10.101.12.2{19} niṣṭigryaḥ putramā cyāvayotaya indraṃsabādha iha somapītaye
GV01rv_10_u:2349: RV_10.102.01.1{20} pra te rathaṃ mithūkṛtamindro 'vatu dhṛṣṇuyā
GV01rv_10_u:2350: RV_10.102.01.2{20} asminnājau puruhūta śravāyye dhanabhakṣeṣu no 'va
GV01rv_10_u:2351: RV_10.102.02.1{20} ut sma vāto vahati vāso 'syā adhirathaṃ yadajayat sahasram
GV01rv_10_u:2352: RV_10.102.02.2{20} rathīrabhūn mudgalānī gaviṣṭau bhare kṛtaṃ vyacedindrasenā
GV01rv_10_u:2354: RV_10.102.03.2{20} dāsasyavā maghavannāryasya vā sanutaryavayā vadham
GV01rv_10_u:2355: RV_10.102.04.1{20} udno hradamapibajjarhṛṣāṇaḥ kūṭaṃ sma tṛṃhadabhimātimeti
GV01rv_10_u:2356: RV_10.102.04.2{20} pra muṣkabhāraḥ śrava ichamāno 'jirambāhū abharat siṣāsan
GV01rv_10_u:2357: RV_10.102.05.1{20} nyakrandayannupayanta enamamehayan vṛṣabhaṃ madhya ājeḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2358: RV_10.102.05.2{20} tena sūbharvaṃ śatavat sahasraṃ gavāṃ mudgalaḥ pradhanejigāya
GV01rv_10_u:2359: RV_10.102.06.1{20} kakardave vṛṣabho yukta āsīdavāvacīt sārathirasya keśī
GV01rv_10_u:2360: RV_10.102.06.2{20} dudheryuktasya dravataḥ sahānasa ṛchanti ṣmā niṣpadomudgalānīm
GV01rv_10_u:2364: RV_10.102.08.2{21} nṛmṇāni kṛṇvan bahave janāya gāḥpaspaśānastaviṣīradhatta
GV01rv_10_u:2365: RV_10.102.09.1{21} imaṃ taṃ paśya vṛṣabhasya yuñjaṃ kāṣṭhāyā madhyedrughaṇaṃ śayānam
GV01rv_10_u:2366: RV_10.102.09.2{21} yena jigāya śatavat sahasraṃ gavāmmudgalaḥ pṛtanājyeṣu
GV01rv_10_u:2367: RV_10.102.10.1{21} āre aghā ko nvitthā dadarśa yaṃ yuñjanti taṃ vāsthāpayanti
GV01rv_10_u:2368: RV_10.102.10.2{21} nāsmai tṛṇaṃ nodakamā bharantyuttaro dhurovahati pradediśat
GV01rv_10_u:2369: RV_10.102.11.1{21} parivṛkteva patividyamānaṭ pīpyānā kūcakreṇeva siñcan
GV01rv_10_u:2370: RV_10.102.11.2{21} eṣaiṣyā cid rathyā jayema sumaṅgalaṃ sinavadastu sātam
GV01rv_10_u:2372: RV_10.102.12.2{21} vṛṣāyadājiṃ vṛṣaṇā siṣāsasi codayan vadhriṇā yujā
GV01rv_10_u:2373: RV_10.103.01.1{22} āśuḥ śiśāno vṛṣabho na bhīmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaścarṣaṇīnām
GV01rv_10_u:2374: RV_10.103.01.2{22} saṃkrandano 'nimiṣa ekavīraḥ śataṃ senāajayat sākamindraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2376: RV_10.103.02.2{22} tadindreṇa jayata tat sahadhvaṃ yudho naraiṣuhastena vṛṣṇā
GV01rv_10_u:2377: RV_10.103.03.1{22} sa iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhirvaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudhaindro gaṇena
GV01rv_10_u:2379: RV_10.103.04.1{22} bṛhaspate pari dīyā rathena rakṣohāmitrānapabādhamānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2380: RV_10.103.04.2{22} prabhañjan senāḥ pramṛṇo yudhā jayannasmākamedhyavitā rathānām
GV01rv_10_u:2381: RV_10.103.05.1{22} balavijñāya sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamānaugraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2382: RV_10.103.05.2{22} abhivīro abhisatvā sahojā jaitramindra rathamātiṣṭha govit
GV01rv_10_u:2383: RV_10.103.06.1{22} gotrabhidaṃ govidaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantamajma pramṛṇantamojasā
GV01rv_10_u:2384: RV_10.103.06.2{22} imaṃ sajātā anu vīrayadhvamindraṃ sakhāyo anusaṃ rabhadhvam
GV01rv_10_u:2385: RV_10.103.07.1{23} abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno 'dayo vīraḥ śatamanyurindraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2386: RV_10.103.07.2{23} duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ ayudhyo 'smākaṃ senāavatu pra yutsu
GV01rv_10_u:2387: RV_10.103.08.1{23} indra āsāṃ netā bṛhaspatirdakṣiṇā yajñaḥ pura etusomaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2389: RV_10.103.09.1{23} indrasya vṛṣṇo varuṇasya rājña ādityānāṃ marutāṃśardha ugram
GV01rv_10_u:2391: RV_10.103.10.1{23} ud dharṣaya maghavannāyudhānyut satvanāṃ māmakānāmmanāṃsi
GV01rv_10_u:2392: RV_10.103.10.2{23} ud vṛtrahan vājināṃ vājinānyud rathānāṃjayatāṃ yantu ghoṣāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2393: RV_10.103.11.1{23} asmākamindraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣvasmākaṃ yā iṣavastājayantu
GV01rv_10_u:2394: RV_10.103.11.2{23} asmākaṃ vīrā uttare bhavantvasmānu devā avatāhaveṣu
GV01rv_10_u:2395: RV_10.103.12.1{23} amīṣāṃ cittaṃ pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇāṅgānyapve parehi
GV01rv_10_u:2396: RV_10.103.12.2{23} abhi prehi nirdaha hṛtsu śokairandhenāmitrāstamasāsacantām
GV01rv_10_u:2397: RV_10.103.13.1{23} pretā jayatā nara indro vaḥ śarma yachatu
GV01rv_10_u:2399: RV_10.104.01.1{24} asāvi somaḥ puruhūta tubhyaṃ haribhyāṃ yajñamupa yāhitūyam
GV01rv_10_u:2400: RV_10.104.01.2{24} tubhyaṃ giro vipravīrā iyānā dadhanvira indrapibā sutasya
GV01rv_10_u:2401: RV_10.104.02.1{24} apsu dhūtasya harivaḥ pibeha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharampṛṇasva
GV01rv_10_u:2403: RV_10.104.03.1{24} progrāṃ pītiṃ vṛṣṇa iyarmi satyāṃ prayai sutasyaharyaśva tubhyam
GV01rv_10_u:2404: RV_10.104.03.2{24} indra dhenābhiriha mādayasva dhībhirviśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2405: RV_10.104.04.1{24} ūtī śacīvastava vīryeṇa vayo dadhānā uśija ṛtajñāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2407: RV_10.104.05.1{24} praṇītibhiṣ ṭe haryaśva suṣṭoḥ suṣumnasya pururucojanāsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2408: RV_10.104.05.2{24} maṃhiṣṭhāmūtiṃ vitire dadhānā stotāraindra tava sūnṛtābhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2409: RV_10.104.06.1{25} upa brahmāṇi harivo haribhyāṃ somasya yāhi pītaye sutasya
GV01rv_10_u:2410: RV_10.104.06.2{25} indra tvā yajñaḥ kṣamamāṇamānaḍ dāśvānasyadhvarasya praketaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2412: RV_10.104.07.2{25} upa bhūṣanti giro apratītamindraṃ namasyā jarituḥpananta
GV01rv_10_u:2413: RV_10.104.08.1{25} saptāpo devīḥ suraṇā amṛktā yābhiḥ sindhumatara indrapūrbhit
GV01rv_10_u:2414: RV_10.104.08.2{25} navatiṃ srotyā nava ca sravantīrdevebhyo gātummanuṣe ca vindaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2416: RV_10.104.09.2{25} indra yāstvaṃ vṛtratūrye cakartha tābhirviśvāyustanvaṃ pupuṣyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2417: RV_10.104.10.1{25} vīreṇyaḥ kraturindraḥ suśastirutāpi dhenā puruhūtamīṭṭe
GV01rv_10_u:2418: RV_10.104.10.2{25} ārdayad vṛtramakṛṇodu lokaṃ sasāhe śakraḥpṛtanā abhiṣṭiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2420: RV_10.105.01.1{26} kadā vaso stotraṃ haryata āva śmaśā rudhad vāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2422: RV_10.105.02.1{26} harī yasya suyujā vivratā verarvantānu śepā
GV01rv_10_u:2424: RV_10.105.03.1{26} apa yorindraḥ pāpaja ā marto na śaśramāṇo bibhīvān
GV01rv_10_u:2428: RV_10.105.05.1{26} adhi yastasthau keśavantā vyacasvantā na puṣṭyai
GV01rv_10_u:2430: RV_10.105.06.1{27} prāstaud ṛṣvaujā ṛṣvebhistatakṣa śūraḥ śavasā
GV01rv_10_u:2432: RV_10.105.07.1{27} vajraṃ yaścakre suhanāya dasyave hirīmaśo hirīmān
GV01rv_10_u:2434: RV_10.105.08.1{27} ava no vṛjinā śiśīhy ṛcā vanemānṛcaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2436: RV_10.105.09.1{27} ūrdhvā yat te tretinī bhūd yajñasya dhūrṣu sadman
GV01rv_10_u:2438: RV_10.105.10.1{27} śriye te pṛśnirupasecanī bhūcchriye darvirarepāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2439: RV_10.105.10.2{27} yayā sve pātre siñcasa ut
GV01rv_10_u:2440: RV_10.105.11.1{27} śataṃ vā yadasurya prati tvā sumitra itthāstaud durmitraitthāstau
GV01rv_10_u:2441: RV_10.105.11.2{27} āvo yad dasyuhatye kutsaputraṃ prāvo yaddasyuhatye kutsavatsam
GV01rv_10_u:2442: RV_10.106.01.1{01} ubhā u nūnaṃ tadidarthayethe vi tanvāthe dhiyovaśtrāpaseva
GV01rv_10_u:2443: RV_10.106.01.2{01} sadhrīcīnā yātave premajīgaḥ sudinevapṛkṣa ā taṃsayethe
GV01rv_10_u:2444: RV_10.106.02.1{01} uṣṭāreva pharvareṣu śrayethe prāyogeva śvātryā śāsurethaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2445: RV_10.106.02.2{01} dūteva hi ṣṭho yaśasā janeṣu māpa sthātammahiṣevāpānāt
GV01rv_10_u:2446: RV_10.106.03.1{01} sākaṃyujā śakunasyeva pakṣā paśveva citrā yajurāgamiṣṭam
GV01rv_10_u:2448: RV_10.106.04.1{01} āpī vo asme pitareva putrogreva rucā nṛpatīva turyai
GV01rv_10_u:2449: RV_10.106.04.2{01} iryeva puṣṭyai kiraṇeva bhujyai śruṣṭīvāneva havamāgamiṣṭam
GV01rv_10_u:2450: RV_10.106.05.1{01} vaṃsageva pūṣaryā śimbātā mitreva ṛtā śatarāśātapantā
GV01rv_10_u:2451: RV_10.106.05.2{01} vājevoccā vayasā gharmyeṣṭhā meṣeveṣāsaparyā purīṣā
GV01rv_10_u:2452: RV_10.106.06.1{02} sṛṇyeva jarbharī turpharītū naitośeva turpharīparpharīkā
GV01rv_10_u:2453: RV_10.106.06.2{02} udanyajeva jemanā maderū tā me jarāyvajarammarāyu
GV01rv_10_u:2454: RV_10.106.07.1{02} pajreva carcaraṃ jāraṃ marāyu kṣadmevārtheṣu tartarīthaugrā
GV01rv_10_u:2455: RV_10.106.07.2{02} ṛbhū nāpat kharamajrā kharajrurvāyurna parpharatkṣayad rayīṇām
GV01rv_10_u:2456: RV_10.106.08.1{02} gharmeva madhu jaṭhare sanerū bhagevitā turpharīphārivāram
GV01rv_10_u:2457: RV_10.106.08.2{02} patareva cacarā candranirṇiṃ manaṛṅgāmananyā na jagmī
GV01rv_10_u:2458: RV_10.106.09.1{02} bṛhanteva gambhareṣu pratiṣṭhāṃ pādeva gādhaṃ taratevidāthaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2459: RV_10.106.09.2{02} karṇeva śāsuranu hi smarātho 'ṃśeva nobhajataṃ citramapnaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2460: RV_10.106.10.1{02} āraṅgareva madhverayethe sāragheva gavi nīcīnabāre
GV01rv_10_u:2462: RV_10.106.11.1{02} ṛdhyāma stomaṃ sanuyāma vājamā no mantraṃ sarathehopayātam
GV01rv_10_u:2463: RV_10.106.11.2{02} yaśo na pakvaṃ madhu goṣvantarā bhūtāṃśoaśvinoḥ kāmamaprāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2464: RV_10.107.01.1{03} āvirabhūn mahi māghonameṣāṃ viśvaṃ jīvaṃ tamaso niramoci
GV01rv_10_u:2465: RV_10.107.01.2{03} mahi jyotiḥ pitṛbhirdattamāgāduruḥ panthādakṣiṇāyā adarśi
GV01rv_10_u:2466: RV_10.107.02.1{03} uccā divi dakṣiṇāvanto asthurye aśvadāḥ saha tesūryeṇa
GV01rv_10_u:2467: RV_10.107.02.2{03} hiraṇyadā amṛtatvaṃ bhajante vāsodāḥ soma pratiranta āyuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2468: RV_10.107.03.1{03} daivī pūrtirdakṣiṇā devayajyā na kavāribhyo nahi tepṛṇanti
GV01rv_10_u:2470: RV_10.107.04.1{03} śatadhāraṃ vāyumarkaṃ svarvidaṃ nṛcakṣasaste abhicakṣate haviḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2471: RV_10.107.04.2{03} ye pṛṇanti pra ca yachanti saṃgame tedakṣiṇāṃ duhate saptamātaram
GV01rv_10_u:2472: RV_10.107.05.1{03} dakṣiṇāvān prathamo hūta eti dakṣiṇāvān grāmaṇīragrameti
GV01rv_10_u:2473: RV_10.107.05.2{03} tameva manye nṛpatiṃ janānāṃ yaḥ prathamodakṣiṇāmāvivāya
GV01rv_10_u:2474: RV_10.107.06.1{04} tameva ṛṣiṃ tamu brahmāṇamāhuryajñanyaṃ sāmagāmukthaśāsam
GV01rv_10_u:2475: RV_10.107.06.2{04} sa śukrasya tanvo veda tisro yaḥ prathamodakṣiṇayā rarādha
GV01rv_10_u:2476: RV_10.107.07.1{04} dakṣiṇāśvaṃ dakṣiṇā gāṃ dadāti dakṣiṇā candramuta yad dhiraṇyam
GV01rv_10_u:2477: RV_10.107.07.2{04} dakṣiṇānnaṃ vanute yo na ātmādakṣiṇāṃ varma kṛṇute vijānan
GV01rv_10_u:2478: RV_10.107.08.1{04} na bhojā mamrurna nyarthamīyurna riṣyanti na vyathante habhojāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2479: RV_10.107.08.2{04} idaṃ yad viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ svaścaitat sarvandakṣiṇaibhyo dadāti
GV01rv_10_u:2480: RV_10.107.09.1{04} bhojā jigyuḥ surabhiṃ yonimagre bhojā jigyurvadhvaṃ yāsuvāsāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2481: RV_10.107.09.2{04} bhojā jigyurantaḥpeyaṃ surāyā bhojā jigyurye ahūtāḥ prayanti
GV01rv_10_u:2482: RV_10.107.10.1{04} bhojāyāśvaṃ saṃ mṛjantyāśuṃ bhojāyāste kanyāśumbhamānā
GV01rv_10_u:2483: RV_10.107.10.2{04} bhojasyedaṃ puṣkariṇīva veśma pariṣkṛtandevamāneva citram
GV01rv_10_u:2484: RV_10.107.11.1{04} bhojamaśvāḥ suṣṭhuvāho vahanti suvṛd ratho vartatedakṣiṇāyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2485: RV_10.107.11.2{04} bhojaṃ devāso 'vatā bhareṣu bhojaḥśatrūn samanīkeṣu jetā
GV01rv_10_u:2486: RV_10.108.01.1{05} kimichantī saramā predamānaḍ dūre hyadhvā jaguriḥparācaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2487: RV_10.108.01.2{05} kāsmehitiḥ kā paritakmyāsīt kathaṃ rasāyāataraḥ payāṃsi
GV01rv_10_u:2488: RV_10.108.02.1{05} indrasya dūtīriṣitā carāmi maha ichantī paṇayo nidhīnvaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2489: RV_10.108.02.2{05} atiṣkado bhiyasā tan na āvat tathā rasāyā atarampayāṃsi
GV01rv_10_u:2490: RV_10.108.03.1{05} kīdṛṃṃ indraḥ sarame kā dṛśīkā yasyedaṃ dūtīrasaraḥ parākāt
GV01rv_10_u:2491: RV_10.108.03.2{05} ā ca gachān mitramenā dadhāmāthāgavāṃ gopatirno bhavāti
GV01rv_10_u:2492: RV_10.108.04.1{05} nāhaṃ taṃ veda dabhyaṃ dabhat sa yasyedaṃ dūtīrasaraṃ parākāt
GV01rv_10_u:2493: RV_10.108.04.2{05} na taṃ gūhanti sravato gabhīrā hatāindreṇa paṇayaḥ śayadhve
GV01rv_10_u:2494: RV_10.108.05.1{05} imā gāvaḥ sarame yā aichaḥ pari divo antān subhagepatantī
GV01rv_10_u:2495: RV_10.108.05.2{05} kasta enā ava sṛjādayudhvyutāsmākamāyudhāsanti tigmā
GV01rv_10_u:2496: RV_10.108.06.1{06} asenyā vaḥ paṇayo vacāṃsyaniṣavyāstanvaḥ santu pāpīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2497: RV_10.108.06.2{06} adhṛṣṭo va etavā astu panthā bṛhaspatirva ubhayā namṛḷāt
GV01rv_10_u:2498: RV_10.108.07.1{06} ayaṃ nidhiḥ sarame adribudhno gobhiraśvebhirvasubhirnyṛṣṭaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2499: RV_10.108.07.2{06} rakṣanti taṃ paṇayo ye sugopā reku padamalakamā jagantha
GV01rv_10_u:2500: RV_10.108.08.1{06} eha gamannṛṣayaḥ somaśitā ayāsyo aṅgiraso navagvāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2501: RV_10.108.08.2{06} ta etamūrvaṃ vi bhajanta gonāmathaitad vacaḥ paṇayovamannit
GV01rv_10_u:2502: RV_10.108.09.1{06} evā ca tvaṃ sarama ājagantha prabādhitā sahasā daivyena
GV01rv_10_u:2503: RV_10.108.09.2{06} svasāraṃ tvā kṛṇavai mā punargā apa te gavāṃ subhagebhajāma
GV01rv_10_u:2504: RV_10.108.10.1{06} nāhaṃ veda bhrātṛtvaṃ no svasṛtvamindro viduraṅgirasaśca ghorāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2505: RV_10.108.10.2{06} gokāmā me achadayan yadāyamapāta ita paṇayovarīyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2506: RV_10.108.11.1{06} dūramita paṇayo varīya ud gāvo yantu minatīr{ṛ}tena
GV01rv_10_u:2507: RV_10.108.11.2{06} bṛhaspatiryā avindan nigūḷāḥ somo grāvāṇa ṛṣayaśca viprāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2509: RV_10.109.01.2{07} vīḷuharāstapa ugro mayobhūrāpo devīḥprathamajā ṛtena
GV01rv_10_u:2510: RV_10.109.02.1{07} somo rājā prathamo brahmajāyāṃ punaḥ prāyachadahṛṇīyamānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2511: RV_10.109.02.2{07} anvartitā varuṇo mitra āsīdagnirhotāhastagṛhyā nināya
GV01rv_10_u:2512: RV_10.109.03.1{07} hastenaiva grāhya ādhirasyā brahmajāyeyamiti cedavocan
GV01rv_10_u:2513: RV_10.109.03.2{07} na dūtāya prahye tastha eṣā tathā rāṣṭraṃ gupitaṃkṣatriyasya
GV01rv_10_u:2514: RV_10.109.04.1{07} devā etasyāmavadanta pūrve saptaṛṣayastapase ye niṣeduḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2515: RV_10.109.04.2{07} bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasyopanītā durdhāṃ dadhātiparame vyoman
GV01rv_10_u:2516: RV_10.109.05.1{07} brahmacārī carati veviṣad viṣaḥ sa devānāṃ bhavatyekamaṅgam
GV01rv_10_u:2517: RV_10.109.05.2{07} tena jāyāmanvavindad bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītāṃjuhvaṃ na devāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2518: RV_10.109.06.1{07} punarvai devā adaduḥ punarmanuṣyā uta
GV01rv_10_u:2522: RV_10.110.01.1{08} samiddho adya manuṣo duroṇe devo devān yajasi jātavedaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2523: RV_10.110.01.2{08} ā ca vaha mitramahaścikitvān tvaṃ dūtaḥ kavirasipracetāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2524: RV_10.110.02.1{08} tanūnapāt patha ṛtasya yānān madhvā samañjan svadayāsujihva
GV01rv_10_u:2525: RV_10.110.02.2{08} manmāni dhībhiruta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā cakṛṇuhyadhvaraṃ naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2526: RV_10.110.03.1{08} ājuhvāna īḍyo vandyaścā yāhyagne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2527: RV_10.110.03.2{08} tvaṃ devānāmasi yahva hotā sa enān yakṣīṣito yajīyān
GV01rv_10_u:2528: RV_10.110.04.1{08} prācīnaṃ barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyā vastorasyā vṛjyateagre ahnām
GV01rv_10_u:2529: RV_10.110.04.2{08} vyu prathate vitaraṃ varīyo devebhyo aditayesyonam
GV01rv_10_u:2530: RV_10.110.05.1{08} vyacasvatīrurviyā vi śrayantāṃ patibhyo na janayaḥśumbhamānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2532: RV_10.110.06.1{09} ā suṣvayantī yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ niyonau
GV01rv_10_u:2533: RV_10.110.06.2{09} divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī surukme adhi śriyaṃśukrapiśaṃ dadhāne
GV01rv_10_u:2534: RV_10.110.07.1{09} daivyā hotārā prathamā suvācā mimānā yajñaṃ manuṣoyajadhyai
GV01rv_10_u:2535: RV_10.110.07.2{09} pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnaṃ jyotiḥpradiśā diśantā
GV01rv_10_u:2536: RV_10.110.08.1{09} ā no yajñaṃ bhāratī tūyametviḷā manuṣvadihacetayantī
GV01rv_10_u:2537: RV_10.110.08.2{09} tisro devīrbarhiredaṃ syonaṃ sarasvatīsvapasaḥ sadantu
GV01rv_10_u:2538: RV_10.110.09.1{09} ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpairapiṃśad bhuvanāniviśvā
GV01rv_10_u:2539: RV_10.110.09.2{09} tamadya hotariṣito yajīyān devaṃ tvaṣṭāramiha yakṣi vidvān
GV01rv_10_u:2540: RV_10.110.10.1{09} upāvasṛja tmanyā samañjan devānāṃ pātha ṛtuthāhavīṃṣi
GV01rv_10_u:2541: RV_10.110.10.2{09} vanaspatiḥ śamitā devo agniḥ svadantu havyammadhunā ghṛtena
GV01rv_10_u:2543: RV_10.110.11.2{09} asya hotuḥ pradiśy ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtaṃhaviradantu devāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2544: RV_10.111.01.1{10} manīṣiṇaḥ pra bharadhvaṃ manīṣāṃ yathā-yathā matayaḥsanti nṛṇām
GV01rv_10_u:2545: RV_10.111.01.2{10} indraṃ satyairerayāmā kṛtebhiḥ sa hivīro girvaṇasyurvidānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2546: RV_10.111.02.1{10} ṛtasya hi sadaso dhītiradyaut saṃ gārṣṭeyo vṛṣabhogobhirānaṭ
GV01rv_10_u:2547: RV_10.111.02.2{10} udatiṣṭhat taviṣeṇā raveṇa mahānti citsaṃ vivyācā rajāṃsi
GV01rv_10_u:2548: RV_10.111.03.1{10} indraḥ kila śrutyā asya veda sa hi jiṣṇuḥ pathikṛtsūryāya
GV01rv_10_u:2549: RV_10.111.03.2{10} ān menāṃ kṛṇvannacyuto bhuvad goḥ patirdivaḥ sanajā apratītaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2550: RV_10.111.04.1{10} indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vratāminādaṅgirobhirgṛṇānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2551: RV_10.111.04.2{10} purūṇi cin ni tatānā rajāṃsi dādhāra yodharuṇaṃ satyatātā
GV01rv_10_u:2552: RV_10.111.05.1{10} indro divaḥ pratimānaṃ pṛthivyā viśvā veda savanā hantiśuṣṇam
GV01rv_10_u:2553: RV_10.111.05.2{10} mahīṃ cid dyāmātanot sūryeṇa cāskambha citkambhanena skabhīyān
GV01rv_10_u:2554: RV_10.111.06.1{11} vajreṇa hi vṛtrahā vṛtramastaradevasya śūśuvānasyamāyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2555: RV_10.111.06.2{11} vi dhṛṣṇo atra dhṛṣatā jaghanthāthābhavomaghavan bāhvojāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2556: RV_10.111.07.1{11} sacanta yaduṣasaḥ sūryeṇa citrāmasya ketavo rāmavindan
GV01rv_10_u:2557: RV_10.111.07.2{11} ā yan nakṣatraṃ dadṛśe divo na punaryato nakiraddhā nu veda
GV01rv_10_u:2558: RV_10.111.08.1{11} dūraṃ kila prathamā jagmurāsāmindrasya yāḥ prasavesasrurāpaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2559: RV_10.111.08.2{11} kva svidagraṃ kva budhna āsāmāpomadhyaṃ kva vo nūnamantaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2560: RV_10.111.09.1{11} sṛjaḥ sindhūnrahinā jagrasānānādidetāḥ pra vivijrejavena
GV01rv_10_u:2561: RV_10.111.09.2{11} mumukṣamāṇā uta yā mumucre 'dhedetā naramante nitiktāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2563: RV_10.111.10.2{11} astamā te pārthivā vasūnyasme jagmuḥsūnṛtā indra pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2564: RV_10.112.01.1{12} indra piba pratikāmaṃ sutasya prātaḥsāvastava hipūrvapītiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2565: RV_10.112.01.2{12} harṣasva hantave śūra śatrūnukthebhiṣ ṭevīryā pra bravāma
GV01rv_10_u:2566: RV_10.112.02.1{12} yaste ratho manaso javīyānendra tena somapeyāya yāhi
GV01rv_10_u:2567: RV_10.112.02.2{12} tūyamā te harayaḥ pra dravantu yebhiryāsi vṛṣabhirmandamānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2568: RV_10.112.03.1{12} haritvatā varcasā sūryasya śreṣṭhai rūpaistanvaṃsparśayasva
GV01rv_10_u:2570: RV_10.112.04.1{12} yasya tyat te mahimānaṃ madeṣvime mahī rodasīnāviviktām
GV01rv_10_u:2571: RV_10.112.04.2{12} tadoka ā haribhirindra yuktaiḥ priyebhiryāhi priyamannamacha
GV01rv_10_u:2572: RV_10.112.05.1{12} yasya śaśvat papivānindra śatrūnanānukṛtyā raṇyācakartha
GV01rv_10_u:2573: RV_10.112.05.2{12} sa te purandhiṃ taviṣīmiyarti sa te madāyasuta indra somaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2574: RV_10.112.06.1{13} idaṃ te pātraṃ sanavittamindra pibā somamenā śatakrato
GV01rv_10_u:2575: RV_10.112.06.2{13} pūrṇa āhāvo madirasya madhvo yaṃ viśva idabhiharyantidevāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2576: RV_10.112.07.1{13} vi hi tvāmindra purudhā janāso hitaprayaso vṛṣabhahvayante
GV01rv_10_u:2577: RV_10.112.07.2{13} asmākaṃ te madhumattamānīmā bhuvan savanā teṣuharya
GV01rv_10_u:2578: RV_10.112.08.1{13} pra ta indra pūrvyāṇi pra nūnaṃ vīryā vocaṃ prathamākṛtāni
GV01rv_10_u:2580: RV_10.112.09.1{13} ni ṣu sīda gaṇapate gaṇeṣu tvāmāhurvipratamaṃkavīnām
GV01rv_10_u:2581: RV_10.112.09.2{13} na ṛte tvat kriyate kiṃ canāre mahāmarkaṃmaghavañcitramarca
GV01rv_10_u:2582: RV_10.112.10.1{13} abhikhyā no maghavan nādhamānān sakhe bodhi vasupatesakhīnām
GV01rv_10_u:2583: RV_10.112.10.2{13} raṇaṃ kṛdhi raṇakṛt satyaśuṣmābhakte cidābhajā rāye asmān
GV01rv_10_u:2585: RV_10.113.01.2{14} yadait kṛṇvāno mahimānamindriyampītvī somasya kratumānavardhata
GV01rv_10_u:2586: RV_10.113.02.1{14} tamasya viṣṇurmahimānamojasāṃśuṃ dadhanvān madhunovi rapśate
GV01rv_10_u:2588: RV_10.113.03.1{14} vṛtreṇa yadahinā bibhradāyudhā samasthithā yudhayeśaṃsamāvide
GV01rv_10_u:2589: RV_10.113.03.2{14} viśve te atra marutaḥ saha tmanāvardhannugra mahimānamindriyam
GV01rv_10_u:2590: RV_10.113.04.1{14} jajñāna eva vyabādhata spṛdhaḥ prāpaśyad vīro abhipauṃsyaṃ raṇam
GV01rv_10_u:2591: RV_10.113.04.2{14} avṛścadadrimava sasyadaḥ sṛjadastabhnān nākaṃ svapasyayā pṛthum
GV01rv_10_u:2592: RV_10.113.05.1{14} ādindraḥ satrā taviṣīrapatyata varīyo dyāvāpṛthivīabādhata
GV01rv_10_u:2593: RV_10.113.05.2{14} avābharad dhṛṣito vajramāyasaṃ śevaṃ mitrāyavaruṇāya dāśuṣe
GV01rv_10_u:2594: RV_10.113.06.1{15} indrasyātra taviṣībhyo virapśina ṛghāyato araṃhayantamanyave
GV01rv_10_u:2595: RV_10.113.06.2{15} vṛtraṃ yadugro vyavṛścadojasāpo bibhratantamasā parīvṛtam
GV01rv_10_u:2596: RV_10.113.07.1{15} yā vīryāṇi prathamāni kartvā mahitvebhiryatamānausamīyatuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2597: RV_10.113.07.2{15} dhvāntaṃ tamo 'va dadhvase hata indro mahnāpūrvahūtāvapatyata
GV01rv_10_u:2598: RV_10.113.08.1{15} viśve devāso adha vṛṣṇyāni te 'vardhayan somavatyāvacasyayā
GV01rv_10_u:2600: RV_10.113.09.1{15} bhūri dakṣebhirvacanebhir{ṛ}kvabhiḥ sakhyebhiḥ sakhyānipra vocata
GV01rv_10_u:2601: RV_10.113.09.2{15} indro dhuniṃ ca cumuriṃ ca dambhayañchraddhāmanasyā śṛṇute dabhītaye
GV01rv_10_u:2602: RV_10.113.10.1{15} tvaṃ purūṇyā bharā svaśvyā yebhirmaṃsai nivacanāniśaṃsan
GV01rv_10_u:2603: RV_10.113.10.2{15} sugebhirviśvā duritā tarema vido ṣu ṇa urviyāgādhamadya
GV01rv_10_u:2604: RV_10.114.01.1{16} gharmā samantā trivṛtaṃ vyāpatustayorjuṣṭimmātariśvā jagāma
GV01rv_10_u:2605: RV_10.114.01.2{16} divas payo didhiṣāṇā aveṣan vidurdevāḥ sahasāmānamarkam
GV01rv_10_u:2606: RV_10.114.02.1{16} tisro deṣṭrāya nir{ṛ}tīrupāsate dīrghaśruto vi hijānanti vahnayaḥ

GV01rv_10_u:2609: RV_10.114.03.2{16} tasyāṃ suparṇā vṛṣaṇā ni ṣedaturyatra devā dadhirebhāgadheyam

GV01rv_10_u:2611: RV_10.114.04.2{16} taṃ pākena manasāpaśyamantitastammātā reḷi sa u reḷi mātaram
GV01rv_10_u:2612: RV_10.114.05.1{16} suparṇaṃ viprāḥ kavayo vacobhirekaṃ santaṃ bahudhākalpayanti
GV01rv_10_u:2613: RV_10.114.05.2{16} chandāṃsi ca dadhato adhvareṣu grahān somasyamimate dvādaśa
GV01rv_10_u:2614: RV_10.114.06.1{17} ṣaṭtriṃśāṃśca caturaḥ kalpayantaśchandāṃsi cadadhata ādvādaśam
GV01rv_10_u:2615: RV_10.114.06.2{17} yajñaṃ vimāya kavayo manīṣaṛksāmābhyāṃ pra rathaṃ vartayanti

GV01rv_10_u:2617: RV_10.114.07.2{17} āpnānaṃ tīrthaṃ ka iha pra vocad yena pathāprapibante sutasya

GV01rv_10_u:2620: RV_10.114.09.1{17} kaśchandasāṃ yogamā veda dhīraḥ ko dhiṣṇyāṃ prativācaṃ papāda
GV01rv_10_u:2621: RV_10.114.09.2{17} kam ṛtvijāmaṣṭamaṃ śūramāhurharīindrasya ni cikāya kaḥ svit

GV01rv_10_u:2624: RV_10.115.01.1{18} citra icchiśostaruṇasya vakṣatho na yo mātarāvapyetidhātave
GV01rv_10_u:2625: RV_10.115.01.2{18} anūdhā yadi jījanadadhā ca nu vavakṣa sadyomahi dūtyaṃ caran
GV01rv_10_u:2626: RV_10.115.02.1{18} agnirha nāma dhāyi dannapastamaḥ saṃ yo vanā yuvatebhasmanā datā
GV01rv_10_u:2627: RV_10.115.02.2{18} abhipramurā juhvā svadhvara ino naprothamāno yavase vṛṣā
GV01rv_10_u:2628: RV_10.115.03.1{18} taṃ vo viṃ na druṣadaṃ devamandhasa induṃ prothantampravapantamarṇavam

GV01rv_10_u:2630: RV_10.115.04.1{18} vi yasya te jrayasānasyājara dhakṣorna vātāḥ pari santyacyutāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2631: RV_10.115.04.2{18} ā raṇvāso yuyudhayo na satvanaṃ tritaṃnaśanta pra śiṣanta iṣṭaye
GV01rv_10_u:2632: RV_10.115.05.1{18} sa idagniḥ kanvvatamaḥ kaṇvasakhāryaḥ parasyāntarasyataruṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2633: RV_10.115.05.2{18} agniḥ pātu gṛṇato agniḥ sūrīnagnirdadātuteṣāmavo naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2634: RV_10.115.06.1{19} vājintamāya sahyase supitrya tṛṣu cyavāno anu jātavedase
GV01rv_10_u:2635: RV_10.115.06.2{19} anudre cid yo dhṛṣatā varaṃ sate mahintamāya dhanvanedaviṣyate

GV01rv_10_u:2638: RV_10.115.08.1{19} ūrjo napāt sahasāvanniti tvopastutasya vandate vṛṣā vāk
GV01rv_10_u:2639: RV_10.115.08.2{19} tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ pratarandadhānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2640: RV_10.115.09.1{19} iti tvāgne vṛṣṭihavyasya putrā upastutāsa ṛṣayo 'vocan
GV01rv_10_u:2641: RV_10.115.09.2{19} tāṃśca pāhi gṛṇataśca sūrīn vaṣaḍ vaṣaḷ ityūrdhvāso anakṣan namo nama ityūrdhvāso anakṣan
GV01rv_10_u:2642: RV_10.116.01.1{20} pibā somaṃ mahata indriyāya pibā vṛtrāya hantaveśaviṣṭha
GV01rv_10_u:2643: RV_10.116.01.2{20} piba rāye śavase hūyamānaḥ piba madhvastṛpadindrā vṛṣasva
GV01rv_10_u:2644: RV_10.116.02.1{20} asya piba kṣumataḥ prasthitasyendra somasya varamāsutaśya
GV01rv_10_u:2646: RV_10.116.03.1{20} mamattu tvā divyaḥ soma indra mamattu yaḥ sūyatepārthiveṣu
GV01rv_10_u:2647: RV_10.116.03.2{20} mamattu yena varivaścakartha mamattu yenaniriṇāsi śatrūn
GV01rv_10_u:2648: RV_10.116.04.1{20} ā dvibarhā amino yātvindro vṛṣā haribhyāṃ pariṣiktamandhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2649: RV_10.116.04.2{20} gavyā sutasya prabhṛtasya madhvaḥ satrā khedāmaruśahā vṛṣasva
GV01rv_10_u:2650: RV_10.116.05.1{20} ni tigmāni bhrāśayan bhrāśyānyava sthirā tanuhiyātujūnām
GV01rv_10_u:2651: RV_10.116.05.2{20} ugrāya te saho balaṃ dadāmi pratītyāśatrūn vigadeṣu vṛśca
GV01rv_10_u:2652: RV_10.116.06.1{21} vyarya indra tanuhi śravāṃsyoja sthireva dhanvano'bhimātīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2654: RV_10.116.07.1{21} idaṃ havirmaghavan tubhyaṃ rātaṃ prati samrāḷ ahṛṇānogṛbhāya
GV01rv_10_u:2655: RV_10.116.07.2{21} tubhyaṃ suto maghavan tubhyaṃ pakvo 'ddhīndra pibaca prasthitasya
GV01rv_10_u:2656: RV_10.116.08.1{21} addhīdindra prasthitemā havīṃṣi cano dadhiṣva pacatotasomam

GV01rv_10_u:2659: RV_10.116.09.2{21} ayā iva pari caranti devā ye asmabhyandhanadā udbhidaśca
GV01rv_10_u:2660: RV_10.117.01.1{22} na vā u devāḥ kṣudhamid vadhaṃ dadurutāśitamupagachanti mṛtyavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2661: RV_10.117.01.2{22} uto rayiḥ pṛṇato nopa dasyatyutāpṛṇanmarḍitāraṃ na vindate

GV01rv_10_u:2663: RV_10.117.02.2{22} sthiraṃ manaḥ kṛṇute sevate purotocit sa marḍitāraṃ na vindate
GV01rv_10_u:2664: RV_10.117.03.1{22} sa id bhojo yo gṛhave dadātyannakāmāya carate kṛśāya
GV01rv_10_u:2665: RV_10.117.03.2{22} aramasmai bhavati yāmahūtā utāparīṣu kṛṇute sakhāyam
GV01rv_10_u:2666: RV_10.117.04.1{22} na sa sakhā yo na dadāti sakhye sacābhuve sacamānāyapitvaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2667: RV_10.117.04.2{22} apāsmāt preyān na tadoko asti pṛṇantamanyamaraṇaṃ cidicḥet

GV01rv_10_u:2669: RV_10.117.05.2{22} o hi vartante rathyeva cakrānyam-anyamupa tiṣṭhanta rāyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2670: RV_10.117.06.1{23} moghamannaṃ vindate apracetāḥ satyaṃ bravīmi vadha it satasya

GV01rv_10_u:2678: RV_10.118.01.1{24} agne haṃsi nyatriṇaṃ dīdyan martyeṣvā

GV01rv_10_u:2696: RV_10.119.01.1{26} iti vā iti me mano gāmaśvaṃ sanuyāmiti

GV01rv_10_u:2702: RV_10.119.04.1{26} upa mā matirasthita vāśrā putramiva priyam
GV01rv_10_u:2704: RV_10.119.05.1{26} ahaṃ taṣṭeva vandhuraṃ paryacāmi hṛdā matim
GV01rv_10_u:2706: RV_10.119.06.1{26} nahi me akṣipaccanāchāntsuḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ

GV01rv_10_u:2722: RV_10.120.01.1{01} tadidāsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭhaṃ yato jajña ugrastveṣanṛmṇaḥ

GV01rv_10_u:2734: RV_10.120.07.1{02} ni tad dadhiṣe 'varaṃ paraṃ ca yasminnāvithāvasā duroṇe
GV01rv_10_u:2735: RV_10.120.07.2{02} ā mātarā sthāpayase jigatnū ata inoṣi karvarā purūṇi

GV01rv_10_u:2739: RV_10.120.09.2{02} svasāro mātaribhvarīrariprā hinvanti ca śavasāvardhayanti ca
GV01rv_10_u:2740: RV_10.121.01.1{03} hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patirekaāsīt
GV01rv_10_u:2741: RV_10.121.01.2{03} sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemāṃ kasmai devāyahaviṣā vidhema

GV01rv_10_u:2743: RV_10.121.02.2{03} yasya chāyāmṛtaṃ yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāyahaviṣā vidhema
GV01rv_10_u:2744: RV_10.121.03.1{03} yaḥ prāṇato nimiṣato mahitvaika id rājā jagato babhūva
GV01rv_10_u:2745: RV_10.121.03.2{03} ya īśe asya dvipadaścatuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣāvidhema
GV01rv_10_u:2746: RV_10.121.04.1{03} yasyeme himavanto mahitvā yasya samudraṃ rasayā sahāhuḥ

GV01rv_10_u:2748: RV_10.121.05.1{03} yena dyaurugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḷhā yena sva stabhitaṃ yenanākaḥ

GV01rv_10_u:2750: RV_10.121.06.1{04} yaṃ krandasī avasā tastabhāne abhyaikṣetāṃ manasārejamāne
GV01rv_10_u:2751: RV_10.121.06.2{04} yatrādhi sūra udito vibhāti kasmai devāyahaviṣā vidhema
GV01rv_10_u:2752: RV_10.121.07.1{04} āpo ha yad bṛhatīrviśvamāyan garbhaṃ dadhānājanayantīragnim
GV01rv_10_u:2753: RV_10.121.07.2{04} tato devānāṃ samavartatāsurekaḥkasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema
GV01rv_10_u:2754: RV_10.121.08.1{04} yaścidāpo mahinā paryapaśyad dakṣaṃ dadhānājanayantīryajñam
GV01rv_10_u:2755: RV_10.121.08.2{04} yo deveṣvadhi deva eka āsīt kasmaidevāya haviṣā vidhema
GV01rv_10_u:2756: RV_10.121.09.1{04} mā no hiṃsījjanitā yaḥ pṛthivyā yo vā divaṃsatyadharmā jajāna
GV01rv_10_u:2757: RV_10.121.09.2{04} yaścāpaścandrā bṛhatīrjajānakasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema
GV01rv_10_u:2758: RV_10.121.10.1{04} prajāpate na tvadetānyanyo viśvā jātāni pari tābabhūva
GV01rv_10_u:2759: RV_10.121.10.2{04} yatkāmāste juhumastan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayorayīṇām
GV01rv_10_u:2760: RV_10.122.01.1{05} vasuṃ na citramahasaṃ gṛṇīṣe vāmaṃ śevamatithimadviṣeṇyam
GV01rv_10_u:2761: RV_10.122.01.2{05} sa rāsate śurudho viśvadhāyaso 'gnirhotāgṛhapatiḥ suvīryam

GV01rv_10_u:2764: RV_10.122.03.1{05} sapta dhāmāni pariyannamartyo dāśad dāśuṣe sukṛtemāmahasva
GV01rv_10_u:2765: RV_10.122.03.2{05} suvīreṇa rayiṇāgne svābhuvā yasta ānaṭsamidhā taṃ juṣasva
GV01rv_10_u:2766: RV_10.122.04.1{05} yajñasya ketuṃ prathamaṃ purohitaṃ haviṣmanta īḷate saptavājinam
GV01rv_10_u:2767: RV_10.122.04.2{05} śṛṇvantamagniṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭhamukṣaṇampṛṇantaṃ devaṃ pṛṇate suvīryam
GV01rv_10_u:2768: RV_10.122.05.1{05} ṭvaṃ dūtaḥ prathamo vareṇyaḥ sa hūyamāno amṛtāyamatsva
GV01rv_10_u:2769: RV_10.122.05.2{05} tvāṃ marjayan maruto dāśuṣo gṛhe tvāṃ stomebhirbhṛgavo vi rurucuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2770: RV_10.122.06.1{06} iṣaṃ duhan sudughāṃ viśvadhāyasaṃ yajñapriyeyajamānāya sukrato
GV01rv_10_u:2771: RV_10.122.06.2{06} agne ghṛtasnustrir{ṛ}tāni dīdyadvartiryajñaṃ pariyan sukratūyase

GV01rv_10_u:2773: RV_10.122.07.2{06} tvāṃ devā mahayāyyāya vāvṛdhurājyamagnenimṛjanto adhvare
GV01rv_10_u:2774: RV_10.122.08.1{06} ni tvā vasiṣṭhā ahvanta vājinaṃ gṛṇanto agne vidatheṣuvedhasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2775: RV_10.122.08.2{06} rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhāraya yūyaṃ pātasvastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2776: RV_10.123.01.1{07} ayaṃ venaścodayat pṛśnigarbhā jyotirjarāyū rajasovimāne
GV01rv_10_u:2777: RV_10.123.01.2{07} imamapāṃ saṃgame sūryasya śiśuṃ na viprāmatibhī rihanti
GV01rv_10_u:2778: RV_10.123.02.1{07} samudrādūrmimudiyarti veno nabhojāḥ pṛṣṭhaṃharyatasya darśi
GV01rv_10_u:2779: RV_10.123.02.2{07} ṛtasya sānāvadhi viṣṭapi bhrāṭsamānaṃ yonimabhyanūṣata vrāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2780: RV_10.123.03.1{07} samānaṃ pūrvīrabhi vāvaśānāstiṣṭhan vatsasyamātaraḥ sanīḷāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2781: RV_10.123.03.2{07} ṛtasya sānāvadhi cakramāṇārihanti madhvo amṛtasya vāṇīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2782: RV_10.123.04.1{07} jānanto rūpamakṛpanta viprā mṛgasya ghoṣaṃ mahiṣasya higman
GV01rv_10_u:2783: RV_10.123.04.2{07} ṛtena yanto adhi sindhumasthurvidad gandharvoamṛtāni nāma
GV01rv_10_u:2784: RV_10.123.05.1{07} apsarā jāramupasiṣmiyāṇā yoṣā bibharti parame vyoman
GV01rv_10_u:2785: RV_10.123.05.2{07} carat priyasya yoniṣu priyaḥ san sīdat pakṣe hiraṇyayesa venaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2786: RV_10.123.06.1{08} nāke suparṇamupa yat patantaṃ hṛdā venanto abhyacakṣatatvā
GV01rv_10_u:2787: RV_10.123.06.2{08} hiraṇyapakṣaṃ varuṇasya dūtaṃ yamasya yonauśakunaṃ bhuraṇyum
GV01rv_10_u:2788: RV_10.123.07.1{08} ūrdhvo gandharvo adhi nāke asthāt pratyaṃ citrā bibhradasyāyudhāni
GV01rv_10_u:2789: RV_10.123.07.2{08} vasāno atkaṃ surabhiṃ dṛśe kaṃ svarṇanāma janata priyāṇi
GV01rv_10_u:2790: RV_10.123.08.1{08} drapsaḥ samudramabhi yajjigāti paśyan gṛdhrasya cakṣasāvidharman
GV01rv_10_u:2791: RV_10.123.08.2{08} bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā cakānastṛtīye cakrerajasi priyāṇi
GV01rv_10_u:2792: RV_10.124.01.1{09} imaṃ no agna upa yajñamehi pañcayāmaṃ trivṛtaṃsaptatantum
GV01rv_10_u:2793: RV_10.124.01.2{09} aso havyavāḷ uta naḥ purogā jyogevadīrghaṃ tama āśayiṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2794: RV_10.124.02.1{09} adevād devaḥ pracatā guhā yan prapaśyamāno amṛtatvamemi
GV01rv_10_u:2795: RV_10.124.02.2{09} śivaṃ yat santamaśivo jahāmi svāt sakhyādaraṇīṃnābhimemi
GV01rv_10_u:2796: RV_10.124.03.1{09} paśyannanyasyā atithiṃ vayāyā ṛtasya dhāma vi mimepurūṇi
GV01rv_10_u:2797: RV_10.124.03.2{09} śaṃsāmi pitre asurāya śevamayajñiyādyajñiyaṃ bhāgamemi
GV01rv_10_u:2798: RV_10.124.04.1{09} bahvīḥ samā akaramantarasminnindraṃ vṛṇānaḥ pitaraṃjahāmi
GV01rv_10_u:2799: RV_10.124.04.2{09} agniḥ somo varuṇaste cyavante paryāvardrāṣṭraṃ tadavāmyāyan
GV01rv_10_u:2800: RV_10.124.05.1{09} nirmāyā u tye asurā abhūvan tvaṃ ca mā varuṇa kāmayāse
GV01rv_10_u:2801: RV_10.124.05.2{09} ṛtena rājannanṛtaṃ viviñcan mama rāṣṭrasyādhipatyamehi
GV01rv_10_u:2802: RV_10.124.06.1{10} idaṃ svaridamidāsa vāmamayaṃ prakāśa urvantarikṣam
GV01rv_10_u:2803: RV_10.124.06.2{10} hanāva vṛtraṃ nirehi soma haviṣ ṭvā santaṃ haviṣāyajāma
GV01rv_10_u:2804: RV_10.124.07.1{10} kaviḥ kavitvā divi rūpamāsajadaprabhūtī varuṇo nirapaḥ sṛjat
GV01rv_10_u:2805: RV_10.124.07.2{10} kṣemaṃ kṛṇvānā janayo na sindhavaś tā asyavarṇaṃ śucayo bharibhrati
GV01rv_10_u:2806: RV_10.124.08.1{10} tā asya jyeṣṭhamindriyaṃ sacante tā īmā kṣetisvadhayā madantīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2807: RV_10.124.08.2{10} tā iṃ viśo na rājānaṃ vṛṇānābībhatsuvo apa vṛtrādatiṣṭhan
GV01rv_10_u:2808: RV_10.124.09.1{10} bībhatsūnāṃ sayujaṃ haṃsamāhurapāṃ divyānāṃsakhye carantam
GV01rv_10_u:2809: RV_10.124.09.2{10} anuṣṭubhamanu carcūryamāṇamindraṃ nicikyuḥ kavayo manīṣā
GV01rv_10_u:2812: RV_10.125.02.1{11} ahaṃ somamāhanasaṃ bibharmyahaṃ tvaṣṭāramutapūṣaṇaṃ bhagam
GV01rv_10_u:2813: RV_10.125.02.2{11} ahaṃ dadhāmi draviṇaṃ haviṣmatesuprāvye yajamānāya sunvate
GV01rv_10_u:2814: RV_10.125.03.1{11} ahaṃ rāṣṭrī saṃgamanī vasūnāṃ cikituṣī prathamāyajñiyānām
GV01rv_10_u:2815: RV_10.125.03.2{11} tāṃ mā devā vyadadhuḥ purutrābhūristhātrāṃ bhūryāveśayantīm
GV01rv_10_u:2816: RV_10.125.04.1{11} mayā so annamatti yo vipaśyati yaḥ prāṇiti ya īṃśṛṇotyuktam
GV01rv_10_u:2817: RV_10.125.04.2{11} amantavo māṃ ta upa kṣiyanti śrudhiśruta śraddhivaṃ te vadāmi
GV01rv_10_u:2818: RV_10.125.05.1{11} ahameva svayamidaṃ vadāmi juṣṭaṃ devebhirutamānuṣebhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2819: RV_10.125.05.2{11} yaṃ kāmaye taṃ-tamugraṃ kṛṇomi tambrahmāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhām
GV01rv_10_u:2820: RV_10.125.06.1{12} ahaṃ rudrāya dhanurā tanomi brahmadviṣe śarave hantavāu
GV01rv_10_u:2821: RV_10.125.06.2{12} ahaṃ janāya samadaṃ kṛṇomyahaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī āviveśa
GV01rv_10_u:2822: RV_10.125.07.1{12} ahaṃ suve pitaramasya mūrdhan mama yonirapsvantaḥ samudre
GV01rv_10_u:2823: RV_10.125.07.2{12} tato vi tiṣṭhe bhuvanānu viśvotāmūṃ dyāṃvarṣmaṇopa spṛśāmi
GV01rv_10_u:2824: RV_10.125.08.1{12} ahameva vāta iva pra vāmyārabhamāṇā bhuvanāni viśvā
GV01rv_10_u:2825: RV_10.125.08.2{12} paro divā para enā pṛthivyaitāvatī mahinā saṃ babhūva
GV01rv_10_u:2826: RV_10.126.01.1{13} na tamaṃho na duritaṃ devāso aṣṭa martyam
GV01rv_10_u:2827: RV_10.126.01.2{13} sajoṣasoyamaryamā mitro nayanti varuṇo ati dviṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2828: RV_10.126.02.1{13} tad dhi vayaṃ vṛṇīmahe varuṇa mitrāryaman
GV01rv_10_u:2829: RV_10.126.02.2{13} yenā niraṃhaso yūyaṃ pātha nethā ca martyamati dviṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2830: RV_10.126.03.1{13} te nūnaṃ no 'yamūtaye varuṇo mitro aryamā
GV01rv_10_u:2831: RV_10.126.03.2{13} nayiṣthā uno neṣaṇi parṣiṣṭhā u naḥ parṣaṇyati dviṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2832: RV_10.126.04.1{13} yūyaṃ viśvaṃ pari pātha varuṇo mitro aryamā
GV01rv_10_u:2833: RV_10.126.04.2{13} yuṣmākaṃśarmaṇi priye syāma supraṇītayo 'ti dviṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2834: RV_10.126.05.1{13} ādityāso ati sridho varuṇo mitro aryamā
GV01rv_10_u:2835: RV_10.126.05.2{13} ugraṃ marudbhīrudraṃ huvemendramagniṃ svastaye 'ti dviṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2836: RV_10.126.06.1{13} netāra ū ṣu ṇastiro varuṇo mitro aryamā
GV01rv_10_u:2839: RV_10.126.07.2{13} śarma yachantusapratha ādityāso yadīmahe ati dviṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2840: RV_10.126.08.1{13} yathā ha tyad vasavo gauryaṃ cit padi ṣitāmamuñcatāyajatrāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2841: RV_10.126.08.2{13} evo ṣvasman muñcatā vyaṃhaḥ pra tāryagneprataraṃ na āyuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2848: RV_10.127.04.1{14} sā no adya yasyā vayaṃ ni te yāmannnavikṣmahi
GV01rv_10_u:2850: RV_10.127.05.1{14} ni grāmāso avikṣata ni padvanto ni pakṣiṇaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2852: RV_10.127.06.1{14} yāvayā vṛkyaṃ vṛkaṃ yavaya stenamūrmye
GV01rv_10_u:2854: RV_10.127.07.1{14} upa mā pepiśat tamaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vyaktamasthita
GV01rv_10_u:2856: RV_10.127.08.1{14} upa te gā ivākaraṃ vṛṇīṣva duhitardivaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2858: RV_10.128.01.1{15} mamāgne varco vihaveṣvastu vayaṃ tvendhānāstanvampuṣema
GV01rv_10_u:2860: RV_10.128.02.1{15} mama devā vihave santu sarva indravanto maruto viṣṇuragniḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2861: RV_10.128.02.2{15} mamāntarikṣamurulokamastu mahyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃkāme asmin
GV01rv_10_u:2862: RV_10.128.03.1{15} mayi devā draviṇamā yajantāṃ mayyāśīrastu mayidevahūtiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2863: RV_10.128.03.2{15} daivyā hotāro vanuṣanta pūrve 'riṣṭāḥsyāma tanvā suvīrāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2864: RV_10.128.04.1{15} mahyaṃ yajantu mama yāni havyākūtiḥ satyā manaso me astu
GV01rv_10_u:2865: RV_10.128.04.2{15} eno mā ni gāṃ katamaccanāhaṃ viśve devāso adhivocatā naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2866: RV_10.128.05.1{15} devīḥ ṣaḷ urvīruru naḥ kṛṇota viśve devāsa ihavīrayadhvam
GV01rv_10_u:2867: RV_10.128.05.2{15} mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhirmā radhāmadviṣate soma rājan
GV01rv_10_u:2868: RV_10.128.06.1{16} agne manyuṃ pratinudan pareṣāmadabdho gopāḥ pari pāhi nastvam
GV01rv_10_u:2869: RV_10.128.06.2{16} pratyañco yantu nigutaḥ punaste 'maiṣāṃ cittamprabudhāṃ vi neśat
GV01rv_10_u:2870: RV_10.128.07.1{16} dhātā dhātṝṇāṃ bhuvanasya yas patirdevaṃ trātāramabhimātiṣāham
GV01rv_10_u:2871: RV_10.128.07.2{16} imaṃ yajñamaśvinobhā bṛhaspatirdevāḥ pāntu yajamānaṃ nyarthāt
GV01rv_10_u:2872: RV_10.128.08.1{16} uruvyacā no mahiṣaḥ śarma yaṃsadasmin have puruhūtaḥpurukṣuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2873: RV_10.128.08.2{16} sa naḥ prajāyai haryaśva mṛḷayendra mā norīriṣo mā parā dāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2874: RV_10.128.09.1{16} ye naḥ sapatnā apa te bhavantvindrāgnibhyāmava bādhāmahetān
GV01rv_10_u:2875: RV_10.128.09.2{16} vasavo rudrā ādityā uparispṛśaṃ mograṃ cettāramadhirājamakran
GV01rv_10_u:2876: RV_10.129.01.1{17} nāsadāsīn no sadāsīt tadānīṃ nāsīd rajo no vyomāparo yat
GV01rv_10_u:2877: RV_10.129.01.2{17} kimāvarīvaḥ kuha kasya śarmannambhaḥ kimāsīd gahanaṃ gabhīram
GV01rv_10_u:2878: RV_10.129.02.1{17} na mṛtyurāsīdamṛtaṃ na tarhi na rātryā ahna āsītpraketaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2879: RV_10.129.02.2{17} ānīdavātaṃ svadhayā tadekaṃ tasmāddhānyan na paraḥ kiṃ canāsa
GV01rv_10_u:2880: RV_10.129.03.1{17} tama āsīt tamasā gūḷamagre 'praketaṃ salilaṃ sarvamāidam
GV01rv_10_u:2882: RV_10.129.04.1{17} kāmastadagre samavartatādhi manaso retaḥ prathamaṃ yadāsīt
GV01rv_10_u:2883: RV_10.129.04.2{17} sato bandhumasati niravindan hṛdi pratīṣyākavayo manīṣā
GV01rv_10_u:2885: RV_10.129.05.2{17} retodhāāsan mahimāna āsan svadhā avastāt prayatiḥ parastāt
GV01rv_10_u:2886: RV_10.129.06.1{17} ko addhā veda ka iha pra vocat kuta ājātā kuta iyaṃvisṛṣṭiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2887: RV_10.129.06.2{17} arvāg devā asya visarjanenāthā ko veda yataābabhūva
GV01rv_10_u:2888: RV_10.129.07.1{17} iyaṃ visṛṣṭiryata ābabhūva yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na
GV01rv_10_u:2889: RV_10.129.07.2{17} yo asyādhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman so aṅga veda yadi vā naveda
GV01rv_10_u:2890: RV_10.130.01.1{18} yo yajño viśvatastantubhistata ekaśataṃ devakarmebhirāyataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2891: RV_10.130.01.2{18} ime vayanti pitaro ya āyayuḥ pra vayāpa vayetyāsate tate
GV01rv_10_u:2892: RV_10.130.02.1{18} pumānenaṃ tanuta ut kṛṇatti pumān vi tatne adhi nākeasmin
GV01rv_10_u:2893: RV_10.130.02.2{18} ime mayūkhā upa sedurū sadaḥ sāmāni cakrustasarāṇyotave
GV01rv_10_u:2894: RV_10.130.03.1{18} kāsīt pramā pratimā kiṃ nidānamājyaṃ kimāsītparidhiḥ ka āsīt
GV01rv_10_u:2895: RV_10.130.03.2{18} chandaḥ kimāsīt praugaṃ kimukthaṃyad devā devamayajanta viśve
GV01rv_10_u:2896: RV_10.130.04.1{18} agnergāyatryabhavat sayugvoṣṇihayā savitā saṃ babhūva
GV01rv_10_u:2897: RV_10.130.04.2{18} anuṣṭubhā soma ukthairmahasvān bṛhaspaterbṛhatī vācamāvat
GV01rv_10_u:2898: RV_10.130.05.1{18} virāṇ mitrāvaruṇayorabhiśrīrindrasya triṣṭub ihabhāgo ahnaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2899: RV_10.130.05.2{18} viśvān devāñ jagatyā viveśa tenacākḷipra ṛṣayo manuṣyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2900: RV_10.130.06.1{18} cākḷipre tena ṛṣayo manuṣyā yajñe jāte pitaro naḥpurāṇe
GV01rv_10_u:2901: RV_10.130.06.2{18} paśyan manye manasā cakṣasā tān ya imaṃyajñamayajanta pūrve
GV01rv_10_u:2902: RV_10.130.07.1{18} sahastomāḥ sahachandasa āvṛtaḥ sahapramā ṛṣayaḥ saptadaivyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2903: RV_10.130.07.2{18} pūrveṣāṃ panthāmanudṛśya dhīrā anvālebhirerathyo na raśmīn
GV01rv_10_u:2904: RV_10.131.01.1{19} apa prāca indra viśvānamitrānapāpāco abhibhūte nudasva
GV01rv_10_u:2905: RV_10.131.01.2{19} apodīco apa śūrādharāca urau yathā tava śarmanmadema
GV01rv_10_u:2906: RV_10.131.02.1{19} kuvidaṅga yavamanto yavaṃ cid yathā dāntyanupūrvaṃviyūya
GV01rv_10_u:2907: RV_10.131.02.2{19} ihehaiṣāṃ kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣonamovṛktiṃ na jagmuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2908: RV_10.131.03.1{19} nahi sthūry ṛtuthā yātamasti nota śravo vividesaṃgameṣu
GV01rv_10_u:2909: RV_10.131.03.2{19} gavyanta indraṃ sakhyāya viprā aśvāyantovṛṣaṇaṃ vājayantaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2913: RV_10.131.05.2{19} yat surāmaṃ vyapibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatītvā maghavannabhiṣṇak
GV01rv_10_u:2914: RV_10.131.06.1{19} indraḥ sutrāmā svavānavobhiḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatuviśvavedāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2915: RV_10.131.06.2{19} bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasyapatayaḥ syāma
GV01rv_10_u:2916: RV_10.131.07.1{19} tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma
GV01rv_10_u:2917: RV_10.131.07.2{19} sa sutrāmā svavānindro asme ārāccid dveṣaḥ sanutaryuyotu
GV01rv_10_u:2920: RV_10.132.02.1{20} tā vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā dhārayatkṣitī suṣumneṣitatvatāyajāmasi
GV01rv_10_u:2921: RV_10.132.02.2{20} yuvoḥ krāṇāya sakhyairabhi ṣyāma rakṣasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2922: RV_10.132.03.1{20} adhā cin nu yad didhiṣāmahe vāmabhi priyaṃ rekṇaḥpatyamānāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2923: RV_10.132.03.2{20} dadvān vā yat puṣyati rekṇaḥ saṃ vārannakirasya maghāni
GV01rv_10_u:2924: RV_10.132.04.1{20} asāvanyo asura sūyata dyaustvaṃ viśveṣāṃ varuṇāsirājā
GV01rv_10_u:2926: RV_10.132.05.1{20} asmin svetacchakapūta eno hite mitre nigatān hanti vīrān
GV01rv_10_u:2927: RV_10.132.05.2{20} avorvā yad dhāt tanūṣvavaḥ priyāsu yajñiyāsvarvā
GV01rv_10_u:2928: RV_10.132.06.1{20} yuvorhi mātāditirvicetasā dyaurna bhūmiḥ payasāpupūtani
GV01rv_10_u:2929: RV_10.132.06.2{20} ava priyā didiṣṭana sūro ninikta raśmibhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2930: RV_10.132.07.1{20} yuvaṃ hyapnarājāvasīdataṃ tiṣṭhad rathaṃ nadhūrṣadaṃ vanarṣadam
GV01rv_10_u:2931: RV_10.132.07.2{20} tā naḥ kaṇūkayantīrnṛmedhastatre aṃhasaḥ sumedhastatre aṃhasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2933: RV_10.133.01.2{21} abhīke cidulokakṛt saṃge samatsu vṛtrahāsmākaṃ bodhi coditānabhantāmanyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu
GV01rv_10_u:2935: RV_10.133.02.2{21} aśatrurindrajajñiṣe viśvaṃ puṣyasi vāryaṃ taṃ tvā pari ṣvajāmahenabhantāmanyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu
GV01rv_10_u:2936: RV_10.133.03.1{21} vi ṣu viśvā arātayo 'ryo naśanta no dhiyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2937: RV_10.133.03.2{21} astāsiśatrave vadhaṃ yo na indra jighāṃsati yā te rātirdadirvasu nabhantāmanyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu
GV01rv_10_u:2938: RV_10.133.04.1{21} yo na indrābhito jano vṛkāyurādideśati
GV01rv_10_u:2939: RV_10.133.04.2{21} adhaspadaṃ tamīṃ kṛdhi vibādho asi sāsahirnabhantāmanyakeṣāṃ jyākāadhi dhanvasu
GV01rv_10_u:2940: RV_10.133.05.1{21} yo na indrābhidāsati sanābhiryaśca niṣṭyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2941: RV_10.133.05.2{21} ava tasyabalaṃ tira mahīva dyauradha tmanā nabhantāmanyakeṣāṃjyākā adhi dhanvasu
GV01rv_10_u:2943: RV_10.133.06.2{21} ṛtasya naḥpathā nayāti viśvāni duritā nabhantāmanyakeṣāṃjyākā adhi dhanvasu
GV01rv_10_u:2944: RV_10.133.07.1{21} asmabhyaṃ su tvamindra tāṃ śikṣa yā dohate prati varaṃjaritre
GV01rv_10_u:2945: RV_10.133.07.2{21} achidrodhnī pīpayad yathā naḥ sahasradhārāpayasā mahī gauḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2946: RV_10.134.01.1{22} ubhe yadindra rodasī āpaprāthoṣā iva

GV01rv_10_u:2948: RV_10.134.02.1{22} ava sma durhaṇāyato martasya tanuhi sthiram
GV01rv_10_u:2949: RV_10.134.02.2{22} adhaspadaṃ tamīṃ kṛdhi yo asmānādideśati devī janitryajījanad bhadrājanitryajījanat
GV01rv_10_u:2950: RV_10.134.03.1{22} ava tyā bṛhatīriṣo viśvaścandrā amitrahan
GV01rv_10_u:2952: RV_10.134.04.1{22} ava yat tvaṃ śatakratavindra viśvāni dhūnuṣe
GV01rv_10_u:2953: RV_10.134.04.2{22} rayiṃna sunvate sacā sahasriṇībhirūtibhirdevī janitry ...

GV01rv_10_u:2956: RV_10.134.06.1{22} dīrghaṃ hyaṅkuśaṃ yathā śaktiṃ bibharṣi mantumaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2957: RV_10.134.06.2{22} pūrveṇa maghavan padājo vayāṃ yathā yamo devī janitry...
