GV01rv_10_u:2960: RV_10.135.01.1{23} yasmin vṛkṣe supalāśe devaiḥ sampibate yamaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2961: RV_10.135.01.2{23} atrā noviśpatiḥ pitā purāṇānanu venati
GV01rv_10_u:2964: RV_10.135.03.1{23} yaṃ kumāra navaṃ rathamacakraṃ manasākṛṇoḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2966: RV_10.135.04.1{23} yaṃ kumāra prāvartayo rathaṃ viprebhyas pari
GV01rv_10_u:2968: RV_10.135.05.1{23} kaḥ kumāramajanayad rathaṃ ko niravartayat
GV01rv_10_u:2969: RV_10.135.05.2{23} kaḥ svit tadadya no brūyādanudeyī yathābhavat
GV01rv_10_u:2971: RV_10.135.06.2{23} purastād budhnaātataḥ paścān nirayaṇaṃ kṛtam
GV01rv_10_u:2972: RV_10.135.07.1{23} idaṃ yamasya sādanaṃ devamānaṃ yaducyate
GV01rv_10_u:2974: RV_10.136.01.1{24} keśyagniṃ keśī viṣaṃ keśī bibharti rodasī
GV01rv_10_u:2976: RV_10.136.02.1{24} munayo vātaraśanāḥ piśaṅgā vasate malā
GV01rv_10_u:2977: RV_10.136.02.2{24} vātasyānudhrājiṃ yanti yad devāso avikṣata
GV01rv_10_u:2978: RV_10.136.03.1{24} unmaditā mauneyana vātānā tasthimā vayam
GV01rv_10_u:2979: RV_10.136.03.2{24} śarīredasmākaṃ yūyaṃ martāso abhi paśyatha
GV01rv_10_u:2982: RV_10.136.05.1{24} vātasyāśvo vāyoḥ sakhātho deveṣito muniḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2983: RV_10.136.05.2{24} ubhausamudrāvā kṣeti yaśca pūrva utāparaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2984: RV_10.136.06.1{24} apsarasāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ caraṇe caran
GV01rv_10_u:2986: RV_10.136.07.1{24} vāyurasmā upāmanthat pinaṣṭi smā kunannamā
GV01rv_10_u:2987: RV_10.136.07.2{24} keśīviṣasya pātreṇa yad rudreṇāpibat saha
GV01rv_10_u:2988: RV_10.137.01.1{25} uta devā avahitaṃ devā un nayathā punaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2989: RV_10.137.01.2{25} utāgaścakruṣaṃ devā devā jīvayathā punaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2990: RV_10.137.02.1{25} dvāvimau vātau vāta ā sindhorā parāvataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2991: RV_10.137.02.2{25} dakṣante anya ā vātu parānyo vātu yad rapaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2992: RV_10.137.03.1{25} ā vāta vāhi bheṣajaṃ vi vāta vāhi yad rapaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:2993: RV_10.137.03.2{25} tvaṃ hiviśvabheṣajo devānāṃ dūta īyase
GV01rv_10_u:2995: RV_10.137.04.2{25} dakṣante bhadramābhārṣaṃ parā yakṣmaṃ suvāmi te
GV01rv_10_u:2997: RV_10.137.05.2{25} trāyantāṃ viśvā bhūtāni yathāyamarapā asat
GV01rv_10_u:2998: RV_10.137.06.1{25} āpa id vā u bheṣajīrāpo amīvacātanīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3000: RV_10.137.07.1{25} hastābhyāṃ daśaśākhā bhyāṃ jihvā vācaḥ purogavī
GV01rv_10_u:3001: RV_10.137.07.2{25} anāmayitnubhyāṃ tvā tabhyāṃ tvopa spṛśāmasi
GV01rv_10_u:3002: RV_10.138.01.1{26} tava tya indra sakhyeṣu vahnaya ṛtaṃ manvānā vyadardirurvalam
GV01rv_10_u:3003: RV_10.138.01.2{26} yatrā daśasyannuṣaso riṇannapaḥ kutsāyamanmannahyaśca daṃsayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3004: RV_10.138.02.1{26} avāsṛjaḥ prasvaḥ śvañcayo girinudāja usrā apibomadhu priyam
GV01rv_10_u:3005: RV_10.138.02.2{26} avardhayo vanino asya daṃsasā śuśocasūrya ṛtajātayā girā
GV01rv_10_u:3006: RV_10.138.03.1{26} vi sūryo madhye amucad rathaṃ divo vidad dāsaya pratimānamāryaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3007: RV_10.138.03.2{26} dṛḷāni piprorasurasya māyina indro vyāsyaccakṛvān ṛjiśvanā
GV01rv_10_u:3009: RV_10.138.04.2{26} māseva sūryo vasu puryamā dade gṛṇānaḥśatrūnraśṛṇād virukmatā
GV01rv_10_u:3010: RV_10.138.05.1{26} ayuddhaseno vibhvā vibhindatā dāśad vṛtrahā tujyāni tejate
GV01rv_10_u:3012: RV_10.138.06.1{26} etā tyā te śrutyāni kevalā yadeka ekamakṛṇorayajñam
GV01rv_10_u:3013: RV_10.138.06.2{26} māsāṃ vidhānamadadhā adhi dyavi tvayā vibhinnambharati pradhiṃ pitā
GV01rv_10_u:3015: RV_10.139.01.2{27} tasya pūṣā prasave yāti vidvān sampaśyanviśvā bhuvanāni gopāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3016: RV_10.139.02.1{27} nṛcakṣā eṣa divo madhya āsta āpaprivān rodasīantarikṣam
GV01rv_10_u:3017: RV_10.139.02.2{27} sa viśvācīrabhi caṣṭe ghṛtācīrantarāpūrvamaparaṃ ca ketum
GV01rv_10_u:3018: RV_10.139.03.1{27} rāyo budhnaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāṃ viśvā rūpābhi caṣṭeśacībhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3019: RV_10.139.03.2{27} deva iva savitā satyadharmendro na tasthausamare dhanānām
GV01rv_10_u:3020: RV_10.139.04.1{27} viśvāvasuṃ soma gandharvamāpo dadṛśuṣīstad ṛtenā vyāyan
GV01rv_10_u:3021: RV_10.139.04.2{27} tadanvavaidindro rārahāṇa āsāṃ pari suryasyaparidhinrapaśyat
GV01rv_10_u:3022: RV_10.139.05.1{27} viśvāvasurabhi tan no gṛṇātu divyo gandharvo rajasovimānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3023: RV_10.139.05.2{27} yad vā ghā satyamuta yan na vidma dhiyohinvāno dhiya in no avyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3025: RV_10.139.06.2{27} prāsāṃ gandharvo amṛtāni vocadindro dakṣaṃ pari jānādahīnām
GV01rv_10_u:3026: RV_10.140.01.1{28} agne tava śravo vayo mahi bhrājante arcayo vibhāvaso
GV01rv_10_u:3027: RV_10.140.01.2{28} bṛhadbhāno śavasā vājamukthyaṃ dadhāsi dāśuṣe kave
GV01rv_10_u:3028: RV_10.140.02.1{28} pāvakavarcāḥ śukravarcā anūnavarcā udiyarṣi bhānunā
GV01rv_10_u:3029: RV_10.140.02.2{28} putro mātarā vicarannupāvasi pṛṇakṣi rodasī ubhe
GV01rv_10_u:3031: RV_10.140.03.2{28} tve iṣaḥ saṃ dadhurbhūrivarpasaścitrotayo vāmajātāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3032: RV_10.140.04.1{28} irajyannagne prathayasva jantubhirasme rāyo amartya
GV01rv_10_u:3033: RV_10.140.04.2{28} sadarśatasya vapuṣo vi rājasi pṛṇakṣi sānasiṃ kratum
GV01rv_10_u:3034: RV_10.140.05.1{28} iṣkartāramadhvarasya pracetasaṃ kṣayantaṃ rādhaso mahaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3035: RV_10.140.05.2{28} rātiṃ vāmasya subhagāṃ mahīmiṣaṃ dadhāsi sānasiṃrayim
GV01rv_10_u:3036: RV_10.140.06.1{28} ṛtāvānaṃ mahiṣaṃ viśvadarśatamagniṃ sumnāya dadhirepuro janāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3037: RV_10.140.06.2{28} śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ tvā girā daivyammānuṣā yugā
GV01rv_10_u:3038: RV_10.141.01.1{29} agne achā vadeha naḥ pratyaṃ naḥ sumanā bhava
GV01rv_10_u:3039: RV_10.141.01.2{29} pra noyacha viśas pate dhanadā asi nastvam
GV01rv_10_u:3040: RV_10.141.02.1{29} pra no yachatvaryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3041: RV_10.141.02.2{29} pradevāḥ prota sūnṛtā rāyo devī dadātu naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3043: RV_10.141.03.2{29} ādityānviṣṇuṃ sūryaṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim
GV01rv_10_u:3045: RV_10.141.04.2{29} yathā naḥ sarvaijjanaḥ saṃgatyāṃ sumanā asat
GV01rv_10_u:3047: RV_10.141.05.2{29} vātaṃviṣṇuṃ sarasvatīṃ savitāraṃ ca vājinam
GV01rv_10_u:3048: RV_10.141.06.1{29} tvaṃ no agne agnibhirbrahma yajñaṃ ca vardhaya
GV01rv_10_u:3049: RV_10.141.06.2{29} tvaṃ nodevatātaye rāyo dānāya codaya
GV01rv_10_u:3050: RV_10.142.01.1{30} ayamagne jaritā tve abhūdapi sahasaḥ sūno nahyanyadastyāpyam
GV01rv_10_u:3051: RV_10.142.01.2{30} bhadraṃ hi śarma trivarūthamasti ta ārehiṃsānāmapa didyumā kṛdhi
GV01rv_10_u:3052: RV_10.142.02.1{30} pravat te agne janimā pitūyataḥ sācīva viśvā bhuvanā nyṛñjase
GV01rv_10_u:3053: RV_10.142.02.2{30} pra saptayaḥ pra saniṣanta no dhiyaḥ puraścarantipaśupā iva tmanā
GV01rv_10_u:3054: RV_10.142.03.1{30} uta vā u pari vṛṇakṣi bapsad bahoragna ulapasya svadhāvaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3055: RV_10.142.03.2{30} uta khilyā urvarāṇāṃ bhavanti mā te hetiṃ taviṣīṃcukrudhāma
GV01rv_10_u:3056: RV_10.142.04.1{30} yadudvato nivato yāsi bapsat pṛthageṣi pragardhinīvasenā
GV01rv_10_u:3057: RV_10.142.04.2{30} yadā te vāto anuvāti śocirvapteva śmaśru vapasipra bhūma
GV01rv_10_u:3058: RV_10.142.05.1{30} pratyasya śreṇayo dadṛśra ekaṃ niyānaṃ bahavo rathāsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3059: RV_10.142.05.2{30} bāhū yadagne anumarmṛjāno nyaṃṃ uttānāmanveṣibhūmim
GV01rv_10_u:3060: RV_10.142.06.1{30} ut te śuṣmā jihatāmut te arcirut te agne śaśamānasyavājāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3061: RV_10.142.06.2{30} ucchvañcasva ni nama vardhamāna ā tvādya viśvevasavaḥ sadantu
GV01rv_10_u:3063: RV_10.142.07.2{30} anyaṃkṛṇuṣvetaḥ panthāṃ tena yāhi vaśānanu
GV01rv_10_u:3064: RV_10.142.08.1{30} āyane te parāyaṇe dūrvā rohantu puṣpiṇiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3066: RV_10.143.01.1{01} tyaṃ cidatrim ṛtajuramarthamaśvaṃ na yātave
GV01rv_10_u:3067: RV_10.143.01.2{01} kakṣivantaṃ yadī punā rathaṃ na kṛṇutho navam
GV01rv_10_u:3068: RV_10.143.02.1{01} tyaṃ cidaśvaṃ na vājinamareṇavo yamatnata
GV01rv_10_u:3069: RV_10.143.02.2{01} dṛḷaṃgranthiṃ na vi ṣyatamatriṃ yaviṣṭhamā rajaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3070: RV_10.143.03.1{01} narā daṃsiṣṭhavatraye śubhrā siṣāsataṃ dhiyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3071: RV_10.143.03.2{01} athā hi vāṃ divo narā puna stomo na viśase
GV01rv_10_u:3072: RV_10.143.04.1{01} cite tad vāṃ surādhasā rātiḥ sumatiraśvinā
GV01rv_10_u:3073: RV_10.143.04.2{01} ā yannaḥ sadane pṛthau samane parṣatho narā
GV01rv_10_u:3074: RV_10.143.05.1{01} yuvaṃ bhujyuṃ samudra ā rajasaḥ pāra īṅkhitam
GV01rv_10_u:3076: RV_10.143.06.1{01} ā vāṃ sumnaiḥ śamyū iva maṃhiṣṭhā viśvavedasā
GV01rv_10_u:3077: RV_10.143.06.2{01} samasme bhūṣataṃ narotsaṃ na pipyuṣīriṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3078: RV_10.144.01.1{02} ayaṃ hi te amartya induratyo na patyate
GV01rv_10_u:3081: RV_10.144.02.2{02} ayaṃ bibhartyūrdhvakṛśanaṃ madam ṛbhurna kṛtvyaṃ madam
GV01rv_10_u:3082: RV_10.144.03.1{02} ghṛṣuḥ śyenāya kṛtvana āsu svāsu vaṃsagaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3084: RV_10.144.04.1{02} yaṃ suparṇaḥ parāvataḥ śyenasya putra ābharat
GV01rv_10_u:3086: RV_10.144.05.1{02} yaṃ te śyenaścārumavṛkaṃ padābharadaruṇaṃ mānamandhasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3087: RV_10.144.05.2{02} enā vayo vi tāryāyurjīvasa enā jāgārabandhutā
GV01rv_10_u:3088: RV_10.144.06.1{02} evā tadindra indunā deveṣu cid dhārayāte mahi tyajaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3089: RV_10.144.06.2{02} kratvā vayo vi tāryāyuḥ sukrato kratvāyamasmadāsutaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3091: RV_10.145.01.2{03} yayāsapatnīṃ bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim
GV01rv_10_u:3093: RV_10.145.02.2{03} sapatnīṃ me parādhama patiṃ me kevalaṃ kuru
GV01rv_10_u:3096: RV_10.145.04.1{03} nahyasyā nāma gṛbhṇāmi no asmin ramate jane
GV01rv_10_u:3099: RV_10.145.05.2{03} ubhe sahasvatībhūtvī sapatnīṃ me sahāvahai
GV01rv_10_u:3100: RV_10.145.06.1{03} upa te 'dhāṃ sahamānāmabhi tvādhāṃ sahīyasā
GV01rv_10_u:3101: RV_10.145.06.2{03} māmanupra te mano vatsaṃ gauriva dhāvatu pathā vāriva dhāvatu
GV01rv_10_u:3103: RV_10.146.01.2{04} kathāgrāmaṃ na pṛchasi na tvā bhīriva vindatī ' ' 'n
GV01rv_10_u:3106: RV_10.146.03.1{04} uta gāva ivādantyuta veśmeva dṛśyate
GV01rv_10_u:3108: RV_10.146.04.1{04} gāmaṅgaiṣa ā hvayati dārvaṅgaiṣo apāvadhīt
GV01rv_10_u:3111: RV_10.146.05.2{04} svādoḥphalasya jagdhvāya yathākāmaṃ ni padyate
GV01rv_10_u:3114: RV_10.147.01.1{05} śrat te dadhāmi prathamāya manyave 'han yad vṛtraṃ naryaṃviverapaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3115: RV_10.147.01.2{05} ubhe yat tvā bhavato rodasī anu rejateśuṣmāt pṛthivī cidadrivaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3116: RV_10.147.02.1{05} tvaṃ māyābhiranavadya māyinaṃ śravasyatā manasā vṛtramardayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3117: RV_10.147.02.2{05} tvamin naro vṛṇate gaviṣṭiṣu tvāṃ viśvāsuhavyāsviṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_10_u:3118: RV_10.147.03.1{05} aiṣu cākandhi puruhūta sūriṣu vṛdhāso ye maghavannānaśurmagham
GV01rv_10_u:3119: RV_10.147.03.2{05} arcanti toke tanaye pariṣṭiṣu medhasātā vājinamahraye dhane
GV01rv_10_u:3120: RV_10.147.04.1{05} sa in nu rāyaḥ subhṛtasya cākanan madaṃ yo asya raṃhyaṃciketati
GV01rv_10_u:3121: RV_10.147.04.2{05} tvāvṛdho maghavan dāśvadhvaro makṣū sa vājambharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3122: RV_10.147.05.1{05} tvaṃ śardhāya mahinā gṛṇāna uru kṛdhi maghavañchagdhirāyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3123: RV_10.147.05.2{05} tvaṃ no mitro varuṇo na māyī pitvo na dasmadayase vibhaktā
GV01rv_10_u:3124: RV_10.148.01.1{06} suṣvāṇāsa indra stumasi tvā sasavāṃsaśca tuvinṛmṇavājam
GV01rv_10_u:3125: RV_10.148.01.2{06} ā no bhara suvitaṃ yasya cākan tmanā tanāsanuyāma tvotāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3126: RV_10.148.02.1{06} ṛṣvastvamindra śūra jāto dāsīrviśaḥ sūryeṇasahyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3127: RV_10.148.02.2{06} guhā hitaṃ guhyaṃ gūḷamapsu bibhṛmasiprasravaṇe na somam
GV01rv_10_u:3128: RV_10.148.03.1{06} aryo vā giro abhyarca vidvān ṛṣīṇāṃ vipraḥ sumatiṃcakānaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3129: RV_10.148.03.2{06} te syāma ye raṇayanta somairenota tubhyaṃrathoḷa bhakṣaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3130: RV_10.148.04.1{06} imā brahmendra tubhyaṃ śaṃsi dā nṛbhyo nṛṇāṃ śūraśavaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3131: RV_10.148.04.2{06} tebhirbhava sakraturyeṣu cākannuta trāyasvagṛṇata uta stīn
GV01rv_10_u:3132: RV_10.148.05.1{06} śrudhī havamindra śūra pṛthyā uta stavase venyasyārkaiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3133: RV_10.148.05.2{06} ā yaste yoniṃ ghṛtavantamasvārūrmirna nimnairdravayanta vakvāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3134: RV_10.149.01.1{07} savitā yantraiḥ pṛthivīmaramṇādaskambhane savitā dyāmadṛṃhat
GV01rv_10_u:3136: RV_10.149.02.1{07} yatrā samudra skabhito vyaunadapāṃ napāt savitā tasyaveda
GV01rv_10_u:3137: RV_10.149.02.2{07} ato bhūrata ā utthitaṃ rajo 'to dyāvāpṛthivīaprathetām
GV01rv_10_u:3139: RV_10.149.03.2{07} suparṇo aṅga saviturgarutmān pūrvo jātaḥ sa u asyānudharma
GV01rv_10_u:3140: RV_10.149.04.1{07} gāva iva grāmaṃ yūyudhirivāśvān vāśreva vatsaṃsumanā duhānā
GV01rv_10_u:3141: RV_10.149.04.2{07} patiriva jāyāmabhi no nyetu dhartādivaḥ savitā viśvavāraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3142: RV_10.149.05.1{07} hiraṇyastūpaḥ savitaryathā tvāṅgiraso juhve vāje asmin
GV01rv_10_u:3143: RV_10.149.05.2{07} evā tvārcannavase vandamānaḥ somasyevāṇśuṃ pratijāgarāham
GV01rv_10_u:3145: RV_10.150.01.2{08} ādityairudrairvasubhirna ā gahi mṛḷīkāya na ā gahi
GV01rv_10_u:3146: RV_10.150.02.1{08} imaṃ yajñamidaṃ vaco jujuṣāṇa upāgahi
GV01rv_10_u:3148: RV_10.150.03.1{08} tvāmu jātavedasaṃ viśvavāraṃ gṛṇe dhiyā
GV01rv_10_u:3149: RV_10.150.03.2{08} agne devānā vaha naḥ priyavratān mṛḷīkāya priyavratān
GV01rv_10_u:3150: RV_10.150.04.1{08} agnirdevo devānāmabhavat purohito 'gniṃ manuṣyā ṛṣayaḥsamīdhire
GV01rv_10_u:3151: RV_10.150.04.2{08} agniṃ maho dhanasātāvahaṃ huve mṛḷīkandhanasātaye
GV01rv_10_u:3152: RV_10.150.05.1{08} agniratriṃ bharadvājaṃ gaviṣṭhiraṃ prāvan naḥ kaṇvantrasadasyumāhave
GV01rv_10_u:3153: RV_10.150.05.2{08} agniṃ vasiṣṭho havate purohitomṛḷīkāya purohitaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3154: RV_10.151.01.1{09} śraddhayāgniḥ samidhyate śraddhaya huyate haviḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3155: RV_10.151.01.2{09} śraddhāṃ bhagasya mūrdhani vacasā vedayamasi
GV01rv_10_u:3156: RV_10.151.02.1{09} priyaṃ śraddhe dadataḥ priyaṃ śraddte didāsataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3157: RV_10.151.02.2{09} priyambhojeṣu yajvasvidaṃ ma uditaṃ kṛdhi
GV01rv_10_u:3158: RV_10.151.03.1{09} yathā deva asureṣu śraddhāmugreṣu cakrire
GV01rv_10_u:3160: RV_10.151.04.1{09} śraddhāṃ devā yajamānā vāyugopā upāsate
GV01rv_10_u:3162: RV_10.151.05.1{09} śraddhāṃ prātai havāmahe śraddhāṃ madhyandinaṃ pari
GV01rv_10_u:3163: RV_10.151.05.2{09} śraddhāṃ sūryasya nimruci śraddhe śrad dhāpayeha naḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3165: RV_10.152.01.2{10} na yasyahanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana
GV01rv_10_u:3166: RV_10.152.02.1{10} svastida viśas patirvṛtrahā vimṛdho vaśī
GV01rv_10_u:3167: RV_10.152.02.2{10} vṛṣendraḥpura etu naḥ somapa abhayaṃkaraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3168: RV_10.152.03.1{10} vi rakṣo vi mṛdho jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja
GV01rv_10_u:3170: RV_10.152.04.1{10} vi na indra mṛdho jahi nīcā yacha pṛtanyataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3172: RV_10.152.05.1{10} apendra dviṣato mano 'pa jijyāsato vadham
GV01rv_10_u:3173: RV_10.152.05.2{10} vi manyoḥśarma yacha varīyo yavayā vadham
GV01rv_10_u:3176: RV_10.153.02.1{11} tvamindra balādadhi sahaso jāta ojasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3184: RV_10.154.01.1{12} soma ekebhyaḥ pavate ghṛtameka upāsate
GV01rv_10_u:3186: RV_10.154.02.1{12} tapasā ye anādhṛṣyāstapasā ye svaryayuḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3188: RV_10.154.03.1{12} ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūrāso ye tanūtyajaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3190: RV_10.154.04.1{12} ye cit pūrva ṛtasāpa ṛtāvāna ṛtāvṛdhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3192: RV_10.154.05.1{12} sahasraṇīthāḥ kavayo ye gopāyanti sūryam
GV01rv_10_u:3194: RV_10.155.01.1{13} arāyi kāṇe vikaṭe giriṃ gacha sadānve
GV01rv_10_u:3198: RV_10.155.03.1{13} ado yad dāru plavate sindhoḥ pāre apūruṣam
GV01rv_10_u:3199: RV_10.155.03.2{13} tadārabhasva durhaṇo tena gacha parastaram
GV01rv_10_u:3204: RV_10.156.01.1{14} agniṃ hinvantu no dhiyaḥ saptimāśumivājiṣu
GV01rv_10_u:3206: RV_10.156.02.1{14} yayā gā ākarāmahe senayāgne tavotyā
GV01rv_10_u:3208: RV_10.156.03.1{14} āgne sthūraṃ rayiṃ bhara pṛthuṃ gomantamaśvinam
GV01rv_10_u:3210: RV_10.156.04.1{14} agne nakṣatramajaramā sūryaṃ rohayo divi
GV01rv_10_u:3212: RV_10.156.05.1{14} agne keturviśāmasi preṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha upasthasat
GV01rv_10_u:3214: RV_10.157.01.1{15} imā nu kaṃ bhuvanā sīṣadhāmendraśca viśve ca devāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3215: RV_10.157.02.1{15} yajñaṃ ca nastanvaṃ ca prajāṃ cādityairindraḥ sahacīkḷipāti
GV01rv_10_u:3217: RV_10.157.04.1{15} hatvāya devā asurān yadāyan devā devatvamabhirakṣamāṇāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3219: RV_10.158.01.1{16} sūryo no divas pātu vāto antarikṣāt
GV01rv_10_u:3221: RV_10.158.02.1{16} joṣā savitaryasya te haraḥ śataṃ savānarhati
GV01rv_10_u:3223: RV_10.158.03.1{16} cakṣurno devaḥ savitā cakṣurna uta parvataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3225: RV_10.158.04.1{16} cakṣurno dhehi cakṣuṣe cakṣurvikhyai tanūbhyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3227: RV_10.158.05.1{16} susandṛśaṃ tvā vayaṃ prati paśyema sūrya
GV01rv_10_u:3229: RV_10.159.01.1{17} udasau sūryo agādudayaṃ māmako bhagaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3233: RV_10.159.03.1{17} mama putrāḥ śatruhaṇo 'tho me duhitā virāṭ
GV01rv_10_u:3234: RV_10.159.03.2{17} utāhamasmi saṃjayā patyau me śloka uttamaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3236: RV_10.159.04.2{17} idaṃ tadakri devā asapatnā kilābhuvam
GV01rv_10_u:3240: RV_10.159.06.2{17} yathāhamasya vīrasya virājāni janasya ca
GV01rv_10_u:3241: RV_10.160.01.1{18} tīvrasyābhivayaso asya pāhi sarvarathā vi harī iha muñca
GV01rv_10_u:3242: RV_10.160.01.2{18} indra mā tvā yajamānāso anye ni rīraman tubhyamimesutāsaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3243: RV_10.160.02.1{18} tubhyaṃ sutāstubhyamu sotvāsastvāṃ giraḥ śvātryāā hvayanti
GV01rv_10_u:3244: RV_10.160.02.2{18} indredamadya savanaṃ juṣāṇo viśvasyavidvāniha pāhi somam
GV01rv_10_u:3245: RV_10.160.03.1{18} ya uśatā manasā somamasmai sarvahṛdā devakāmaḥ sunoti
GV01rv_10_u:3246: RV_10.160.03.2{18} na gā indrastasya parā dadāti praśastamiccārumasmaikṛṇoti
GV01rv_10_u:3247: RV_10.160.04.1{18} anuspaṣṭo bhavatyeṣo asya yo asmai revān na sunoti somam
GV01rv_10_u:3248: RV_10.160.04.2{18} niraratnau maghavā taṃ dadhāti brahmadviṣo hantyanānudiṣṭaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3249: RV_10.160.05.1{18} aśvāyanto gavyanto vājayanto havāmahe tvopagantavā u
GV01rv_10_u:3250: RV_10.160.05.2{18} ābhūṣantaste sumatau navāyāṃ vayamindra tvā śunaṃhuvema
GV01rv_10_u:3251: RV_10.161.01.1{19} muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kamajñātayakṣmādutarājayakṣmāt
GV01rv_10_u:3252: RV_10.161.01.2{19} grāhirjagrāha yadi vaitadenaṃ tasyāindrāgnī pra mumuktamenam
GV01rv_10_u:3253: RV_10.161.02.1{19} yadi kṣitāyuryadi vā pareto yadi mṛtyorantikaṃ nītaeva
GV01rv_10_u:3256: RV_10.161.03.2{19} śataṃ yathemaṃ śarado nayātīndro viśvasyaduritasya pāram
GV01rv_10_u:3257: RV_10.161.04.1{19} śataṃ jīva śarado vardhamānaḥ śataṃ hemantāñchatamuvasantān
GV01rv_10_u:3258: RV_10.161.04.2{19} śatamindrāgnī savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śatāyuṣāhaviṣemaṃ punarduḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3259: RV_10.161.05.1{19} āhārṣaṃ tvāvidaṃ tvā punarāgāḥ punarnava
GV01rv_10_u:3260: RV_10.161.05.2{19} sarvāṅgasarvaṃ te cakṣuḥ sarvamāyuśca te 'vidam
GV01rv_10_u:3264: RV_10.162.02.2{20} agniṣ ṭambrahmaṇā saha niṣ kravyādamanīnaśat
GV01rv_10_u:3265: RV_10.162.03.1{20} yaste hanti patayantaṃ niṣatsnuṃ yaḥ sarīsṛpam
GV01rv_10_u:3267: RV_10.162.04.1{20} yasta ūrū viharatyantarā dampatī śaye
GV01rv_10_u:3269: RV_10.162.05.1{20} yastvā bhrātā patirbhūtvā jāro bhūtvā nipadyate
GV01rv_10_u:3270: RV_10.162.05.2{20} prajāṃ yaste jighāṃsati tamito nāśayāmasi
GV01rv_10_u:3271: RV_10.162.06.1{20} yastvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate
GV01rv_10_u:3272: RV_10.162.06.2{20} prajāṃ yaste jighāṃsati tamito nāśayāmasi
GV01rv_10_u:3273: RV_10.163.01.1{21} akṣībhyāṃ te nāsikābhyāṃ karṇābhyāṃ chubukādadhi
GV01rv_10_u:3274: RV_10.163.01.2{21} yakṣmaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ mastiṣkājjihvāyā vi vṛhāmi te
GV01rv_10_u:3276: RV_10.163.02.2{21} yakṣmaṃ doṣaṇyamaṃsābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ vi vṛhāmi te
GV01rv_10_u:3278: RV_10.163.03.2{21} yakṣmammatasnābhyāṃ yaknaḥ plāśibhyo vi vṛhāmi te
GV01rv_10_u:3279: RV_10.163.04.1{21} ūrubhyāṃ te aṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ prapadābhyām
GV01rv_10_u:3280: RV_10.163.04.2{21} yakṣmaṃ śroṇibhyāṃ bhāsadād bhaṃsaso vi vṛhāmi te
GV01rv_10_u:3285: RV_10.164.01.1{22} apehi manasas pate 'pa krāma paraścara
GV01rv_10_u:3286: RV_10.164.01.2{22} paro nir{ṛ}tyā ācakṣva bahudhā jīvato manaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3287: RV_10.164.02.1{22} bhadraṃ vai varaṃ vṛṇate bhadraṃ yuñjanti dakṣiṇam
GV01rv_10_u:3288: RV_10.164.02.2{22} bhadraṃ vaivasvate cakṣurbahutrā jīvato manaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3289: RV_10.164.03.1{22} yadāśasā niḥśasābhiśasopārima jāgrato yat svapantaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3294: RV_10.164.05.2{22} jāgratsvapnaḥsaṃkalpaḥ pāpo yaṃ dviṣmastaṃ sa ṛchatu yo no dveṣṭitam ṛchatu
GV01rv_10_u:3295: RV_10.165.01.1{23} devāḥ kapota iṣito yadichan dūto nir{ṛ}tyā idamājagāma
GV01rv_10_u:3296: RV_10.165.01.2{23} tasmā arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtiṃ śaṃ no astu dvipadeśaṃ catuṣpade
GV01rv_10_u:3297: RV_10.165.02.1{23} śivaḥ kapota iṣito no astvanāgā devāḥ śakuno gṛheṣu
GV01rv_10_u:3298: RV_10.165.02.2{23} agnirhi vipro juṣatāṃ havirnaḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī novṛṇaktu
GV01rv_10_u:3299: RV_10.165.03.1{23} hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhātyasmānāṣṭryāṃ padaṃ kṛṇuteagnidhāne
GV01rv_10_u:3300: RV_10.165.03.2{23} śaṃ no gobhyaśca puruṣebhyaścāstu mā nohiṃsīdiha devāḥ kapotaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3301: RV_10.165.04.1{23} yadulūko vadati moghametad yat kapotaḥ padamagnaukṛṇoti
GV01rv_10_u:3302: RV_10.165.04.2{23} yasya dūtaḥ prahita eṣa etat tasmai yamāya namoastu mrityave
GV01rv_10_u:3303: RV_10.165.05.1{23} ṛcā kapotaṃ nudata praṇodamiṣaṃ madantaḥ pari gāṃnayadhvam
GV01rv_10_u:3304: RV_10.165.05.2{23} saṃyopayanto duritāni viśvā hitvā na ūrjaṃ prapatāt patiṣthaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3305: RV_10.166.01.1{24} ṛṣabhaṃ mā samānānāṃ sapatnānāṃ viṣāsahim
GV01rv_10_u:3306: RV_10.166.01.2{24} hantāraṃśatrūṇāṃ kṛdhi virājaṃ gopatiṃ gavām
GV01rv_10_u:3308: RV_10.166.02.2{24} adhaḥ sapatnāme padorime sarve abhiṣṭhitāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3309: RV_10.166.03.1{24} atraiva vo 'pi nahyāmyubhe ārtnī iva jyayā
GV01rv_10_u:3310: RV_10.166.03.2{24} vācas pateni ṣedhemān yathā madadharaṃ vadān
GV01rv_10_u:3312: RV_10.166.04.2{24} ā vaścittamā vo vratamā vo 'haṃ samitiṃ dade
GV01rv_10_u:3313: RV_10.166.05.1{24} yogakṣemaṃ va ādāyāhaṃ bhūyāsamuttama ā vo mūrdhānamakramīm
GV01rv_10_u:3314: RV_10.166.05.2{24} adhaspadān ma ud vadata maṇḍūkā ivodakānmaṇḍūkā udakādiva
GV01rv_10_u:3315: RV_10.167.01.1{25} tubhyedamindra pari ṣicyate madhu tvaṃ sutasya kalaśasyarājasi
GV01rv_10_u:3316: RV_10.167.01.2{25} tvaṃ rayiṃ puruvīrāmu nas kṛdhi tvaṃ tapaḥparitapyājayaḥ svaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3317: RV_10.167.02.1{25} svarjitaṃ mahi mandānamandhaso havāmahe pari śakraṃsutānupa
GV01rv_10_u:3318: RV_10.167.02.2{25} imaṃ no yajñamiha bodhyā gahi spṛdhojayantaṃ maghavānamīmahe
GV01rv_10_u:3319: RV_10.167.03.1{25} somasya rājño varuṇasya dharmaṇi bṛhaspateranumatyā uśarmaṇi
GV01rv_10_u:3321: RV_10.167.04.1{25} prasūto bhakṣamakaraṃ carāvapi stomaṃ cemaṃ prathamaḥsūrirun mṛje
GV01rv_10_u:3322: RV_10.167.04.2{25} sute sātena yadyāgamaṃ vāṃ prativiśvāmitrajamadagnī dame
GV01rv_10_u:3323: RV_10.168.01.1{26} vātasya nu mahimānaṃ rathasya rujanneti stanayannasyaghoṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3324: RV_10.168.01.2{26} divispṛg yātyaruṇāni kṛṇvannuto eti pṛthivyāreṇumasyan
GV01rv_10_u:3325: RV_10.168.02.1{26} saṃ prerate anu vātasy viṣṭhā ainaṃ gachanti samanaṃ nayoṣāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3326: RV_10.168.02.2{26} tābhiḥ sayuk sarathaṃ deva īyate 'sya viśvasyabhuvanasya rājā
GV01rv_10_u:3327: RV_10.168.03.1{26} antarikṣe pathibhirīyamāno na ni viśate katamaccanāhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3328: RV_10.168.03.2{26} apāṃ sakhā prathamajā ṛtāvā kva svijjātaḥ kuta ābabhūva
GV01rv_10_u:3329: RV_10.168.04.1{26} ātmā devānāṃ bhuvanasya garbho yathāvaśaṃ carati devaeṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3330: RV_10.168.04.2{26} ghoṣā idasya śṛṇvire na rūpaṃ tasmai vātāyahaviṣā vidhema
GV01rv_10_u:3333: RV_10.169.02.1{27} yāḥ sarūpā virūpā ekarūpā yāsāmagniriṣṭyānāmāni veda
GV01rv_10_u:3334: RV_10.169.02.2{27} yā aṅgirasastapaseha cakrustābhyaḥparjanya mahi śarma yacha
GV01rv_10_u:3335: RV_10.169.03.1{27} yā deveṣu tanvamairayanta yāsāṃ somo viśvā rūpāṇiveda
GV01rv_10_u:3336: RV_10.169.03.2{27} tā asmabhyaṃ payasā pinvamānāḥ prajāvatīrindragoṣṭhe rirīhi
GV01rv_10_u:3338: RV_10.169.04.2{27} śivāḥ satīrupa no goṣṭhamākastāsāṃvayaṃ prajayā saṃ sadema
GV01rv_10_u:3339: RV_10.170.01.1{28} vibhrāḍ bṛhat pibatu somyaṃ madhvāyurdadhad yajñapatāvavihrutam
GV01rv_10_u:3340: RV_10.170.01.2{28} vātajūto yo abhirakṣati tmanā prajāḥ pupoṣapurudhā vi rājati
GV01rv_10_u:3341: RV_10.170.02.1{28} vibhrāḍ bṛhat subhṛtaṃ vājasātamaṃ dharman divo dharuṇesatyamarpitam
GV01rv_10_u:3342: RV_10.170.02.2{28} amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhantamaṃ jyotirjajñeasurahā sapatnahā
GV01rv_10_u:3343: RV_10.170.03.1{28} idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotiruttamaṃ viśvajiddhanajiducyate bṛhat
GV01rv_10_u:3344: RV_10.170.03.2{28} viśvabhrāḍ bhrājo mahi sūryo dṛśauru paprathe saha ojo acyutam
GV01rv_10_u:3345: RV_10.170.04.1{28} vibhrājañ jyotiṣā svaragacho rocanaṃ divaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3347: RV_10.171.01.1{29} tvaṃ tyamiṭato rathamindra prāvaḥ sutāvataḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3349: RV_10.171.02.1{29} tvaṃ makhasya dodhataḥ śiro 'va tvaco bharaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3353: RV_10.171.04.1{29} tvaṃ tyamindra sūryaṃ paścā santaṃ puras kṛdhi
GV01rv_10_u:3355: RV_10.172.01.1{30} ā yāhi vanasā saha gāvaḥ sacanta vartaniṃ yadūdhabhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3356: RV_10.172.02.1{30} ā yāhi vasvyā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭho jārayanmakhaḥsudānubhiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3357: RV_10.172.03.1{30} pitubhṛto na tantumit sudānavaḥ prati dadhmo yajāmasi
GV01rv_10_u:3358: RV_10.172.04.1{30} uṣā apa svasustamaḥ saṃ vartayati vartaniṃ sujātatā
GV01rv_10_u:3360: RV_10.173.01.2{31} viśastvā sarvā vāñchantu mā tvad rāṣṭramadhi bhraśat
GV01rv_10_u:3361: RV_10.173.02.1{31} ihaivaidhi māpa cyoṣṭhāḥ parvata ivāvicācaliḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3363: RV_10.173.03.1{31} imamindro adīdharad dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣā
GV01rv_10_u:3364: RV_10.173.03.2{31} tasmai somoadhi bravat tasmā u brahmaṇas patiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3365: RV_10.173.04.1{31} dhruvā dyaurdhruvā pṛthivī dhruvāsaḥ parvatā ime
GV01rv_10_u:3366: RV_10.173.04.2{31} dhruvaṃ viśvamidaṃ jagad dhruvo rājā viśāmayam
GV01rv_10_u:3367: RV_10.173.05.1{31} dhruvaṃ te rājā varuṇo dhruvaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3368: RV_10.173.05.2{31} dhruvaṃ ta indraścāgniśca rāṣṭraṃ dhārayatāṃ dhruvam
GV01rv_10_u:3369: RV_10.173.06.1{31} dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣābhi somaṃ mṛśāmasi
GV01rv_10_u:3370: RV_10.173.06.2{31} atho taindraḥ kevalīrviśo balihṛtas karat
GV01rv_10_u:3373: RV_10.174.02.1{32} abhivṛtya sapatnānabhi yā no arātayaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3374: RV_10.174.02.2{32} abhi pṛtanyantantiṣṭhābhi yo na irasyati
GV01rv_10_u:3375: RV_10.174.03.1{32} abhi tvā devaḥ savitābhi somo avīvṛtat
GV01rv_10_u:3378: RV_10.174.04.2{32} idaṃ tadakri devā asapatnaḥ kilābhuvam
GV01rv_10_u:3380: RV_10.174.05.2{32} yathāhameṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ virājāni janasya ca
GV01rv_10_u:3381: RV_10.175.01.1{33} pra vo grāvāṇaḥ savitā devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā
GV01rv_10_u:3383: RV_10.175.02.1{33} grāvāṇo apa duchunāmapa sedhata durmatim
GV01rv_10_u:3387: RV_10.175.04.1{33} grāvāṇaḥ savitā nu vo devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā
GV01rv_10_u:3389: RV_10.176.01.1{34} pra sūnava ṛbhūṇāṃ bṛhan navanta vṛjanā
GV01rv_10_u:3390: RV_10.176.01.2{34} kṣāmā yeviśvadhāyaso 'śnan dhenuṃ na mātaram
GV01rv_10_u:3391: RV_10.176.02.1{34} pra devaṃ devyā dhiyā bharatā jātavedasam
GV01rv_10_u:3393: RV_10.176.03.1{34} ayamu ṣya pra devayurhotā yajñāya nīyate
GV01rv_10_u:3397: RV_10.177.01.1{35} pataṃgamaktamasurasya māyayā hṛdā paśyanti manasāvipaścitaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3398: RV_10.177.01.2{35} samudre antaḥ kavayo vi cakṣate marīcīnāmpadamichanti vedhasaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3399: RV_10.177.02.1{35} pataṃgo vācaṃ manasā bibharti tāṃ gandharvo 'vadad garbheantaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3400: RV_10.177.02.2{35} tāṃ dyotamānāṃ svaryaṃ manīṣām ṛtasya padekavayo ni pānti
GV01rv_10_u:3401: RV_10.177.03.1{35} apaśyaṃ gopāmanipadyamānamā ca parā ca pathibhiścarantam
GV01rv_10_u:3402: RV_10.177.03.2{35} sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīrvasāna ā varīvartibhuvaneṣvantaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3403: RV_10.178.01.1{36} tyamū ṣu vājinaṃ devajūtaṃ sahāvānaṃ tarutāraṃrathānām
GV01rv_10_u:3405: RV_10.178.02.1{36} indrasyeva rātimājohuvānāḥ svastaye nāvamivā ruhema
GV01rv_10_u:3406: RV_10.178.02.2{36} urvī na pṛthvī bahule gabhīre mā vāmetau mā paretauriṣāma
GV01rv_10_u:3407: RV_10.178.03.1{36} sadyaścid yaḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūrya ivajyotiṣāpastatāna
GV01rv_10_u:3408: RV_10.178.03.2{36} sahasrasāḥ śatasā asya raṃhirnasmā varante yuvatiṃ na śaryām
GV01rv_10_u:3409: RV_10.179.01.1{37} ut tiṣṭhatāva paśyatendrasya bhāgam ṛtviyam
GV01rv_10_u:3411: RV_10.179.02.1{37} śrātaṃ haviro ṣvindra pra yāhi jagāma sūro adhvanovimadhyam
GV01rv_10_u:3412: RV_10.179.02.2{37} pari tvāsate nidhibhiḥ sakhāyaḥ kulapā navrājapatiṃ carantam
GV01rv_10_u:3413: RV_10.179.03.1{37} śrātaṃ manya ūdhani śrātamagnau suśrātaṃ manye tadṛtaṃ navīyaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3414: RV_10.179.03.2{37} mādhyandinasya savanasya dadhnaḥ pibendravajrin purukṛjjuṣāṇaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3415: RV_10.180.01.1{38} pra sasāhiṣe puruhūta śatrūñ jyeṣṭhaste śuṣma iharātirastu
GV01rv_10_u:3416: RV_10.180.01.2{38} indrā bhara dakṣiṇenā vasūni patiḥsindhūnāmasi revatīnām
GV01rv_10_u:3417: RV_10.180.02.1{38} mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ parāvata ā jaganthāparasyāḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3418: RV_10.180.02.2{38} sṛkaṃ saṃśāya pavimindra tigmaṃ vi śatrūntāḷi vi mṛdho nudasva
GV01rv_10_u:3421: RV_10.181.01.1{39} prathaśca yasya saprathaśca namānuṣṭubhasya haviṣohaviryat
GV01rv_10_u:3422: RV_10.181.01.2{39} dhāturdyutānāt savituśca viṣṇo rathantaramā jabhārā vasiṣṭhaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3423: RV_10.181.02.1{39} avindan te atihitaṃ yadāsīd yajñasya dhāma paramaṃguhā yat
GV01rv_10_u:3424: RV_10.181.02.2{39} dhāturdyutānāt savituśca viṣṇorbharadvājo bṛhadā cakre agneḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3425: RV_10.181.03.1{39} te 'vindan manasā dīdhyānā yaju ṣkannaṃ prathamandevayānam
GV01rv_10_u:3428: RV_10.182.01.2{40} kṣipadaśastimapa durmatiṃ hannathā karadyajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3429: RV_10.182.02.1{40} narāśaṃso no 'vatu prayāje śaṃ no astvanuyājo haveṣu
GV01rv_10_u:3430: RV_10.182.02.2{40} kṣipadaśastimapa durmatiṃ hannathā karad yajamānāyaśaṃ yoḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3431: RV_10.182.03.1{40} tapurmūrdhā tapatu rakṣaso ye brahmadviṣaḥ śaravehantavā u
GV01rv_10_u:3432: RV_10.182.03.2{40} kṣipadaśastimapa durmatiṃ hannathā karadyajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3433: RV_10.183.01.1{41} apaśyaṃ tvā manasā cekitānaṃ tapaso jātaṃ tapasovibhūtam
GV01rv_10_u:3434: RV_10.183.01.2{41} iha prajāmiha rayiṃ rarāṇaḥ pra jāyasvaprajayā putrakāma
GV01rv_10_u:3435: RV_10.183.02.1{41} apaśyaṃ tvā manasā dīdhyānāṃ svāyāṃ tanū ṛtvyenādhamānām
GV01rv_10_u:3436: RV_10.183.02.2{41} upa māmuccā yuvatirbabhūyāḥ pra jāyasvaprajayā putrakāme
GV01rv_10_u:3437: RV_10.183.03.1{41} ahaṃ garbhamadadhāmoṣadhīṣvahaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣvantaḥ ahaṃ prajā ajanayaṃ pṛthivyāmahaṃ janibhyo aparīṣuputrān
GV01rv_10_u:3438: RV_10.184.01.1{42} viṣṇuryoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu
GV01rv_10_u:3439: RV_10.184.01.2{42} āsiñcatu prajāpatirdhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te
GV01rv_10_u:3440: RV_10.184.02.1{42} garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehi sarasvati
GV01rv_10_u:3441: RV_10.184.02.2{42} garbhaṃ teaśvinau devāvā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā
GV01rv_10_u:3442: RV_10.184.03.1{42} hiraṇyayī araṇī yaṃ nirmanthato aśvinā
GV01rv_10_u:3443: RV_10.184.03.2{42} taṃ tegarbhaṃ havāmahe daśame māsi sūtave
GV01rv_10_u:3446: RV_10.185.02.1{43} nahi teṣāmamā cana nādhvasu vāraṇeṣu
GV01rv_10_u:3448: RV_10.185.03.1{43} yasmai putrāso aditeḥ pra jīvase martyāya
GV01rv_10_u:3450: RV_10.186.01.1{44} vāta ā vātu bheṣajaṃ śambhu mayobhu no hṛde
GV01rv_10_u:3452: RV_10.186.02.1{44} uta vāta pitāsi na uta bhrātota naḥ sakhā
GV01rv_10_u:3454: RV_10.186.03.1{44} yadado vāta te gṛhe 'mṛtasya nidhirhitaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3460: RV_10.187.03.1{45} yo rakṣāṃsi nijūrvati vṛṣā śukreṇa śociṣā
GV01rv_10_u:3462: RV_10.187.04.1{45} yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati
GV01rv_10_u:3464: RV_10.187.05.1{45} yo asya pāre rajasaḥ śukro agnirajāyata
GV01rv_10_u:3466: RV_10.188.01.1{46} pra nūnaṃ jātavedasamaśvaṃ hinota vājinam
GV01rv_10_u:3468: RV_10.188.02.1{46} asya pra jātavedaso vipravīrasya mīḷuṣaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3470: RV_10.188.03.1{46} yā ruco jātavedaso devatrā havyavāhanīḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3472: RV_10.189.01.1{47} āyaṃ gauḥ pṛśnirakramīdasadan mātaraṃ puraḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3476: RV_10.189.03.1{47} triṃśad dhāma vi rājati vāk pataṃgāya dhīyate
GV01rv_10_u:3478: RV_10.190.01.1{48} ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ cābhīddhāt tapaso 'dhyajāyata
GV01rv_10_u:3484: RV_10.191.01.1{49} saṃ-samid yuvase vṛṣannagne viśvānyarya ā
GV01rv_10_u:3485: RV_10.191.01.2{49} iḷas padesamidhyase sa no vasūnyā bhara
GV01rv_10_u:3486: RV_10.191.02.1{49} saṃ gachadhvaṃ saṃ vadadhvaṃ saṃ vo manāṃsi jānatām
GV01rv_10_u:3487: RV_10.191.02.2{49} devā bhāgaṃ yathā pūrve saṃjānānā upāsate
GV01rv_10_u:3488: RV_10.191.03.1{49} samāno mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānaṃ manaḥ saha cittameṣām
GV01rv_10_u:3489: RV_10.191.03.2{49} samānaṃ mantramabhi maṇtraye vaḥ samānena vohaviṣā juhomi
GV01rv_10_u:3490: RV_10.191.04.1{49} samānī va ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ
GV01rv_10_u:3491: RV_10.191.04.2{49} samānamastu vomano yathā vaḥ susahāsati
